name: The Power of Wealth
text: When you announce The Power of Wealth as your agenda, name 1 faction. You may include cards from that faction in your draw deck and plot deck. Reduce the cost of the first in-faction card you marshal or play each round by 1. Draft format only.
label: The Power of Wealth

name: Protectors of the Realm
text: You may include Knight and Army characters from any faction in your deck. Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a Knight or Army character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown. Draft format only.
label: Protectors of the Realm (VDS)

name: Treaty
text: When you announce Treaty as your agenda, name 2 factions. You may include cards from those factions in your draw deck and plot deck. Action: Kneel your faction card to draw 1 card. Then, choose and discard 1 card from your hand. Draft format only.
label: Treaty

name: Uniting the Seven Kingdoms
text: You may include cards from any faction in your draw deck. Increase the cost of each out-of-faction card you marshal or play by 1. Draft format only.
label: Uniting the Seven Kingdoms

name: House Bannerman
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel House Bannerman to reduce the cost of the next in-faction character you marshal this phase by 1. Draft format only.
label: House Bannerman

name: Feast or Famine
text: When Revealed: You may increase the gold value on Feast or Famine by 5. If you do, reduce the claim value on Feast of Famine by 2. Draft format only.
label: Feast or Famine

name: Summoned by the Conclave
text: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an in-faction card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. Draft format only.
label: Summoned by the Conclave

name: The Pale Mare
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses any number of characters he or she controls with total printed cost 10 or lower. Kill each character not chosen (cannot be saved). Draft format only.
label: The Pale Mare

name: Compelled by the King
text: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, choose and stand a character you control. If you win dominance this phase, that character gains 1 power. Draft format only.
label: Compelled by the King

name: Support of Saltcliffe
text: [greyjoy] character only. Attached character gains stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which attached character is attacking, stand attached character. Draft format only.
label: Support of Saltcliffe

name: Tyrion Lannister
text: Stealth. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge or a challenge in which Tyrion Lannister is participating, pay 1 gold to draw 1 card. Draft format only.
label: Tyrion Lannister (VDS)

name: The Viper's Rage
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge by 5 or more STR as the defending player, each character controlled by the attacking player loses a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon until the end of the phase. Draft format only.
label: The Viper's Rage

name: The Nightfort
text: Challenges Action: Kneel The Nightfort to choose a defending [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR for each attacking character. Draft format only.
label: The Nightfort

name: Raventree Elite
text: No attachments. Stealth. Each House Tully you control gains "immune to opponents' triggered effects" while it is participating in a challenge. Draft format only.
label: Raventree Elite

name: Deadly Khalasar
text: Challenges Action: Choose an attacking [targaryen] character you control. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR for each Dothraki character you control and gains intimidate. Draft format only.
label: Deadly Khalasar

name: Blackcrown Knights
text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge in which Blackcrown Knights is participating, discard 1 card from your hand to have Blackcrown Knights gain 2 power. Draft format only.
label: Blackcrown Knights

name: Lyn Corbray
text: Stealth. Each non-Army character you control with printed cost 6 or higher gets +2 STR. Draft format only.
label: Lyn Corbray (VDS)

name: Hollow Hill
text: Reaction: After you marshal a character with a faction affiliation that does not match any other card you control, draw 1 card. Draft format only.
label: Hollow Hill

name: Muster
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel a Knight character to search your deck for a Knight character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. Draft format only.
label: Muster

name: Holding the Trident
text: While you control fewer characters than each opponent, each character you control gets +2 STR. Draft format only.
label: Holding the Trident

name: Common Cause
text: X is the number of different faction affiliations among characters you control. Draft format only.
label: Common Cause

name: The Knight
text: Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins a [power] challenge against you, that opponent takes control of The Knight. +1 STR [power]
label: The Knight (VKm)

name: Captain of the Iron Fleet
text: Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins a [military] challenge against you, that opponent takes control of Captain of the Iron Fleet. +1 STR [military]
label: Captain of the Iron Fleet

name: The Reader
text: Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins a [intrigue] challenge against you, that opponent takes control of The Reader. +1 STR [intrigue]
label: The Reader (VKm)

name: Priest of the Drowned God
text: Each gold in your gold pool contributes 1 additional STR to your total for dominance. Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins dominance, that opponent takes control of Priest of the Drowned God.
label: Priest of the Drowned God (VKm)

name: Heir to the Iron Islands
text: Reaction: After you win a unopposed challenge, gain 1 power for your faction. Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins an unopposed challenge against you, that opponent takes control of Heir to the Iron Islands.
label: Heir to the Iron Islands

name: Pirate Marauder
text: Reaction: After you win initiative, gain 2 gold. Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins initiative, that opponent takes control of Pirate Marauder.
label: Pirate Marauder

name: Reek
text: Forced Reaction: After a player loses a challenge by 5 or more STR, that player takes control of Reek. -1 Income. -1 Initiative.
label: Reek (VKm)

name: Lord Reaper of Pyke
text: Forced Interrupt: When a player's power total reaches 15, that player takes control of Lord Reaper of Pyke.
label: Lord Reaper of Pyke

name: The King's Voice
text: You may run an agenda in addition to this one and may include non-loyal Small Council characters from any faction in your deck. Your Hand of the King gains the Small Council trait. Small Council characters cannot be knelt by non-plot card effects, cannot have their STR reduced, cannot have their icons removed, and gain "No Condition attachments." Hand of the King format only.
label: The King's Voice

name: A Clash of Kings
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to your own.
label: A Clash of Kings

name: A Feast for Crows
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, gain 2 power for your faction.
label: A Feast for Crows

name: A Game of Thrones
text: A player cannot initiate a [military] or [power] challenge unless he or she has won an [intrigue] challenge that phase.
label: A Game of Thrones

name: A Noble Cause
text: Reduce the cost of the first Lord or Lady character you marshal this round by 2.
label: A Noble Cause

name: A Storm of Swords
text: You may initiate an additional [military] challenge during the challenges phase.
label: A Storm of Swords

name: Building Orders
text: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an attachment or a location, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Building Orders

name: Calling the Banners
text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. Gain 1 gold for each character that player controls.
label: Calling the Banners

name: Calm Over Westeros
text: When Revealed: Name a challenge type. Until you reveal a new plot card, reduce the claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card by 1 during challenges of that type in which you are the defending player.
label: Calm Over Westeros

name: Confiscation
text: When Revealed: Choose an attachment, and discard it from play.
label: Confiscation

name: Counting Coppers
text: When Revealed: Draw 3 cards.
label: Counting Coppers

name: Filthy Accusations
text: When Revealed: Choose and kneel a character.
label: Filthy Accusations

name: Fortified Position
text: Treat each character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
label: Fortified Position

name: Heads on Spikes
text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. Discard 1 card at random from that player's hand. If that card is a character, gain 2 power for your faction and place the discarded character in its owner's dead pile.
label: Heads on Spikes

name: Jousting Contest
text: Each player cannot declare more than 1 character as an attacker or defender in each challenge.
label: Jousting Contest

name: Marched to the Wall
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses a character he or she controls (if able), and discards it from play (cannot be saved).
label: Marched to the Wall

name: Marching Orders
text: You cannot marshal locations or attachments, or play events.
label: Marching Orders

name: Naval Superiority
text: Treat the base gold value on each revealed Kingdom and each revealed Edict plot card as if it were 0.
label: Naval Superiority

name: Power Behind the Throne
text: When Revealed: Place 1 stand token on Power Behind the Throne. Action: Discard 1 stand token from Power Behind the Throne to choose and stand a character.
label: Power Behind the Throne

name: Rebuilding
text: When Revealed: Choose up to 3 cards in your discard pile, and shuffle them into your deck.
label: Rebuilding

name: Reinforcements
text: When Revealed: Choose a character with printed cost 5 or lower in your hand or discard pile, and put it into play.
label: Reinforcements

name: Sneak Attack
text: You cannot initiate more than 1 challenge during the challenges phase.
label: Sneak Attack

name: Summons
text: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for a character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Summons

name: Supporting the Faith
text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, each player returns all gold in his or her gold pool to the treasury.
label: Supporting the Faith

name: Taxation
text: You may marshal or play 1 additional limited card this round.
label: Taxation

name: The Winds of Winter
flavor: A cold wind was blowing out of the north, and it made the trees rustle like living things. All day, Will had felt as though something were watching him, something cold and implacable that loved him not.
label: The Winds of Winter

name: Wildfire Assault
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses up to 3 characters he or she controls. Kill each character not chosen (cannot be saved).
label: Wildfire Assault

name: Fealty
text: You cannot include more than 15 neutral cards in your deck. Action: Kneel your faction card to reduce the cost of the next loyal card you marshal or play this phase by 1.
label: Fealty

name: Littlefinger
text: Reaction: After you marshal Littlefinger, draw 2 cards. +1 Income.
flavor: "I did warn you not to trust me."
label: Littlefinger (Core)

name: Varys
text: Stealth. Interrupt: When the dominance phase ends, remove Varys from the game to discard each character from play.
flavor: "Why is it always the innocents who suffer most, when you high lords play your game of thrones?"
label: Varys (Core)

name: Rattleshirt's Raiders
text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Rattleshirt's Raiders is participating as an attacker, choose an attachment controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play.
label: Rattleshirt's Raiders

name: Wildling Horde
text: No attachments. Pillage. Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a participating Wildling character you control. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.
label: Wildling Horde

name: Seal of the Hand
text: Lord or Lady character only. Action: Kneel Seal of the Hand to stand attached character.
flavor: "The king eats, they say, and the Hand takes the shit." <cite>Robert Baratheon</cite>
label: Seal of the Hand

name: Bodyguard
text: Lord or Lady character only. Interrupt: When attached character would be killed or discarded from play, sacrifice Bodyguard to save that character.
label: Bodyguard

name: Little Bird
text: Attached character gains an [intrigue] icon.
flavor: "He has informants everywhere. His little birds, he calls them." <cite>Littlefinger</cite>
label: Little Bird (Core)

name: Milk of the Poppy
text: Terminal. Treat attached character's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).
flavor: By the time the maester removed the funnel from his mouth, he was already spiralling back to sleep.
label: Milk of the Poppy

name: Noble Lineage
text: Attached character gains a [power] icon.
flavor: What had Jon Arryn wanted with a king's bastard, and why was it worth his life?
label: Noble Lineage

name: Syrio's Training
text: Attached character gains a [military] icon.
flavor: "Now we will begin the dance." <cite>Syrio Forel</cite>
label: Syrio's Training

name: The Iron Throne
text: The Iron Throne contributes 8 STR to your total for dominance. +1 Reserve.
flavor: "…it is a monstruous uncomfortable chair. In more ways than one." <cite>Robert Baratheon</cite>
label: The Iron Throne (Core)

name: The Kingsroad
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel and sacrifice The Kingsroad to reduce the cost of the next character you marshal this phase by 3. +1 Initiative.
label: The Kingsroad

name: The Roseroad
text: Limited. +1 Income.
label: The Roseroad

name: Put to the Sword
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Put to the Sword

name: Put to the Torch
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, choose a location controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Put to the Torch

name: Superior Claim
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, gain 2 power for your faction. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Superior Claim

name: Tears of Lys
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge as the attacking player, place a poison token on a character without an [intrigue] icon controlled by the losing opponent. At the end of the phase, if that character still has the poison token, remove it and kill that character. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Tears of Lys

name: The Hand's Judgment
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, cancel those effects. X is that event's printed cost.
label: The Hand's Judgment

name: Maester Cressen
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Maester Cressen to choose a Condition attachment, and discard it from play.
label: Maester Cressen (Core)

name: Melisandre
text: Reaction: After you marshal or play a R'hllor card, choose and kneel a character. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "It is not the foes who curse you to your face that you must fear, but those who smile when you are looking and sharpen their knives when you turn your back."
label: Melisandre (Core)

name: Robert Baratheon
text: Intimidate. Renown. Robert Baratheon gets +1 STR for each other kneeling character in play.
flavor: "Fat? Fat, is it? Is that how your speak to your king? Ah, damn you, Ned, why are you always right?"
label: Robert Baratheon (Core)

name: Selyse Baratheon
text: Challenges Action: Pay 1 gold to choose a [baratheon] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [intrigue] icon.
label: Selyse Baratheon (Core)

name: Ser Davos Seaworth
text: Stealth. Interrupt: When Ser Davos Seaworth is killed, return him to your hand instead of placing him in your dead pile.
flavor: "King Stannis is my god. He made me and blessed me with his trust."
label: Ser Davos Seaworth (Core)

name: Shireen Baratheon
text: Interrupt: When Shireen Baratheon is killed, choose and kneel a character.
flavor: "The grey death sleeps, only to wake again. The child is not clean!" <cite>Val</cite>
label: Shireen Baratheon (Core)

name: Stannis Baratheon
text: Each player cannot stand more than 2 characters during the standing phase.
flavor: "I shall bring justice to Westeros."
label: Stannis Baratheon (Core)

name: Bastard in Hiding
flavor: "The seed is strong, he told me. His last words. He kept saying Robert's name, and he grabbed my arm so hard he left marks. Tell them, the seed is strong." <cite>Lysa Arryn</cite>
label: Bastard in Hiding

name: Fiery Followers
text: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, stand Fiery Followers.
flavor: "The red priests have a great temple on Lys. Always they are burning this and burning that, crying out to their R'hllor. They bore me with their fires. Soon they will bore King Stannis too, it is to be hoped." <cite>Salladhor Saan</cite>
label: Fiery Followers

name: King's Hunting Party
text: No attachments. While an opponent controls a King character, King's Hunting Party gains an [intrigue] icon .
flavor: "Three of my men were cut down like dogs not a league from where we sit, and what does Robert do? He goes hunting." <cite>Eddard Stark</cite>
label: King's Hunting Party

name: Dragonstone Faithful
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Dragonstone Faithful to reduce the cost of the next [baratheon] character you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Dragonstone Faithful

name: Vanguard Lancer
text: Reaction: After Vanguard Lancer enters play, choose an opponent's character or faction card, and discard 1 power from that card.
label: Vanguard Lancer

name: Lightbringer
text: [baratheon] character only. If attached character is Stannis Baratheon, he gains renown. Reaction: After attached character gains 1 or more power, stand it. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Lightbringer

name: Dragonstone Port
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Dragonstone Port to reduce the cost of the next [baratheon] card you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Dragonstone Port

name: Chamber of the Painted Table
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, kneel Chamber of the Painted Table to move 1 power from an opponent's faction card to your own.
label: Chamber of the Painted Table

name: The Red Keep
text: The Red Keep contributes 2 STR to your side during any [power] challenge in which you control a participating character. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost a [power] challenge this round, kneel The Red Keep to draw 2 cards.
label: The Red Keep (Core)

name: Consolidation of Power
text: Marshaling Action: Choose and kneel up to 4 total STR worth of characters controlled by the same player. Then, choose one of those characters, and have it gain 1 power.
label: Consolidation of Power

name: Ours is the Fury
text: Play only during a challenge in which you are the defending player. Action: Choose a kneeling [baratheon] character you control. That character is now participating as a defender. If you win this challenge, stand that character.
label: Ours is the Fury

name: Seen In Flames
text: Play only if you control a R'hllor character. Challenges Action: Choose an opponent, and look at his or her hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand.
label: Seen In Flames

name: Aeron Damphair
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, put an Ironborn character into play from your dead pile.
flavor: "What is dead may never die, but rises again, harder and stronger."
label: Aeron Damphair (Core)

name: Alannys Greyjoy
text: While you are the first player, reduce the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.
flavor: Alannys never had the sort of beauty the singers cherished, but her daughter had loved her fierce strong face and the laughter in her eyes.
label: Alannys Greyjoy (Core)

name: Asha Greyjoy
text: Stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Asha Greyjoy is participating, stand her.
flavor: "I am Asha of House Greyjoy, aye. Opinions differ on whether I'm a lady."
label: Asha Greyjoy (Core)

name: Balon Greyjoy
text: Renown. While Balon Greyjoy is attacking, each defending character with a lower STR than his does not contribute its STR to that challenge.
flavor: "I am the Greyjoy, Lord Reaper of Pyke, King of Salt and Rock, Son of the Sea Wind, and no man gives me a crown. I pay the iron price."
label: Balon Greyjoy (Core)

name: Euron Crow's Eye
text: Pillage. Renown. Reaction: After Euron Crow's Eye discards a card using pillage, put a location from the losing opponent's discard pile into play under your control.
flavor: "The Crow's Eye worships naught but his own pride." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>
label: Euron Crow's Eye (Core)

name: Maester Wendamyr
text: Stealth.
flavor: He wore about his neck a chain of many metals that marked him for a master of the Citadel.
label: Maester Wendamyr

name: Theon Greyjoy
text: Stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Theon Greyjoy is participating, he gains 1 power.
flavor: "Only a fool humbles himself when the world is so full of men eager to do that job for him."
label: Theon Greyjoy (Core)

name: Black Wind's Crew
text: Pillage.
label: Black Wind's Crew

name: Drowned Men
text: No attachments. Drowned Men gets +1 STR for each Warship location you control.
label: Drowned Men

name: Iron Islands Fishmonger
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Iron Islands Fishmonger to reduce the cost of the next [greyjoy] character you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Iron Islands Fishmonger

name: Lordsport Shipwright
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Lordsport Shipwright to choose and kneel a location with printed cost 2 or lower. (Printed cost 3 or lower instead if you are the first player.)
label: Lordsport Shipwright

name: Salty Navigator
text: +1 Initiative.
flavor: "No man ever truly knows what he can do unless he dares to leap." <cite>Euron Crow's Eye</cite>
label: Salty Navigator

name: Throwing Axe
text: Ironborn character only. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating as an attacker, sacrifice Throwing Axe to choose and kill a defending character.
label: Throwing Axe

name: Great Kraken
text: While you control Balon Greyjoy, he gains stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, either: draw 1 card, or gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit twice per round.)
label: Great Kraken

name: Iron Fleet Scout
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Iron Fleet Scout to choose a participating [greyjoy] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR. (+2 STR instead if you are the first player.)
label: Iron Fleet Scout

name: Sea Tower
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Sea Tower to reduce the cost of the next [greyjoy] card you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Sea Tower

name: Risen from the Sea
text: Interrupt: When a [greyjoy] character would be killed, save it. Then, attach Risen from the Sea to that character as a Condition attachment with the text: "Terminal. Attached character gets +1 STR."
label: Risen from the Sea

name: The Kraken's Grasp
text: Play only if you are the first player. Challenges Action: Choose a defending character with STR 5 or lower. That character does not contribute is STR to this challenge.
label: The Kraken's Grasp

name: We Do Not Sow
text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, choose an attachment or location controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it from play. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: We Do Not Sow

name: Cersei Lannister
text: While Cersei Lannister is attacking during an [intrigue] challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.
flavor: "Love is poison. A sweet poison, but it will kill you all the same."
label: Cersei Lannister (Core)

name: Grand Maester Pycelle
text: Insight.
flavor: "All I did, I did for House Lannister."
label: Grand Maester Pycelle (Core)

name: Joffrey Baratheon
text: Reaction: After a Lord or Lady character is killed, Joffrey Baratheon gains 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)
flavor: "My son. How could I have made a son like that, Ned?" <cite>Robert Baratheon</cite>
label: Joffrey Baratheon (Core)

name: Ser Jaime Lannister
text: Ser Jaime Lannister does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge, and gains renown while participating in a [military] challenge.
flavor: "There are no men like me. There's only me."
label: Ser Jaime Lannister (Core)

name: The Tickler
text: Dominance Action: Kneel The Tickler to discard the top card of an opponent's deck. Then, you may choose 1 copy of that card, and discard it from play.
flavor: "Tickler makes them howl so hard they piss themselves." <cite>Chiswyck</cite>
label: The Tickler

name: Tyrion Lannister
text: Stealth. Reaction: After an [intrigue] challenge is initiated, gain 2 gold. (Limit twice per round.)
flavor: "When you tear out a man's tongue, you are not proving him a liar, you're only telling the world that you fear what he might say."
label: Tyrion Lannister (Core)

name: Tywin Lannister
text: Renown. Tywin Lannister gets +1 STR for each gold in your gold pool. +2 Income.
label: Tywin Lannister (Core)

name: Burned Men
text: Ambush (2).
flavor: Every clan in the Mountains of the Moon feared the Burned Men, who mortified their flesh with fire to prove their courage.
label: Burned Men

name: Gold Cloaks
text: Ambush (2). Forced Interrupt: When a phase ends in which Gold Cloaks entered play using ambush, discard it from play (cannot be saved).
label: Gold Cloaks

name: Lannisport Moneylender
text: Limited. +1 Income.
label: Lannisport Moneylender

name: Lannisport Merchant
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Lannisport Merchant to reduce the cost of the next [lannister] character you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Lannisport Merchant

name: The Queen's Assassin
text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After The Queen's Assassin enters play using ambush, choose an opponent. If you have more cards in hand than that player, he or she must choose and kill a character he or she controls.
label: The Queen's Assassin

name: Widow's Wail
text: Ambush (1). Attached character gets +2 STR. If attached character is Joffrey Baratheon, he gains a [military] icon.
label: Widow's Wail

name: Casterly Rock
text: You may initiate an additional [intrigue] challenge during the challenges phase.
flavor: "They say there is naught but stone at the heart of Casterly Rock." <cite>Catelyn Stark</cite>
label: Casterly Rock (Core)

name: Lannisport
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, draw 1 card.
label: Lannisport (Core)

name: Western Fiefdom
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Western Fiefdom to reduce the cost of the next [lannister] card you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Western Fiefdom

name: Hear Me Roar!
text: Action: Put a [lannister] character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved).
label: Hear Me Roar!

name: The Things I Do For Love
text: Play only if you control a [lannister] Lord or Lady character. Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a character with printed cost X or lower controlled by an opponent, and return it to its owner's hand.
label: The Things I Do For Love

name: Treachery
text: Play only if you control a unique [lannister] character. Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered character, location, or attachment ability would initiate, cancel those effects.
label: Treachery

name: Areo Hotah
text: Ambush (5). Reaction: After Areo Hotah enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character, and remove it from the challenge.
flavor: "Someone told. Someone always tells."
label: Areo Hotah (Core)

name: Arianne Martell
text: Action: Put a character with printed cost 5 or lower into play from your hand. Then, return Arianne Martell to your hand (cannot be saved). (Limit once per phase.)
label: Arianne Martell (Core)

name: Doran Martell
text: Insight. Each other [martell] Lord and Lady character you control gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile.
flavor: "Who fears to walk upon the grass? But it is the grass that hides the viper from his enemies and shelters him until he strikes."
label: Doran Martell (Core)

name: Edric Dayne
text: Stealth. Action: Pay 1 gold to give Edric Dayne a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.
label: Edric Dayne (Core)

name: Maester Caleotte
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Maester Caleotte is participating, choose a character. That character loses a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.
label: Maester Caleotte

name: Obara Sand
text: Obara Sand may be declared as a defender during [power] challenges in which you are the defending player, even while kneeling.
flavor: "Cersei sent us a head. We should send her back a bag of them."
label: Obara Sand (Core)

name: The Red Viper
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Red Viper is participating as an attacker, he gains 1 power for every 5 STR by which you won the challenge.
flavor: "Oberyn was ever the viper. Deadly, dangerous, unpredictable. No man dared tread on him." <cite>Doran Martell</cite>
label: The Red Viper (Core)

name: Desert Scavenger
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Desert Scavenger to reduce the cost of the next [martell] character you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Desert Scavenger

name: Dornish Paramour
text: Reaction: After Dornish Paramour is declared as an attacker, choose a character controlled by the defending player. That character must be declared as a defender for this challenge, if able.
label: Dornish Paramour

name: Greenblood Trader
text: Reaction: After Greenblood Trader enters play, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add up to 1 of those cards to your hand, and place the others on the bottom of your deck in any order.
label: Greenblood Trader

name: House Dayne Knight
flavor: They came astride red horses and golden ones and a few as pale as snow...
label: House Dayne Knight

name: Palace Spearman
text: No attachments. While you are not the first player, Palace Spearman gains an [intrigue] icon.
label: Palace Spearman

name: Dawn
text: Attached character gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile. While attached character has the House Dayne trait, it gains intimidate.
label: Dawn

name: Ghaston Grey
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel and sacrifice Ghaston Grey to return an attacking character to its owner's hand (cannot be saved).
label: Ghaston Grey

name: Sunspear
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel Sunspear to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during challenges of this same type until the end of the phase.
label: Sunspear (Core)

name: Blood Orange Grove
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Blood Orange Grove to reduce the cost of the next [martell] card you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Blood Orange Grove

name: Doran's Game
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, gain X power for your faction. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Doran's Game (Core)

name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
text: Play only if you are not the first player. Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, name a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, the winner of the challenge cannot initiate challenges of that type. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

name: Confinement
text: Action: Choose a character with STR 4 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon.
label: Confinement

name: Benjen Stark
text: Each Ranger character you control cannot be bypassed by stealth. Interrupt: When Benjen Stark is killed, gain 2 power for your faction. Then, shuffle him back into your deck instead of placing him in your dead pile.
label: Benjen Stark (Core)

name: Ghost
text: No attachments. Stealth. Reaction: After Ghost bypasses a character using stealth, that character cannot be declared as a defender for any challenges until the end of the phase.
flavor: "He's not like the others. He never makes a sound. That's why I named him Ghost." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>
label: Ghost (Core)

name: Jon Snow
text: No attachments except Weapon. While Jon Snow is standing, he is considered to be participating in each challenge in which you control another attacking [thenightswatch] character.
flavor: "Different roads sometimes lead to the same castle."
label: Jon Snow (Core)

name: Maester Aemon
text: No attachments. Interrupt: When a [thenightswatch] character would be killed, kneel Master Aemon to save it.
flavor: "Kill the boy, Jon Snow. Winter is almost upon us. Kill the boy and let the man be born."
label: Maester Aemon (Core)

name: Old Bear Mormont
text: While you control The Wall, Old Bear Mormont does not kneel when declared as a defender. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost a challenge as the defending player this phase, put a [thenightswatch] card into play from your hand.
flavor: "The things we love destroy us every time, lad. Remember that."
label: Old Bear Mormont (Core)

name: Samwell Tarly
text: Insight. +1 Reserve.
flavor: The world was full of cravens who pretended to be heroes,, it took a queer sort of courage to admit to cowardice as Samwell Tarly had.
label: Samwell Tarly (Core)

name: Ser Waymar Royce
text: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When Ser Waymar Royce is killed, discard 1 card at random from each opponent's hand.
flavor: "Do the dead frighten you?"
label: Ser Waymar Royce

name: Yoren
text: Reaction: After you marshal Yoren, choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower in an opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control.
flavor: "I got thirty this time, men and boys all bound for the Wall…"
label: Yoren (Core)

name: Messenger Raven
text: No attachments. Dominance Action: Return Messenger Raven to your hand to draw 1 card.
label: Messenger Raven

name: Old Forest Hunter
text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Old Forest Hunter

name: Ranging Party
text: No attachments except Weapon.
flavor: "We have a long ride before us. Eight days, maybe nine. And night is falling." <cite>Gared of the Night's Watch</cite>
label: Ranging Party

name: Steward at the Wall
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Steward at the Wall to reduce the cost of the next [thenightswatch] character you marshal this phase by 1.
flavor: "We hunt and farm, tend the horses, milk the cows, gather firewood, cook the meals. Who do you think makes your clothing? Who brings up supplies from the south? The stewards." <cite>Chett</cite>
label: Steward at the Wall

name: Veteran Builder
text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Sacrifice Veteran Builder to choose and stand a location.
label: Veteran Builder

name: Longclaw
text: [thenightswatch] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR and gains renown.
flavor: "I use Longclaw when I must, ser." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>
label: Longclaw

name: Castle Black
text: Action: Kneel Castle Black to choose and stand a defending [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.
label: Castle Black (Core)

name: The Wall
text: Each [thenightswatch] character you control gets +1 STR. Forced Reaction: After you lose an unopposed challenge, kneel The Wall. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, kneel The Wall to gain 2 power for your faction.
label: The Wall (Core)

name: A Meager Contribution
text: Reaction: After an opponent collects income, move 1 gold from that player's gold pool to your own. (Max 1 per round.)
flavor: "The Night's Watch is not proud. We take what is offered." <cite>Old Bear Mormont</cite>
label: A Meager Contribution

name: Take the Black
text: Dominance Action: Choose a non-unique character with printed cost 6 or lower. Take control of that character. (Max 1 per round.)
flavor: "I pledge my life and honor to the Night's Watch, for this night and all the nights to come." <cite>from the Night's Watch vow</cite>
label: Take the Black

name: The Sword in the Darkness
text: Play only during a challenge in which you control a participating [thenightswatch] character. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the defending player, the losing opponent cannot initiate challenges against you this round.
label: The Sword in the Darkness

name: Arya Stark
text: Stealth. While Arya Stark has a duplicate, she gains a [military] icon. Reaction: After Arya Stark enters play, place the top card of your deck on her facedown as a duplicate.
label: Arya Stark (Core)

name: Bran Stark
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, sacrifice Bran Stark to cancel those effects.
flavor: "Can a man still be brave if he's afraid?"
label: Bran Stark (Core)

name: Catelyn Stark
text: While Catelyn Stark is participating in a challenge, your opponents cannot trigger card abilities.
flavor: I take no joy in mead nor meat, and song and laughter have become suspicious strangers to me. I am a creature of grief and dust and bitter longings. There is an empty place within me where my heart was once.
label: Catelyn Stark (Core)

name: Eddard Stark
text: Renown. Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, stand Eddard Stark.
flavor: "The winters are hard, but the Starks will endure. We always have."
label: Eddard Stark (Core)

name: Grey Wind
text: Intimidate. No attachments. Challenges Action: Kneel Grey Wind to choose and kill a character with STR 1 or lower. (STR 2 or lower instead if you control Robb Stark).
label: Grey Wind (Core)

name: Robb Stark
text: Renown. Reaction: After a [stark] character you control is sacrificed or killed, stand each character you control. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "I have won every battle, yet somehow I'm losing the war."
label: Robb Stark (Core)

name: Sansa Stark
text: Sansa Stark enters play knelt. Reaction: After Sansa Stark stands, gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "Why would you want to ride a smelly old horse and get all sore and sweaty when you could recline on feather pillows and eat cakes with the queen?"
label: Sansa Stark (Core)

name: Summer
text: No attachments. While you control Bran Stark, he gains insight. Reaction: After Summer enters play, return a [stark] character with printed STR 2 or lower from your discard or dead pile to your hand.
label: Summer (Core)

name: Direwolf Pup
text: No attachments. Direwolf Pup gets +1 STR for each other Direwolf card you control.
label: Direwolf Pup

name: Tumblestone Knight
flavor: Riverrun is situated at the end of the point of land where the Tumblestone flows into the Red Fork of the Trident.
label: Tumblestone Knight

name: Vanguard of the North
text: No attachments. While a player has a War plot revealed, Vanguard of the North does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge.
label: Vanguard of the North

name: Winterfell Steward
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Winterfell Steward to reduce the cost of the next [stark] character you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Winterfell Steward

name: Ice
text: [stark] character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which attached character is participating, sacrifice Ice to choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent.
label: Ice (Core)

name: Gates of Winterfell
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Gates of Winterfell to reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a [stark] card, draw it.
label: Gates of Winterfell

name: The Wolfswood
text: Each Direwolf card in your hand gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost.
label: The Wolfswood

name: Heart Tree Grove
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Heart Tree Grove to reduce the cost of the next [stark] card you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Heart Tree Grove

name: For the North!
text: Play only during a [military] challenge. Action: Choose a participating [stark] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, draw 1 card.
label: For the North!

name: Like Warm Rain
text: Reaction: After you lose an [intrigue] challenge as the defending player, kneel a Direwolf character to choose and kill an attacking character. (Max 1 per challenge.)
flavor: His blood felt like warm rain as it sprayed across her face.
label: Like Warm Rain

name: Winter Is Coming
text: Play only during a challenge. Action: Until the end of the challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Winter Is Coming

name: Daenerys Targaryen
text: Insight. While Daenerys Targaryen is standing, each character participating on an opponent's side in a challenge against you gets -1 STR.
flavor: "I am Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, the Unburnt, Mother of Dragons, khaleesi to Drogo's riders, and queen of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros."
label: Daenerys Targaryen (Core)

name: Drogon
text: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains renown.
label: Drogon (Core)

name: Khal Drogo
text: Renown. You may initiate an additional [military] challenge during the challenges phase.
flavor: "When Dothraki are defeated in combat, they cut off their braids in disgrace, so the world will know their shame. Khal Drogo has never lost a fight." <cite>Viserys Targaryen</cite>
label: Khal Drogo (Core)

name: Magister Illyrio
text: Action: Pay 2 gold to choose and stand a character. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "Illyrio believes in no cause but Illyrio. Gluttons are greedy men as a rule, and magisters are devious. Illyrio Mopatis is both."
label: Magister Illyrio (Core)

name: Rhaegal
text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which a Stormborn character you control is participating, choose and stand a Stormborn character. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Rhaegal (Core)

name: Ser Jorah Mormont
text: Renown. If Ser Jorah Mormont has 3 or more betrayal tokens on him, sacrifice him. Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Jorah Mormont is participating, place 1 betrayal token on him.
label: Ser Jorah Mormont (Core)

name: Viserion
text: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains stealth.
label: Viserion (Core)

name: Viserys Targaryen
text: Interrupt: When Viserys Targaryen leaves play, choose an attachment, and discard it from play.
flavor: "When they write the history of my reign, sweet sister, they will say it began tonight."
label: Viserys Targaryen (Core)

name: Braided Warrior
text: No attachments except Weapon.
flavor: Among the Dothraki, the man who does not ride was no man at all, the lowest of the low, without honor or pride.
label: Braided Warrior

name: Handmaiden
text: Action: Sacrifice Handmaiden to choose and stand a Lady character.
flavor: Her handmaids had helped her ready herself for the ceremony. Despite the tender mother's stomach that had afflicted her these past two moons, Dany had dined on bowls of half-clotted blood to accustom herself to the taste, and Irri made her chew strips of dried horseflesh until her jaws were aching.
label: Handmaiden

name: Targaryen Loyalist
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Targaryen Loyalist to reduce the cost of the next [targaryen] character you marshal this phase by 1.
flavor: "In holdfasts all across the realm, men lift secret toasts to your health while women sew dragon banners and hide them against the day of your return from across the water." <cite>Illyrio Mopatis</cite>
label: Targaryen Loyalist

name: Unsullied
text: No attachments except Weapon. While Unsullied is attacking, each defending character gets -1 STR.
label: Unsullied

name: Drogo's Arakh
text: Dothraki character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. If attached character is Khal Drogo, he does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the first [military] challenge you initiate each round.
label: Drogo's Arakh

name: Plaza of Punishment
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, kneel Plaza of Punishment to choose a character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.
label: Plaza of Punishment

name: Dothraki Sea
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, sacrifice Dothraki Sea to put a Dothraki character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand (cannot be saved).
label: Dothraki Sea

name: Illyrio's Estate
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Illyrio's Estate to reduce the cost of the next [targaryen] card you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Illyrio's Estate

name: Dracarys!
text: Action: Kneel a Dragon character or Daenerys Targaryen to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.
label: Dracarys!

name: Fire and Blood
text: Challenges Action: Choose a unique [targaryen] character in your dead pile, and shuffle it back into your deck. If that character is a Hatchling, you may put it into play instead.
label: Fire and Blood

name: Waking the Dragon
text: Action: Choose and stand a unique [targaryen] character you control. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, return it to your hand.
label: Waking the Dragon

name: Left
text: No attachments except Weapon. While you control Right, Left gets +1 STR, gains a [power] icon, and does not kneel when declared as a defender.
label: Left

name: Maester Lomys
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge as the defending player, discard 1 card at random from the attacking player's hand.
label: Maester Lomys

name: Margaery Tyrell
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Margaery Tyrell to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 STR.
flavor: "I know what a burden you bear. You should let me share the load. There must be some things I could do to help you."
label: Margaery Tyrell (Core)

name: Paxter Redwyne
text: Reduce the cost of the first event you play each round by 1. +1 Income.
label: Paxter Redwyne

name: Randyll Tarly
text: Renown. Reaction: After Randyll Tarly's STR is increased by a card effect, stand him. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Randyll Tarly (Core)

name: Right
text: No attachments except Weapon. While you control Left, Right gets +1 STR, gains an [intrigue] icon, and does not kneel when declared as a defender.
label: Right

name: The Knight of Flowers
text: Renown. While The Knight of Flowers is attacking alone, the defending player cannot declare more than 1 character as a defender.
label: The Knight of Flowers (Core)

name: The Queen of Thorns
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which The Queen of Thorns is participating, put a [tyrell] character with printed cost 6 or lower into play from your hand.
flavor: "All men are fools, if truth be told, but the ones in motley are more amusing than ones with crowns."
label: The Queen of Thorns (Core)

name: Courtesan of the Rose
flavor: The war had not touched the fabled bounty of Highgarden.
label: Courtesan of the Rose

name: Garden Caretaker
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Garden Caretaker to reduce the cost of the next [tyrell] character you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Garden Caretaker

name: Olenna's Informant
text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After Olenna's Informant enters play during the challenges phase, name a challenge type. You may initiate an additional challenge of that type this phase.
label: Olenna's Informant

name: Wardens of the Reach
text: No attachments. Wardens of the Reach gets +1 STR for each The Reach location you control.
label: Wardens of the Reach

name: Heartsbane
text: [tyrell] character only. Action: While attached character is participating in a challenge, kneel Heartsbane to give that character +3 STR until the end of the challenge.
label: Heartsbane

name: Highgarden
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Highgarden and pay 1 gold to choose an attacking character. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.
label: Highgarden (Core)

name: The Mander
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel The Mander to draw 2 cards.
label: The Mander

name: Rose Garden
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Rose Garden to reduce the cost of the next [tyrell] card you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Rose Garden

name: Growing Strong
text: Challenges Action: Choose up to three [tyrell] characters. Until the end of the phase, each of the chosen characters gets +2 STR.
label: Growing Strong

name: Olenna's Cunning
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] or [power] challenge, the losing opponent names a cardtype (character, location, attachment, or event). Search your deck for a card with a different cardtype, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Olenna's Cunning

name: "The Bear and the Maiden Fair"
text: Action: Choose a player. Look at the top 5 cards of that player's deck. Place up to 3 of those cards on the bottom of that deck, and the others on top, in any order.
flavor: And off they went, from here to there, The bear, the bear, and the maiden fair.
label: "The Bear and the Maiden Fair"

name: Banner of the Stag
text: You may include non-loyal [baratheon] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [baratheon] cards in your deck.
flavor: "I never asked for Dragonstone. I never wanted it." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>
label: Banner of the Stag

name: Banner of the Kraken
text: You may include non-loyal [greyjoy] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [greyjoy] cards in your deck.
flavor: "Greyjoy demands half the kingdom as the price of alliance, but what will he do to earn it?" <cite>Tywin Lannister</cite>
label: Banner of the Kraken

name: Banner of the Lion
text: You may include non-loyal [lannister] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [lannister] cards in your deck.
label: Banner of the Lion

name: Banner of the Sun
text: You may include non-loyal [martell] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [martell] cards in your deck.
label: Banner of the Sun

name: Banner of the Watch
text: You may include non-loyal [thenightswatch] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [thenightswatch] cards in your deck.
label: Banner of the Watch

name: Banner of the Wolf
text: You may include non-loyal [stark] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [stark] cards in your deck.
label: Banner of the Wolf

name: Banner of the Dragon
text: You may include non-loyal [targaryen] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [targaryen] cards in your deck.
label: Banner of the Dragon

name: Banner of the Rose
text: You may include non-loyal [tyrell] cards in your deck. You must include at least 12 [tyrell] cards in your deck.
label: Banner of the Rose

name: Master of Whispers
text: Supported by Master of Ships Supports: Hand of the King Rivals: Master of Laws, Master of Coin You may resolve your [intrigue] claim against any number of opponents of your choice. +1 STR [intrigue]
flavor: "There are things I might tell you of that eunuch that would chill your blood." <cite>Grand Maester Pycelle</cite>
label: Master of Whispers

name: Master of Ships
text: Supported by Master of Coin Supports: Master of Whispers Rivals: Master of Laws, Hand of the King Raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during [military] challenges in which you are attacking a rival. +1 STR [military]
flavor: "He is well suited to the office. He has spent half his life on ships." <cite>Cersei Lannister</cite>
label: Master of Ships

name: Hand of the King
text: Supported by Master of Whispers. Supports: Master of Laws. Rivals: Master of Coin, Master of Ships. You may initiate an additional [power] challenge during the challenges phase, against a different opponent. +1 STR [power]
flavor: The Hand of the King was the second-most powerful man in the Seven Kingdoms.
label: Hand of the King

name: Master of Coin
text: Supported by Master of Laws. Supports: Master of Ships Rivals: Hand of the King, Master of Whispers +2 Income.
flavor: Within three years of his coming to court, he was master of coin and a member of the small council, and today the crown's revenues were ten times what they had been under his beleaguered predecessor… though the crown's debt had grown vast as well.
label: Master of Coin

name: Master of Laws
text: Supported by Hand of the King Supports: Master of Coin Rivals: Master of Whispers, Master of Ships Increase the number of cards you draw in the draw phase by 1. +1 Reserve.
flavor: "Stannis is still the rightful heir by all the laws of the Seven Kingdoms." <cite>Ser Davos Seaworth</cite>
label: Master of Laws

name: Crown Regent
text: Supported by None Supports: None Rivals: None You may redirect 1 challenge this round. +2 STR for Dominance
flavor: "The Hand serves," the young knight informed him airily. "The regent rules until the king is of age." <cite>Ser Lancel Lannister</cite>
label: Crown Regent

name: Will
text: Stealth. Insight. Forced Reaction: After you lose an unopposed challenge, sacrifice a Ranger character you control.
flavor: "My mother told me that dead men sing no songs."
label: Will

name: The Watch Has Need
text: Action: Name a trait: Builder, Ranger, or Steward. Search the top X cards of your deck for any number of characters with that trait, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck. X is your reserve value.
label: The Watch Has Need

name: Maester Luwin
text: While you control: - Robb Stark, he gains insight. - Jon Snow, he gains stealth. - Bran Stark, he gains: "immune to opponents' plot effects." - Rickon Stark, he gains pillage.
label: Maester Luwin

name: Lady
text: [stark] character only. Terminal. Attached character gets +2 STR. Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Lady to a different character. Then, if attached character is Sansa Stark, stand her. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Lady (TtB)

name: Arbor Knight
text: Challenges Action: Pay 1 gold to choose a participating House Redwyne character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
label: Arbor Knight

name: Pleasure Barge
text: Immune to card effects. Reaction: After you marshal Pleasure Barge, if you have not yet drawn any cards this phase, draw 3 cards. -1 Income.
label: Pleasure Barge

name: Renly Baratheon
text: Reduce the cost of the first non-[baratheon] character you marshal each round by 1.
flavor: "If you cannot keep the King's peace, Janos, perhaps the City Watch should be commanded by someone who can."
label: Renly Baratheon (TtB)

name: King Robert's Warhammer
text: Attached character gets +1 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating as an attacker, choose and kneel up to X total STR worth of characters, where X is attached character's STR. Then, sacrifice King Robert's Warhammer.
label: King Robert's Warhammer

name: The Hound
text: Ambush (4). Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Hound is participating, you may discard 1 card at random from your hand. If you do not, return The Hound to your hand.
label: The Hound (TtB)

name: Cersei's Wheelhouse
text: Reaction: After you become the first player, either: gain 1 gold, or draw 1 card. -1 Initiative.
label: Cersei's Wheelhouse

name: The Seastone Chair
text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for an unopposed [military] challenge in which you are the attacking player, kneel your faction card to choose a character without attachments, controlled by the losing opponent. Instead of the normal claim effects, kill that character.
label: The Seastone Chair

name: Rise of the Kraken
text: Interrupt: When you gain power for winning an unopposed challenge, gain 2 power instead.
label: Rise of the Kraken

name: Merchant Prince
text: While Merchant Prince has an attachment, he gets +1 STR and gains a [military] icon.
flavor: At first the magisters and archons and merchant princes were pleased to welcome the last Targaryens to their homes and tables…
label: Merchant Prince

name: Vaes Dothrak
text: Reaction: After you reveal a plot card, discard an attachment from your hand to choose an attachment with equal or lower printed cost, and discard it from play.
flavor: …it was forbidden to carry a blade in Vaes Dothrak, or to shed a free man's blood.
label: Vaes Dothrak

name: Bastard Daughter
text: Interrupt: When Bastard Daughter or The Red Viper is killed, discard 1 card at random from each opponent's hand.
label: Bastard Daughter

name: The Long Plan
text: You do not return unspent gold to the treasury during the taxation phase. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, gain 1 gold.
label: The Long Plan

name: Support of the People
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, search your deck for a location with printed cost 3 or lower, and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Support of the People

name: Street of the Sisters
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to gain 1 power for your faction.
label: Street of the Sisters

name: Muster the Realm
text: During a challenge in which you control an attacking Army character, raise the claim value on Muster the Realm by 1.
label: Muster the Realm

name: Here to Serve
text: When Revealed: Search your deck for a Maester character with printed cost 3 or lower, and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
label: Here to Serve

name: Winterfell Kennel Master
text: Challenges Action: If you control a participating [stark] character, kneel a Direwolf character or a character with a Direwolf attachment to have it participate in the current challenge on your side. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Winterfell Kennel Master

name: Winterfell Castle
text: During a [military] or [power] challenge in which you control 2 or more unique participating [stark] characters, each of those characters gets +2 STR.
label: Winterfell Castle (TRtW)

name: Lady-in-Waiting
text: Lady-in-Waiting may be marshaled as a duplicate (at no cost) on a Lady character you own and control.
label: Lady-in-Waiting

name: Lady Sansa's Rose
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a Knight character that is attacking or defending alone, that character gains 1 power. (3 power instead if you control a Lady character.) (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Lady Sansa's Rose

name: Unsworn Apprentice
text: No attachments except Weapon. Challenges Action: Unsworn Apprentice gains a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Unsworn Apprentice

name: Brandon's Gift
text: Reaction: After you marshal a Builder character, reduce the cost of the next [thenightswatch] card you marshal this phase by 1. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
label: Brandon's Gift

name: Royal Entourage
text: Forced Reaction: After you lose an [intrigue] challenge, kneel Royal Entourage.
flavor: The visitors poured through the castle gates in a river of gold and silver and polished steel, three hundred strong, a pride of bannermen and knights, of sworn swords and freeriders.
label: Royal Entourage

name: In the Name of Your King!
text: Play only during a [military] challenge in which you are the defending player. Action: Kneel your faction card to end this challenge with no winner or loser. Until the end of the phase, you cannot initiate [military] challenges.
label: In the Name of Your King!

name: Brothel Madame
text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, choose a player. That player may give you 1 gold from his or her gold pool. Until the end of the phase, if that player has not given you gold this phase, he or she cannot initiate [military] challenges against you.
label: Brothel Madame

name: Wardens of the West
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, pay 2 gold to have the losing opponent choose and discard 2 cards from his or her hand.
label: Wardens of the West

name: The Reader
text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which a unique [greyjoy] character is participating, either: draw 1 card, or discard the top 3 cards from each opponent's deck. (Limit once per phase.)
designer: Card design by 2011 European Joust Champion, Martí Foz Hernandez.
label: The Reader (TRtW)

name: Raiding Longship
text: Challenges Action: If you are the first player, kneel Raiding Longship to choose a defending character without attachments. That character does not contribute its STR to this challenge.
label: Raiding Longship

name: Rakharo
text: While you control another Bloodrider character, Rakharo gains intimidate. Reaction: After a character is killed to satisfy claim during a challenge you initiated, Rakharo gains 1 power.
flavor: "As you say, I do, blood of my blood."
label: Rakharo (TRtW)

name: Crown of Gold
text: Terminal. Attached character gains the King trait. Attached character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.
label: Crown of Gold (TRtW)

name: Nymeria Sand
text: Challenges Action: Choose an opponent's character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice, and each Sand Snake character you control gains that challenge icon. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Nymeria Sand (TRtW)

name: In Doran's Name
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to gain X gold. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile.
label: In Doran's Name

name: Syrio Forel
text: Stealth. Challenges Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a [military] icon and stealth. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "Just so."
label: Syrio Forel

name: Shadowblack Lane
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, kneel your faction card to search the top 10 cards of your deck for an in-faction event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Shadowblack Lane

name: Trading with the Pentoshi
text: When Revealed: Each opponent gains 3 gold. (Cannot be canceled.)
label: Trading with the Pentoshi

name: Political Disaster
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses up to 2 locations he or she controls. Each location not chosen is discarded from play.
label: Political Disaster

name: Ser Rodrik Cassel
text: No attachments except Weapon. While Ser Rodrik Cassel is attacking in a [military] challenge, each unique [stark] character you control gains insight.
label: Ser Rodrik Cassel

name: Wolf Dreams
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to search your deck for a Direwolf card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: In his wolf dreams, he could race up the sides of mountains, jagged icy mountains taller than any tower, and stand at the summit beneath the full moon with all the world below him, the way it used to be.
label: Wolf Dreams

name: Ser Hobber Redwyne
text: Reaction: After you marshal Ser Hobber Redwyne, search your deck for a Lady character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: Sansa and Jayne Poole used to call them Ser Horror and Ser Slobber, and giggle whenever they caught sight of them. They did not look funny now.
label: Ser Hobber Redwyne

name: Mare in Heat
text: Knight character only. While attached character is attacking or defending alone, Mare in Heat gains: "Action: Kneel Mare in Heat to choose a participating character with STR higher than that of attached character, and remove that character from the challenge."
label: Mare in Heat

name: Ser Alliser Thorne
text: While you are the defending player, each [thenightswatch] character you control gains a [military] icon. Reaction: After a [military] challenge is initiated against you, kneel your faction card and pay 4 gold to put Ser Alliser Thorne into play from your hand.
label: Ser Alliser Thorne

name: Practice Blade
text: [thenightswatch] character only. Ambush (2). Attached character gets +1 STR and gains a [military] icon.
flavor: "That's a longsword, not an old man's cane." <cite>Ser Alliser Thorne</cite>
label: Practice Blade

name: Moon Boy
text: Insight. Forced Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Moon Boy is participating, discard 1 card at random from your hand.
flavor: The king's own fool, the pie-faced simpleton called Moon Boy, danced about on stilts, all in motley, making mock of everyone with such deft cruelty that Sansa wondered if he was simple after all.
label: Moon Boy

name: The King's Peace
text: Reaction: After a [military] or [power] challenge is initiated against you, the attacking player may either: kneel his or her faction card, or move 1 power from that faction card to yours. If that player does not, the challenge immediately ends with no winner or loser.
label: The King's Peace

name: Ser Gregor Clegane
text: Pillage. Renown. Reaction: After Ser Gregor Clegane discards a character using pillage, place that card in its owner's dead pile. Then, you may choose and kill a character with printed cost equal to that card's printed cost.
label: Ser Gregor Clegane (TKP)

name: I Never Bet Against My Family
text: Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to reveal the bottom 5 cards of your deck. You may put 1 unique [lannister] character revealed by this effect into play,, return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved).
label: I Never Bet Against My Family

name: Newly-Made Lord
text: Reaction: After you marshal Newly-Made Lord, choose a non-limited location with printed cost 3 or lower, and discard it from play.
designer: Card design by 2003 World Champion, Casey Galvan.
label: Newly-Made Lord

name: Fishing Net
text: Opponent's character only. Attached character cannot be declared as a defender.
label: Fishing Net

name: Crone of Vaes Dothrak
text: Reaction: After a character is discarded from an opponent's hand or deck, kneel a Dothraki character to place that card in its owner's dead pile.
flavor: Even the mightiest of khals bowed to the wisdom and authority of the dosh khaleen.
label: Crone of Vaes Dothrak

name: The Silver Steed
text: Dothraki character or Daenerys Targaryen only. While attached character is participating in a [power] challenge, it gains renown. Reaction: After attached character gains power using renown, sacrifice The Silver Steed. Then, you may initiate an additional [power] challenge this phase.
label: The Silver Steed

name: Attainted
text: Opponent's character only. Attached character loses an [intrigue] icon.
flavor: Unless Prince Doran had attainted her, she remained the lawful heir to Sunspear,, the man who married her would one day rule Dorne by her side.
label: Attainted

name: The Boneway
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, place 1 vengeance token on The Boneway. Dominance Action: Kneel The Boneway and discard 6 vengeance tokens from it to gain 3 power for your faction.
label: The Boneway

name: Hedge Knight
text: While you control another Knight character, Hedge Knight gets +1 STR and gains a [power] icon.
label: Hedge Knight

name: Knighted
text: Attached character gets +1 STR and gains the Knight trait.
flavor: Any knight can make a knight...
label: Knighted

name: A Tourney for the King
text: Each Knight character you control gains renown and "immune to opponents' events."
label: A Tourney for the King

name: The Lord of the Crossing
text: During the first challenge you initiate each phase, each of your participating characters gets -1 STR. During the third challenge you initiate each phase, each of your participating characters gets +2 STR. If you win this challenge, gain 1 power for your faction.
label: The Lord of the Crossing

name: Hodor
text: No attachments. Hodor cannot be declared as an attacker unless you control Bran Stark. Hodor does not contribute his STR to your total for dominance.
flavor: "Hodor!"
label: Hodor

name: Wardens of the North
text: Challenges Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating [stark] character, kneel another [stark] character to have it participate in that challenge on your side. (Limit twice per round.)
label: Wardens of the North

name: Ser Horas Redwyne
text: Reaction: After Ser Horas Redwyne is knelt, choose and stand a Lady character.
flavor: Arya had seen them in the bailey a hundred times,, the Redwyne twins, Ser Horas and Ser Hobber, homely youths with orange hair and square, freckled faces.
label: Ser Horas Redwyne

name: The Arbor
text: Limited. +3 Income.
label: The Arbor

name: Halder
text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Kneel a [thenightswatch] location or attachment to choose a [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR.
flavor: "It's the builders for me. What use would rangers be if the Wall fell down?"
label: Halder (NMG)

name: The Watcher on the Walls
text: Play only during a [military] challenge. Challenges Action: Kneel 2 Ranger characters to kill each attacking character.
label: The Watcher on the Walls

name: For the Watch!
text: You cannot lose (and your opponent cannot win) the first challenge initiated against you each phase.
label: For the Watch!

name: Gendry
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, Gendry gains 1 power. Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins dominance, you may discard 1 power from Gendry. If you do not, sacrifice a Bastard character.
label: Gendry (NMG)

name: Tobho Mott's Armory
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, kneel Tobho Mott's Armory to draw 1 card.
flavor: "Any village smith can hammer out a shift of mail,, my work is art." <cite>Tobho Mott</cite>
label: Tobho Mott's Armory

name: Red Cloaks
text: During [intrigue] challenges, Red Cloaks gets +1 STR for each gold on it. Action: Move 1 gold from your gold pool to Red Cloaks. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Red Cloaks

name: Paid Off
text: Opponent's character only. Ambush (1). Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, kneel attached character. Then, that character's controller may give you 1 gold from his or her gold pool to stand that character.
label: Paid Off

name: Priest of the Drowned God
text: Each Drowned God character you control gets +1 STR.
flavor: "And the waters of wrath will rise high, and the Drowned God will spread his dominion across the green lands!" <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>
label: Priest of the Drowned God (NMG)

name: Loot
text: You may only use gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to pay for Loot. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, discard the top X cards from the losing opponent's deck.
label: Loot

name: Dothraki Outriders
text: No attachments. Pillage. Reduce the cost to marshal Dothraki Outriders by 1 for each Dothraki character you control.
label: Dothraki Outriders

name: Blood of the Dragon
text: Each non-Dragon character gets -1 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.
label: Blood of the Dragon

name: Maester of Starfall
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Maester of Starfall to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses (choose one): insight, intimidate, pillage, or renown.
label: Maester of Starfall

name: Condemned
text: Opponent's character only. Attached character loses a [power] icon.
flavor: He never heard his father speak the words that condemned him. Perhaps no words were necessary. I put my life in the Red Viper's hands, and he dropped it.
label: Condemned

name: Wildling Scout
text: Action: Sacrifice Wildling Scout to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.
label: Wildling Scout

name: The First Snow of Winter
text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, return each character with printed cost 3 or lower to its owner's hand.
designer: Card design by 2005 World Champion, John M. Bruno.
label: The First Snow of Winter

name: Wraiths in Their Midst
text: Reduce the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 2 (to a minimum of 2).
label: Wraiths in Their Midst

name: Greatjon's Vanguard
text: No attachments. While there are fewer than 3 plots in your used pile, Greatjon's Vanguard gets +2 STR and gains renown.
label: Greatjon's Vanguard

name: Winterfell Crypt
text: Reaction: After a unique [stark] character you control is killed or sacrificed during the challenges phase, sacrifice Winterfell Crypt to choose a character with equal or lower printed STR. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, shuffle it back into its owner's deck.
label: Winterfell Crypt

name: Roseroad Patrol
text: No attachments. While you control a character with the highest STR in play, Roseroad Patrol gains stealth.
label: Roseroad Patrol

name: Pulling the Strings
text: When Revealed: Choose an Edict, Kingdom, or Scheme plot card in an opponent's used pile. Initiate the when revealed ability on that card as if you had just revealed it.
label: Pulling the Strings

name: Chett
text: No attachments except Weapon. Dominance Action: Kneel a Steward character to return a Direwolf or Raven card from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Chett

name: Northern Rookery
text: Reaction: After you marshal Northern Rookery, draw 1 card. +1 Reserve.
label: Northern Rookery

name: Kingswood
text: During [power] challenges in which you are the defending player, each attacking character gets -1 STR. Forced Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge, sacrifice Kingswood.
label: Kingswood (CoW)

name: Stinking Drunk
text: Opponent's character only. Reaction: After attached character stands, sacrifice Stinking Drunk to kneel that character.
label: Stinking Drunk

name: Bronn
text: During a challenge in which you are the defending player, Bronn gains a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon. Marshaling Action: Pay 1 gold to take control of Bronn. (Any player may initiate this ability.)
label: Bronn (CoW)

name: Trial by Combat
text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge, apply [military] claim instead.
flavor: "The gods know the truth of my innocence. I will have their verdict, not the judgment of men." <cite>Tyrion Lannister</cite>
label: Trial by Combat

name: Raider from Pyke
text: Each Weapon card in your hand gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost.
label: Raider from Pyke (CoW)

name: Iron Mines
text: Interrupt: When a character would be killed, sacrifice Iron Mines to save that character.
flavor: In those days, the ironborn did not work mines,, that was labor for the captives brought back from the hostings.
label: Iron Mines (CoW)

name: Mirri Maz Duur
text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a challenge in which Mirri Maz Duur is attacking alone, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Instead of the normal claim effects, kill that character.
flavor: "The Great Shepherd sent me to earth to heal his lambs, wherever I might find them."
label: Mirri Maz Duur

name: Blood Magic Ritual
text: Interrupt: When a non-Army character would be killed, save it. Then, attach Blood Magic Ritual to that character as a Condition attachment with the text: "Terminal. Treat attached character's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits)."
label: Blood Magic Ritual

name: Knights of the Sun
text: No attachments except Weapon. While there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile, Knights of the Sun gains renown.
label: Knights of the Sun

name: Vengeance for Elia
text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a challenge in which you are the defending player, choose an opponent. That player must satisfy the normal claim effect instead of you as if he or she were the defending player.
label: Vengeance for Elia

name: Street of Steel
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge, kneel your faction card to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Weapon or Item attachment, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Street of Steel

name: The Eyrie
text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel The Eyrie to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be killed.
label: The Eyrie (CoW)

name: Nightmares
text: Action: Choose a character or location. Until the end of the phase, treat that card's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).
flavor: Yet in his nightmare he faced it again...
label: Nightmares

name: Famine
text: Increase the cost for each opponent to marshal each of his or her characters by 1.
label: Famine

name: Septa Mordane
text: While you control: - Sansa Stark, she gets +2 STR and gains renown. - Arya Stark, she gains an [intrigue] icon and "immune to opponents' plot effects."
label: Septa Mordane

name: Ward
text: Character with printed cost 4 or lower only. Terminal. Take control of attached character. Attached character gains the [stark] affiliation.
label: Ward (TS)

name: Butterbumps
text: Insight. Forced Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Butterbumps is participating, discard 1 card at random from your hand.
label: Butterbumps (TS)

name: A Gift of Arbor Red
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to have each player reveal the top 4 cards of his or her deck. Choose 1 card revealed by each player, and add it to that player's hand. Shuffle the other cards back into their owners' decks.
label: A Gift of Arbor Red

name: Sworn Brother
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reduce the cost of the first location you marshal each round by 1.
label: Sworn Brother

name: Old Bear's Raven
text: Attached character gains stealth. If attached character is Old Bear Mormont, he gains an [intrigue] icon.
flavor: "Corn, corn, corn."
label: Old Bear's Raven (TS)

name: Ser Barristan Selmy
text: Renown. Interrupt: When a Lord or Lady character you control would be killed, stand Ser Barristan Selmy to save that character.
flavor: "Your Grace, there is honor in facing an enemy on the battlefield, but none in killing him in his mother's womb. Forgive me, but I must stand with Lord Eddard."
label: Ser Barristan Selmy (TS)

name: City Watch
text: Ambush (6). No attachments except Weapon. While you have more power on your faction card than an opponent, reduce the cost to ambush City Watch by 2.
flavor: "The City Watch is two thousand strong, sworn to defend the castle, the city, and the king's peace." <cite>Eddard Stark</cite>
label: City Watch

name: Ser Ilyn Payne
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Ser Ilyn Payne to choose and kill a character with printed cost 3 or lower.
flavor: Every time she looked at Ser Ilyn Payne, she shivered. He made her feel as though something dead were slithering over her naked skin.
label: Ser Ilyn Payne

name: Small Council Chamber
text: Immune to events. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, Small Council Chamber gains 1 power.
flavor: The chamber was richly furnished. Myrish carpets covered the floor instead of rushes, and in one corner a hundred fabulous beasts cavorted in bright paints on a carved screen from the Summer Isles.
label: Small Council Chamber

name: Dagmer Cleftjaw
text: Renown. Interrupt: When claim is applied for a challenge in which Dagmer Cleftjaw is attacking alone, choose a non-limited location with printed cost 3 or lower controlled by the losing opponent. Instead of the normal claim effects, take control of that location.
label: Dagmer Cleftjaw (TS)

name: Drowned God's Blessing
text: [greyjoy] character only. Attached character gains the Drowned God trait and cannot be chosen as the only target of opponents' events. +1 Initiative.
label: Drowned God's Blessing
