text: Bestow (3). Renown. Ser Garlan Tyrell gets +1 STR for each gold he has. Action: Discard 1 gold from Ser Garlan Tyrell to choose a [tyrell] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR.
label: Ser Garlan Tyrell (OR)

name: Olenna's Machinations
text: Challenges Action: You may initiate an additional [power] challenge this phase. (Max 1 per phase.) Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, pay 1 gold to return Olenna's Machinations from your discard pile to your hand.
label: Olenna's Machinations

name: Defender of the Wall
text: No attachments except Weapon. While Defender of the Wall is defending, it gets +2 STR.
flavor: The wildlings might have a hundred and twenty men, but four defenders would be enough to see them off, with a few well-placed arrows and perhaps a pail of stones.
label: Defender of the Wall

name: Mutiny At Craster's Keep
text: Dominance Action: Choose a character with the highest printed cost among characters you control. Sacrifice that character to choose a character an opponent controls and discard it from play.
label: Mutiny At Craster's Keep

name: Stannis's Cavalry
text: Bestow (8). No attachments. Each character an opponent controls with printed cost X cannot stand during the standing phase. X is the number of gold Stannis's Cavalry has. Standing Action: Move 1 gold from your gold pool to Stannis's Cavalry. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Stannis's Cavalry

name: Northern Encampment
text: Limited. Northern Encampment cannot stand during the standing phase unless you have won dominance this round. Marshaling Action: Kneel Northern Encampment to gain 2 gold.
label: Northern Encampment

name: Kayce Merchant
text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After you collect income, discard 1 gold from Kayce Merchant to gain 2 gold.
label: Kayce Merchant

name: A Task For Every Tool
text: Challenges Action: Put a [lannister] character with printed STR 2 or lower into play from your hand.
label: A Task For Every Tool

name: Nute the Barber
text: Pillage. Reaction: After a character you control discards a card using pillage, return a card from the losing opponent's discard pile to its owner's hand. Then, draw 1 card. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
flavor: "The strong have always taken from the weak."
label: Nute the Barber

name: Iron Victory
text: While you control Victarion Greyjoy, he gets +1 STR for each power he has. Reaction: After a [greyjoy] character is saved, that character gains 1 power. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Iron Victory

name: Irri
text: Bestow (2). Action: Discard 1 gold from Irri to choose and stand a Lord or Lady character. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "It is great honor to please my khaleesi."
label: Irri

name: Overthrowing the Masters
text: Action: During a challenge in which you are the attacking player, choose a defending character with X STR or lower and remove it from the challenge. X is the number of characters in the defending player's dead pile.
label: Overthrowing the Masters

name: The Red Viper
text: Renown. While The Red Viper is attacking, each defending character with fewer than 2 challenge icons does not contribute its STR to the challenge.
label: The Red Viper (OR)

name: Dornish Revenge
text: Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, choose a character controlled by the defending player. That character must be declared as a defender for this challenge, if able. If you win this challenge by 5 or more STR, the losing opponent must choose and kill a defending character.
label: Dornish Revenge

name: Begging Brother
text: Bestow (3). Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered character ability would initiate, discard 1 gold from Begging Brother to cancel those effects.
label: Begging Brother

name: Flea Bottom
text: Challenges Action: Pay 1 gold and kneel Flea Bottom to put a character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your discard pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it on the bottom of your deck.
designer: Card design by 2004 World Champion, Greg Atkinson.
label: Flea Bottom (OR)

name: The Iron Bank Will Have Its Due
text: Action: If it is not the taxation phase, kneel your faction card and return a character to your hand to gain gold equal to that character's printed cost. Until the end of the round, you cannot marshal or put into play any card with the same title as that character.
designer: Card design by 2013 Melee World Champion, Ryan Jones.
label: The Iron Bank Will Have Its Due

name: Wheels Within Wheels
text: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for any number of events and reveal them. Add 1 to your hand, and place the others in your discard pile. Shuffle your deck.
label: Wheels Within Wheels (OR)

name: Sansa's Maid
text: Bestow (3). Each Lady character you control gets +1 STR for each gold Sansa's Maid has.
label: Sansa's Maid

name: Northern Keep
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Northern Keep to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed.)
label: Northern Keep

name: Highgarden Minstrel
text: Reaction: After you play a Song event, gain 1 gold. (Limit 3 times per round.)
flavor: "My lord father always keeps singers at court, sweeter ones than Butters here, and pipers and fiddlers and harpers as well." <cite>Margaery Tyrell</cite>
label: Highgarden Minstrel

name: Horn Hill
text: Bestow (3). Challenges Action: Kneel Horn Hill to give each participating [tyrell] character you control +X STR until the end of the challenge. X is the number of gold Horn Hill has.
label: Horn Hill

name: Donal Noye
text: Bestow (3). No attachments except Weapon. Action: Discard 1 gold from Donal Noye to put a Weapon attachment into play from your hand.
flavor: "The Watch is not what it was. Too few honest men to keep the rogues in line."
label: Donal Noye

name: Ranger's Bow
text: [thenightswatch] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Kneel Ranger's Bow to choose a defending [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.
label: Ranger's Bow

name: Patchface
text: While another Fool character has a keyword, Patchface gains that keyword. While another Fool character has a challenge icon, Patchface gains that challenge icon.
flavor: "Under the sea, the fish eat us. I know, I know, oh, oh, oh."
label: Patchface

name: King's Blood
text: Bastard or King character you control only. Bestow (3). Plot Action: Kneel attached character and sacrifice King's Blood to discard X power from each opponent's faction card. X is the number of gold King's Blood has.
label: King's Blood

name: Genna Frey
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Genna Frey is attacking, if it was the third challenge you initiated this phase, the losing opponent discards 1 card at random from his or her hand. (2 cards instead if you control another attacking House Frey character.)
label: Genna Frey

name: The Goldroad
text: Limited. Challenges Action: Kneel The Goldroad to gain 1 gold. +1 Income.
label: The Goldroad

name: Stony Shore Raider
text: Bestow (3). Action: Discard 1 gold from Stony Shore Raider to choose and kneel a location with printed cost 3 or lower. (Limit once per round.)
label: Stony Shore Raider

name: Pay The Iron Price
text: Challenges Action: Choose an attachment in an opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, pay 1 gold to return Pay The Iron Price from your discard pile to your hand.
label: Pay The Iron Price

name: Freedmen
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, put Freedmen into play from your discard pile.
label: Freedmen

name: Warrior's Braid
text: [targaryen] character only. Attached character gains renown, and gets +1 STR for each bell token on Warrior's Braid. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which attached character is attacking, place a bell token on Warrior's Braid.
label: Warrior's Braid

name: Dornish Spy
text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After Dornish Spy enters play, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice.
label: Dornish Spy

name: Locked Away
text: Terminal. Reaction: After the marshaling phase begins, return attached character to its owner's hand (cannot be saved).
flavor: Hers was a gentle prison.
label: Locked Away

name: Beric Dondarrion
text: Renown. X is the number of kiss tokens Beric Dondarrion has. Forced Reaction: After you marshal Beric Dondarrion, place 6 kiss tokens on him. (Cannot be canceled.) Interrupt: When Beric Dondarrion would be killed, discard a kiss token from him to save him.
designer: Card design by 2014 European Melee Champion, Jakob Hultman.
label: Beric Dondarrion (TBWB)

name: Unbridled Generosity
text: Action: Choose up to 3 cards. Move 1 gold from the treasury to each of those cards.
label: Unbridled Generosity

name: The Brotherhood Without Banners
text: You cannot include loyal characters in your deck. Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, kneel your faction card to choose a neutral character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains (choose one): insight, intimidate, renown, or stealth.
label: The Brotherhood Without Banners

name: Favors From the Crown
text: Reaction: After a card with bestow enters play, place 1 gold from the treasury on that card. (2 gold instead if that card has 3 or more gold on it.)
label: Favors From the Crown

name: Jon Snow
text: Stealth. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Jon Snow is participating, either: stand each attacking Wildling character, or stand each defending [thenightswatch] character. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "There's no shame in fear, my father told me, what matters is how we face it."
label: Jon Snow (WotW)

name: Bowen Marsh
text: During [intrigue] challenges, each Steward character you control gains insight. +1 Reserve.
flavor: "Bowen Marsh? The man counts spoons." <cite>Cotton Pyke</cite>
label: Bowen Marsh (WotW)

name: Old Bear Mormont
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Old Bear Mormont is participating, choose a non-unique character in the losing opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control.
flavor: "When dead men come hunting in the night, do you think it matters who sits on the Iron Throne?"
label: Old Bear Mormont (WotW)

name: Cotter Pyke
text: Stealth. Reaction: After Cotter Pyke bypasses a character using stealth, if there is a Winter plot card revealed, choose a [thenightswatch] character and have it gain stealth until the end of the phase.
label: Cotter Pyke

name: Maester Aemon
text: No attachments except Item. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, choose an opponent and a challenge type that has not been initiated against you this phase. That player must satisfy the claim of that challenge type as if you were the winning opponent.
label: Maester Aemon (WotW)

name: Grizzled Miner
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reduce the cost to marshal Grizzled Miner by 1 for each [thenightswatch] attachment and location you control (to a minimum of 1).
label: Grizzled Miner

name: Ser Denys Mallister
text: While Ser Denys Mallister is defending, he gains renown.
flavor: "So long as the Night's Watch remains in good hands, I am content."
label: Ser Denys Mallister

name: Ser Jaremy Rykker
text: No attachments except Weapon. Each other Ranger character you control gains a [power] icon.
flavor: "No horn was blown, my lord, or my rangers would have heard it. I do not have sufficient men to mount as many patrols as I should like..."
label: Ser Jaremy Rykker

name: Castle Black Mason
text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Kneel 2 Builder characters to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a location or attachment, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit twice per round.)
label: Castle Black Mason

name: Grenn
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Grenn is attacking, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to another attacking [thenightswatch] character. (Up to 2 power instead if that character is standing.)
label: Grenn

name: Pyp
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Pyp is attacking, choose another attacking [thenightswatch] character. That character gains insight until the end of the phase.
label: Pyp

name: Samwell Tarly
text: While Samwell Tarly is participating in a challenge, treat each other participating non-Steward character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
flavor: "The worst isn't done. The worst is just beginning, and there are no happy endings."
label: Samwell Tarly (WotW)

name: Satin
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After Satin is knelt, choose and stand another Steward character. (Limit twice per phase.)
flavor: "The other recruits started out despising him, but he won them over and made friends of them all." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>
label: Satin

name: Lost Ranger
text: No attachments except Weapon. Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you control no other Ranger characters, sacrifice Lost Ranger.
label: Lost Ranger

name: Seasoned Woodsman
text: Reaction: After you attach an attachment to Seasoned Woodsman, either: gain 1 gold, or draw 1 card. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Seasoned Woodsman

name: Builder at the Wall
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Builder at the Wall to reduce the cost of the next [thenightswatch] attachment or location you marshal this phase by 1.
flavor: The order of builders provided the masons and carpenters to repair keeps and towers, the miners to dig tunnels and crush stone for roads and footpaths, the woodsmen to clear away new growth wherever the forest pressed too close to the Wall.
label: Builder at the Wall

name: The New Gift
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel a Steward character to gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.) Challenges Action: Kneel a Steward character to draw 1 card. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: The New Gift

name: Abandoned Stronghold
text: Action: Kneel Abandoned Stronghold to choose a defending character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +X STR. X is the number of Builder characters you control.
label: Abandoned Stronghold (WotW)

name: Queenscrown
text: Action: Kneel Queenscrown to reveal the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck. Choose up to 1 character revealed this way and place it in that player's discard pile. Place the other cards on the bottom of that player's deck in any order.
label: Queenscrown

name: Catapult on the Wall
text: Action: Kneel Catapult on the Wall and attached character to choose and kill an attacking character with STR 4 or lower. Attached character cannot stand during the standing phase this round.
label: Catapult on the Wall

name: Ghost
text: [thenightswatch] or [stark] character only. Interrupt: When attached character would be killed, return Ghost to your hand to save that character.
label: Ghost (WotW)

name: Sworn to the Watch
text: Attached character gains the [thenightswatch] affiliation. While attached character has: - a [military] icon, it gains the Ranger trait. - an [intrigue] icon, it gains the Steward trait. - a [power] icon, it gains the Builder trait.
label: Sworn to the Watch

name: Now My Watch Begins
text: Reaction: After a character with printed cost 5 or lower is placed in an opponent's discard pile, put that character into play under your control.
label: Now My Watch Begins

name: I Shall Win No Glory
text: Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, kneel 3 Builder characters, 3 Ranger characters, or 3 Steward characters to end the challenge immediately with no winner or loser.
label: I Shall Win No Glory

name: Marya Seaworth
text: Reaction: After a character is bypassed using stealth, pay 1 gold to kneel it. (Limit twice per phase.)
flavor: ...it was his own Marya he pictured, a good-natured plump woman with sagging breasts and a kindly smile, the best woman in the world.
label: Marya Seaworth

name: Black Betha
text: While you control Ser Davos Seaworth, he gains renown. Action: Kneel Black Betha to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +X STR. X is the number of kneeling characters the defending player controls.
label: Black Betha

name: Salt Wife
text: Challenges Action: Sacrifice Salt Wife to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as a defender.
flavor: "Those who please their captains may be taken as salt wives, an honorable station." <cite>Victarion Greyjoy</cite>
label: Salt Wife

name: Raiding the Bay of Ice
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, kneel a Warship location to choose a non-limited location controlled by the losing opponent, and place it on top of its owner's deck.
label: Raiding the Bay of Ice

name: Ulf Son of Umar
text: Reaction: After a Clansman character enters play under your control, Ulf Son of Umar gets +X STR until the end of the phase. X is that character's printed STR. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
label: Ulf Son of Umar

name: There Are No Men Like Me
text: Action: Choose a Knight character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not kneel when declared as an attacker or defender in a [military] challenge.
flavor: "There's only me." <cite>Ser Jaime Lannister</cite>
label: There Are No Men Like Me

name: Southron Messenger
text: Ambush (5). Reaction: After Southron Messenger enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons, and return that character to its owner's hand.
label: Southron Messenger

name: Lingering Venom
text: Terminal. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, place a venom token on Lingering Venom. Then, if attached character's STR is equal to or lower than the number of venom tokens on Lingering Venom, kill it.
label: Lingering Venom

name: Jeyne Poole
text: Marshaling Action: Sacrifice Jeyne Poole to return a Lady character from your discard pile to your hand.
flavor: A dozen times Jeyne and Sansa cried out in unison as riders crashed together, lances exploding into splinters while the commons screamed for their favorites.
label: Jeyne Poole

name: Summer
text: Unique [stark] character only. Action: Kneel attached character to have it participate in a [military] challenge on your side. (Limit once per challenge.) Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Summer to a different character. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Summer (WotW)

name: Dothraki Honor Guard
text: No attachments. Dothraki Honor Guard gets -1 STR for each card in your hand.
label: Dothraki Honor Guard

name: Plaza of Pride
text: Action: Kneel Plaza of Pride and discard a card from your hand to choose and stand a character with printed cost X or lower. X is 3 higher than the printed cost of the discarded card.
label: Plaza of Pride

name: Ser Jon Fossoway
text: While Ser Jon Fossoway's STR is 5 or higher, he gains renown.
flavor: "I would gladly take this challenge myself, though I'm not half the swordsman Lord Caron is, or Ser Guyard."
label: Ser Jon Fossoway

name: The Honeywine
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, The Honeywine gains 1 power.
label: The Honeywine

name: Rattleshirt
text: While Rattleshirt is attacking alone, each character without attachments cannot be declared as a defender.
flavor: "I'll boil the flesh off you and make a byrnie from your ribs. I'll carve your teeth to cast me runes, and eat me oaten porridge from your skull."
label: Rattleshirt

name: Dalla
text: Reaction: After a Wildling character enters play under your control, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "We free folk know things you kneelers have forgotten."
label: Dalla

name: Crow Killers
text: Crow Killers does not kneel when declared as an attacker against an opponent whose reserve value is higher than yours.
label: Crow Killers

name: The Frozen Shore
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel The Frozen Shore to choose and stand 1 attacking Wildling character for each Winter plot card revealed.
label: The Frozen Shore

name: Weirwood Bow
text: [thenightswatch] or Wildling character only. Action: Kneel Weirwood Bow to choose a defending character. That character gets -2 STR until the end of the challenge.
label: Weirwood Bow

name: Scaling the Wall
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Wildling character, choose a non-limited location controlled by the losing opponent. Return that location to its owner's hand.
label: Scaling the Wall

name: "The Last of the Giants"
text: Action: Put a neutral character into play from your hand. Until the end of the phase, that character gains intimidate. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it (cannot be saved).
label: "The Last of the Giants"

name: The Fire That Burns
text: Each [thenightswatch] character you control does not kneel when declared as a defender.
label: The Fire That Burns

name: Retaliation
text: If you win initiative, you must choose an opponent to be the first player.
label: Retaliation

name: Whisper Campaign
text: Forced Reaction: After a character without an [intrigue] icon enters play, kneel it.
label: Whisper Campaign

name: Called Into Service
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a character, put it into play. If it is a non-character card, draw it and gain 2 gold.
label: Called Into Service

name: The White Shadows
text: Reaction: After a character an opponent controls is killed, put it into play under your control. While that character is in play, treat its printed text box as if it were blank. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it in its owner's dead pile (cannot be saved).
label: The White Shadows

name: Name Day Tourney
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which a Knight character you control is attacking or defending alone, choose a Lord or Lady character you control and have it gain 1 power.
label: Name Day Tourney

name: Frozen Expanse
text: Each character with STR 2 or lower cannot stand.
label: Frozen Expanse

name: Archmaester's Key
text: Maester character only. Action: Kneel attached character to choose an event in an opponent's discard pile. Once this phase, you may play that event as if it were in your hand. If you do, place it on the bottom of its owner's deck instead of placing it in that player's discard pile.
label: Archmaester's Key

name: Dreadfort Maester
text: Reaction: After you initiate a [military] or [intrigue] challenge, sacrifice Dreadfort Maester to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge.
label: Dreadfort Maester

name: At Night They Howl
text: Challenges Action: Choose and stand any number of Direwolf characters and characters with a Direwolf attachment.
flavor: He remembered how the direwolves had come at him out of the shadows, and suddenly he could see them again, snarling and snapping, teeth bared in his face.
label: At Night They Howl

name: Septa Nysterica
text: Action: Kneel Septa Nysterica to choose an attacking character with STR 4 or lower. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.
flavor: Septa Nysterica had a homely pox-scarred face but seemed jolly.
label: Septa Nysterica

name: Oathkeeper
text: Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR in which attached character is participating, sacrifice Oathkeeper to search your deck for a non-[tyrell] character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Oathkeeper

name: Young Builder
text: Bestow (3). No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After a [thenightswatch] location or attachment enters play under your control, discard 1 gold from Young Builder to draw 1 card.
label: Young Builder

name: "The Rat Cook"
text: Marshaling Action: Choose a character with printed cost X or lower. X is the number of Steward characters you control. Until the end of the round, take control of that character, and treat its printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).
label: "The Rat Cook"

name: Queen's Men
text: Reaction: After you marshal Queen's Men, choose an opponent and look at his or her hand. Then, you may kneel a non-[baratheon] character to choose and discard 1 non-character card from that hand.
flavor: "One realm, one god, one king!"
label: Queen's Men

name: Traitor to the Crown
text: Opponent's character only. Attached character does not contribute its STR to [power] challenges or to its controller's total for dominance.
flavor: "Leave the traitor to the darkness." <cite>Ser Axell Florent</cite>
label: Traitor to the Crown

name: Maester at the Rock
text: Reaction: After you play a [lannister] event, kneel Maester at the Rock to move that event from your discard pile to the top of your deck.
label: Maester at the Rock

name: Ashemark
text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel and sacrifice Ashemark to return each character with printed cost X or lower to its owner's hand. X is the number of gold on Ashemark.
label: Ashemark

name: Acolyte of the Waves
text: Interrupt: When Acolyte of the Waves is killed, gain 1 power for your faction.
flavor: "The god took me deep beneath the waves and drowned the worthless thing I was." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>
label: Acolyte of the Waves

name: Nagga's Ribs
text: For each character in your dead pile, Nagga's Ribs contributes 2 STR to your total for dominance. Reaction: After a character is placed in your discard pile, move it to your dead pile.
label: Nagga's Ribs

name: Daario Naharis
text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Daario Naharis is attacking, choose another Ally, Companion, or Mercenary character. Stand that character and take control of it until the end of the phase.
label: Daario Naharis

name: Bloody Arakh
text: Dothraki character only. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which attached character is attacking, sacrifice Bloody Arakh. Then, you may initiate an additional [military] challenge this phase. (Max 1 per phase.)
label: Bloody Arakh

name: Dorea Sand
text: Reaction: After Dorea Sand enters play, choose another character with printed cost X or lower and return it to its owner's hand. X is the number of Sand Snake characters you control.
flavor: "Dorea stalks about knocking oranges off the trees with her morningstar..." <cite>Doran Martell</cite>
label: Dorea Sand

name: The Water Gardens
text: Action: Kneel The Water Gardens to reduce the cost of the next non-character card you marshal, play, or ambush this phase by X. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile.
flavor: There children frolicked naked in the sun, music played in tiled courtyards, and the air was sharp with the smell of lemons and blood oranges.
label: The Water Gardens

name: Mag the Mighty
text: Renown. No attachments except Weapon. Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Mag the Mighty is participating, choose and kill a character you control. Then, the losing opponent chooses and kills a character he or she controls.
label: Mag the Mighty

name: The Iron Bank
text: Bestow (1). During the marshaling phase, you may spend gold on The Iron Bank as if it were in your gold pool. Reaction: After you collect income, move X gold from the treasury to The Iron Bank. X is the number of gold on The Iron Bank.
label: The Iron Bank (TAK)

name: Valar Dohaeris
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses any number of characters he or she controls with a total printed cost of 10 or lower. Place each character not chosen on the bottom of its owner's deck (cannot be saved).
label: Valar Dohaeris

name: Maege Mormont
text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating House Mormont character, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a [stark] card, draw it.
flavor: "We are stronger than we seem, my lady."
label: Maege Mormont

name: The House of Black and White
text: Bestow (10). Dominance Action: Kneel The House of Black and White and discard X gold from it to choose and kill a character with printed STR X or lower (X cannot be 0). You may move any number of gold from your gold pool to The House of Black and White.
label: The House of Black and White

name: Brightwater Knight
text: Bestow (3). Marshaling Action: Discard 1 gold from Brightwater Knight to reduce the cost of the next Knight character you marshal this phase by 2. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Brightwater Knight

name: Oldtown
text: Action: Kneel Oldtown to name a cardtype (character, location, attachment, or event). Then, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card has that cardtype, draw it and gain 1 power for your faction.
flavor: ...Oldtown was a veritable labyrinth of a city, all wynds and crisscrossing alleys and narrow crookback streets
label: Oldtown

name: Dareon
text: Reaction: After you play a Song event, choose an opponent. Move 1 gold from that player's gold pool to your own. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: Fair-haired and hazel-eyed, the handsome young singer out of Eastwatch looked more like some dark prince than a black brother.
label: Dareon

name: Journey to Oldtown
text: Reaction: After the plot phase begins, choose a character you control. Remove it from the game until the beginning of the next plot phase.
flavor: "Sam, the Night’s Watch has hundreds of men who can loose an arrow, but only a handful who can read or write. I need you to become my new maester." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>
label: Journey to Oldtown

name: Devan Seaworth
text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After you win dominance, discard X gold from Devan Seaworth to search your deck for a non-limited location with printed cost X or lower, reveal it, and put it into play (X cannot be 0). Shuffle your deck.
label: Devan Seaworth

name: Stannis's Wrath
text: Action: Choose and kneel a character without a [power] icon.
flavor: "Say what you will, but say it quickly." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>
label: Stannis's Wrath

name: Black Ears
text: Reaction: After a character is killed, pay 2 gold to put Black Ears into play from your hand.
flavor: Black Ears rode on both sides of him, their grisly necklaces looped about their throats...
label: Black Ears

name: Kingslayer
text: Kingsguard character only. Terminal. Action: Kneel attached character to choose and kill a character with 2 or more power. (Limit once per game.) Forced Interrupt: When attached character leaves play, each opponent gains 2 power for his or her faction.
label: Kingslayer

name: Tris Botley
text: Pillage. Action: Choose a card in an opponent's discard pile and remove it from the game. Until Tris Botley leaves play, that player cannot marshal or play any copy of that card. (Limit once per round.)
label: Tris Botley

name: Black Wind
text: While you control Asha Greyjoy, she gains renown. Reaction: After a character you control discards a location or attachment using pillage, draw 1 card. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Black Wind

name: Stormcrows
text: Bestow (5). Challenges Action: Discard X gold from Stormcrows to choose X characters. Until the end of the phase, each of those characters gets -1 STR. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Stormcrows

name: Consuming Flames
text: Challenges Action: Discard another [targaryen] card from your hand to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -3 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.
label: Consuming Flames

name: Arianne Martell
text: Insight. Challenges Action: Return Arianne Martell to your hand to choose a character with a lower STR than hers, and return it to its owner's hand.
flavor: I want Sunspear, and my father's seat. I want Dorne.
label: Arianne Martell (JtO)

name: Change of Plans
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, if there are fewer than 5 plot cards in your used pile, move a card from your plot deck to the bottom of your used pile.
label: Change of Plans

name: Thoros of Myr
text: Renown. Interrupt: When another non-loyal character you control would be killed, kneel Thoros of Myr and discard 1 power from him to save that character.
label: Thoros of Myr

name: Gates of the Moon
text: Limited. Increase the gold value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1. +2 Income.
label: Gates of the Moon

name: The House With the Red Door
text: After all agendas are announced, search your deck for a non-limited unique location with printed cost 3 or lower and put it into play. That location cannot be discarded from play by card effects. You cannot spend more than 4 gold during setup.
designer: Card design by 2011 Overall World Champion, Corey Faherty.
label: The House With the Red Door

name: Sailing the Summer Sea
text: You may initiate an additional [power] challenge during the challenges phase. You cannot initiate [military] or [intrigue] challenges.
label: Sailing the Summer Sea

name: Ramsay Snow
text: Forced Reaction: After Ramsay Snow enters play, each player sacrifices a character, if able.
flavor: "Lord Bolton, he used to say a naked man has few secrets, but a flayed man's got none."
label: Ramsay Snow

name: The Dreadfort
text: Reaction: After a character you control is sacrificed, kneel The Dreadfort to choose and stand a House Bolton or non-[stark] character.
label: The Dreadfort

name: Ser Hyle Hunt
text: Action: During a challenge in which Ser Hyle Hunt is participating, pay 1 gold to choose a participating character with a lower STR than his. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)
flavor: "His lordship informed me that he had no further need of my sword, or my insolence."
label: Ser Hyle Hunt

name: The Bounty of Highgarden
text: Limited. Action: Gain 5 gold. (Cannot be canceled.)
flavor: And the bounty of Highgarden had come with her, flowing up the roseroad from the south. The fools didn't seem to remember that it had been Mace Tyrell who closed the roseroad to begin with, and made the bloody famine.
label: The Bounty of Highgarden

name: Haunted Forest Scout
text: No attachments except Weapon. Haunted Forest Scout cannot be declared as a defender. While you control 3 or more Ranger characters, Haunted Forest Scout does not kneel when declared as an attacker.
label: Haunted Forest Scout

name: Mole's Town
text: Bestow (4). Challenges Action: Kneel Mole's Town to choose a character without gold. Move 1 gold from Mole's Town to that character. Then, that character cannot be declared as an attacker until the end of the phase.
label: Mole's Town

name: Lyseni Pirate
text: While you control a Warship location, Lyseni Pirate gains stealth. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Lyseni Pirate is attacking, move 1 gold from the losing opponent’s gold pool or a card that player controls to your gold pool.
label: Lyseni Pirate

name: Laughing Lord
text: Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, kneel Laughing Lord to choose an attacking [baratheon] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gains intimidate.
flavor: "Ragged Jenna and Laughing Lord are still playing pirate on the river, I have heard, but who can say if it is so?" <cite>Salladhor Saan</cite>
label: Laughing Lord

name: Raff the Sweetling
text: Pillage. Reaction: After Raff the Sweetling discards a character using pillage, choose a character with printed cost 2 or lower and return it to its owner’s hand.
flavor: And Raff the Sweetling, who'd driven his spear through Lommy's throat, she hated even more.
label: Raff the Sweetling

name: Sparring in Secret
text: Action: Kneel a Knight character to choose and stand another Knight character.
flavor: He liked to believe that he was getting better, but the improvement was slow and not without cost. Underneath his steel and wool and boiled leather Jaime Lannister was a tapestry of cuts and scabs and bruises.
label: Sparring in Secret

name: Asha Greyjoy
text: Pillage. Stealth. Reaction: After Asha Greyjoy discards a card using pillage, search the top X cards of your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. X is the number of cards in the losing opponent's discard pile.
label: Asha Greyjoy (Km)

name: Kingsmoot
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, choose a unique [greyjoy] character you control. That character gains 1 power for each unique [greyjoy] character you control. (Max 1 per round.)
flavor: "In the name of the Drowned God I summon you." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>
label: Kingsmoot

name: Jhiqui
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, discard 1 card from your hand to have a participating Lord or Lady character gain 1 power.
flavor: "It is known."
label: Jhiqui

name: The Skahazadhan
text: Reaction: After you reveal a plot card, kneel The Skahazadhan and discard 1 card from your hand to gain 2 gold. (3 gold instead if that plot card has the Summer trait.)
label: The Skahazadhan

name: Darkstar
text: Stealth. Reaction: After Darkstar bypasses a character using stealth, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.
flavor: "I was weaned on venom, Dalt. Any viper takes a bite of me will rue it."
label: Darkstar (Km)

name: Sand Steed
text: Limit 1 copy per character. Reaction: After a Summer plot card enters your used pile, attached character gains 1 power.
flavor: The sand steeds of Dorne were swift and tireless, and would keep going for long leagues after other horses had given out, but even such as they could not run dry
label: Sand Steed

name: Tom of Sevenstreams
text: Reaction: After you play a Song event, choose and stand a non-loyal character you control. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "Well, as to that, I'm Tom of Sevenstreams, but Tom Sevenstrings is what they call me, or Tom o' Sevens."
label: Tom of Sevenstreams

name: Lem Lemoncloak
text: While you control no loyal characters, Lem Lemoncloak gets +2 STR and gains a [power] icon.
flavor: "What do a bunch o'bloody peasants know about a lord's honor?"
label: Lem Lemoncloak

name: Forgotten By History
text: Dominance Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a character with printed cost X or lower, and shuffle it into its owner's deck. X is the amount of power on the faction card of that character's controller.
label: Forgotten By History

name: The Withering Cold
text: Skip the standing phase this round.
designer: Card design by 2013 North American Champion, Steven Simoni.
label: The Withering Cold

name: Nymeria
text: Intimidate. No attachments. Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating [stark] character, kneel Nymeria and any number of other Direwolf characters to have each of those characters participate in the challenge on your side.
label: Nymeria (FotOG)

name: Favor of the Old Gods
text: Attached character gains the Old Gods trait. Action: If each character, location, and attachment you control has the [stark] affiliation, kneel Favor of the Old Gods to stand attached character.
label: Favor of the Old Gods

name: Hightower Spy
text: Ambush (3). Reaction: After Hightower Spy enters play, choose a character and reveal the top card of your deck. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +X STR. X is the printed cost of the revealed card.
label: Hightower Spy

name: Blessed by the Maiden
text: Character you control only. Attached character gains The Seven trait and "No attachments except Blessing."
label: Blessed by the Maiden

name: Garrison on the Wall
text: No attachments. Reaction: After Garrison on the Wall is declared as a defender, kneel a non-[thenightswatch] character to stand Garrison on the Wall.
label: Garrison on the Wall

name: Obsidian Arrows
text: Bestow (4). Action: While attached character is attacking, move 1 gold from Obsidian Arrows to a defending character to give that character –3 STR until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)
label: Obsidian Arrows

name: Selyse Baratheon
text: Forced Reaction: After you marshal Selyse Baratheon, kneel your faction card. Then, kneel each non-Lady character.
label: Selyse Baratheon (FotOG)

name: Dragonstone Castle
text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel Dragonstone Castle to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot stand.
flavor: The Valyrians had raised it, after all, and all their work stank of sorcery
label: Dragonstone Castle

name: Ser Balon Swann
text: Renown. Reaction: After a non-[lannister] Knight character enters play under your control, gain 2 gold. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Ser Balon Swann

name: Sweet Cersei
text: During the challenges phase, you may spend gold on Sweet Cersei as if it were in your gold pool. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, move 1 gold from the treasury to Sweet Cersei.
label: Sweet Cersei

name: Coastal Reaver
text: Reaction: After Coastal Reaver enters play, choose an opponent. That player chooses a card in his or her hand and places it on top of his or her deck.
label: Coastal Reaver

name: Support of Harlaw
text: Challenges Action: Kneel a Warship location to have attached character gain (choose one): pillage, renown, or stealth until the end of the phase.
flavor: "So long as I have my nuncle of Ten Towers, I have Harlaw." <cite>Asha Greyjoy</cite>
label: Support of Harlaw

name: Wise Master
text: Bestow (3). Action: Discard 1 gold from Wise Master to return an out-of-faction attachment or event from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "We shall see how wise they are." <cite>Daenerys Targaryen</cite>
label: Wise Master

name: Yunkai
text: Bestow (4). Action: During a challenge in which you are the attacking player, kneel Yunkai and discard X gold from it to remove each character with STR X or lower from the challenge (X cannot be 0). Then, if you win the challenge, place 2 gold from the treasury on Yunkai.
label: Yunkai

name: Planky Town Trader
text: Bestow (5). Interrupt: When Planky Town Trader leaves play, put a non-[martell] character with printed cost X or lower into play from your hand. X is the number of gold on Planky Town Trader. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot leave play.
label: Planky Town Trader

name: Shandystone
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel Shandystone to choose and stand a character you control.
flavor: The well at Shandystone had gone dry a hundred years before...the sands had crept back in to reclaim their own.
label: Shandystone

name: Warrior's Sons
text: No attachments. Reaction: After an opponent plays an event during a challenge in which Warrior’s Sons is participating, move 1 power from that opponent’s faction card to Warrior’s Sons.
label: Warrior's Sons (FotOG)

name: Seized by the Guard
text: Non-limited location only. Bestow (4). Terminal. Treat attached location as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). Forced Reaction: After the marshaling phase begins, sacrifice Seized by the Guard unless you discard 1 gold from it.
label: Seized by the Guard

name: Greensight
text: Forced Reaction: After the draw phase begins, reveal the top card of each player's deck. You may kneel your faction card to discard those cards.
flavor: "The greenseers were more than that. They... could wear the skins of any beast that flies or swims or crawls, and could look through the eyes of the weirwoods as well, and see the truth that lies beneath the world." <cite>Jojen Reed</cite>
label: Greensight

name: The King in the North
text: While a player does not control a King character, he or she cannot trigger abilities on characters, locations, or attachments.
designer: Card design by 2015 Joust World Champion, Jakob Hultman.
label: The King in the North (FotOG)

name: Arya Stark
text: While Arya Stark is standing, characters cannot be saved.
flavor: "I don’t wear gowns. You can't fight in a stupid gown."
label: Arya Stark (TFM)

name: I Am No One
text: Action: Choose a character you control with printed cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character loses all faction affiliations and Traits, gains insight and stealth, and does not kneel when declared as an attacker.
label: I Am No One (TFM)

name: Highgarden Refugee
text: While there is a Summer plot card revealed, reduce the cost to marshal Highgarden Refugee by 1.
label: Highgarden Refugee

name: Arbor Queen
text: Action: Kneel Arbor Queen to choose a [tyrell] character and a non-[tyrell] character. Until the end of the phase, each of those characters gets +2 STR.
flavor: Five times as large as Blackbird and magnificent to behold, she had three great burgundy sails and banks of oars that flashed gold and white in the sunlight.
label: Arbor Queen

name: Coldhands
text: Coldhands cannot be saved. Reaction: After you marshal Coldhands, choose 1 other non-Army character controlled by each player. Remove each of those characters from the game until Coldhands leaves play.
designer: Card design by 2011 Joust World Champion, Brett Zeiler.
label: Coldhands

name: The Bay of Seals
text: Action: Kneel The Bay of Seals to choose and stand a character owned by an opponent.
flavor: Its waters were grey and green and choppy, and the wooded shore they followed was a snarl of rocks and whirlpools.
label: The Bay of Seals

name: King's Men
text: Reaction: After a phase begins, choose a kneeling character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). (Limit once per round.)
label: King's Men

name: Sacrificed to the Red God
text: Play only if you control a R'hllor character. Marshaling Action: Sacrifice a character to search your deck for a R'hllor character with equal or lower printed cost and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Sacrificed to the Red God

name: Cersei's Informer
text: Bestow (3). Action: Move 1 gold from Cersei's Informer to a non-Spy card you control to draw 1 card. Then, choose and discard 1 card from your hand. (Limit once per round.)
label: Cersei's Informer

name: Ser Pounce
text: Unique character with printed cost 3 or lower only. Ambush (1). Attached character gains an [intrigue] icon and does not kneel when declared as an attacker in an [intrigue] challenge.
label: Ser Pounce

name: Tarle the Thrice-Drowned
text: You may marshal non-unique Drowned God characters from your dead pile as if they were in your hand.
flavor: ...who had once been thought so holy that he was picked to crown a king.
label: Tarle the Thrice-Drowned (TFM)

name: Given to the Drowned God
text: Action: Kill a Drowned God character to draw X cards. X is that character's printed cost.
flavor: "He must be given to the god. The old way." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>
label: Given to the Drowned God

name: Daenerys Targaryen
text: Daenerys Targaryen's STR cannot be reduced by card effects. Reaction: After you play a [targaryen] event, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 STR and is killed if its STR is 0. (Limit 3 times per round.)
label: Daenerys Targaryen (TFM)

name: Mhysa
text: Lady character only. During the first [power] challenge you initiate each round, attached character does not kneel when declared as an attacker and gets +1 STR for each attacking character.
label: Mhysa

name: House Yronwood Knight
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which House Yronwood Knight is participating, discard 1 card at random from the winning opponent's hand.
flavor: The Yronwoods might declare for Quentyn, but alone they were no threat.
label: House Yronwood Knight

name: Secret Pact
text: Non-[martell] character only. Ambush (3). Attached character gains renown. Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker in challenges against you.
label: Secret Pact

name: The High Sparrow
text: Each player cannot gain more than 7 gold each round. Each player cannot draw more than 3 cards each round.
flavor: "The Faith Militant reborn...that would be the answer to three hundred years of prayer, Your Grace."
label: The High Sparrow

name: "The Song of the Seven"
text: Reaction: After you lose dominance, move 2 power from the winning opponent's faction card to a The Seven character you control. (Max 1 per phase.)
flavor: The Seven Gods who made us all, are listening if we should call. So close your eyes, you shall not fall, they see you, little children.
label: "The Song of the Seven"

name: The Faith Militant
text: Non-The Seven characters and locations you control cannot gain power. Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel your faction card to move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to a participating The Seven character you control.
label: The Faith Militant

name: Compelled by the Faith
text: When Revealed: Move each power from each card in play to its controller's faction card.
label: Compelled by the Faith

name: Host of the Riverlands
text: Bestow (3). No attachments. Reaction: After a House Tully character you control gains power, discard 1 gold from Host of the Riverlands to have that character gain 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Host of the Riverlands

name: Godswood
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, if there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, kneel Godswood to draw X cards. X is the claim value on your revealed plot card.
flavor: There was something wild about a godswood,, even here, in the heart of the castle at the heart of the city, you could feel the old gods watching with a thousand unseen eyes.
label: Godswood

name: Mace Tyrell
text: Reaction: After Mace Tyrell is knelt, draw 2 cards. Then, choose a card in your hand and place it on top of your deck. +1 Income.
label: Mace Tyrell (SAT)

name: This Must Be Answered Fiercely!
text: Reaction: After 3 or more characters are declared as attackers in a challenge against you, search your deck for a [tyrell] character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
label: This Must Be Answered Fiercely!

name: Septon Cellador
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Septon Cellador to choose an opponent. That player must choose and discard a character from his or her hand unless he or she reveals a hand containing no characters.
flavor: Septon Cellador was half drunk as usual...
label: Septon Cellador

name: The Crow is a Tricksy Bird
text: Plot Action: Kneel your faction card to choose an opponent and look at his or her plot deck. Choose 1 plot in that deck. That player must reveal that plot as his or her next plot card, if able.
designer: Card design by 2014 Joust World Champion, Sam Braatz.
label: The Crow is a Tricksy Bird

name: The Bastard of Nightsong
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge in which The Bastard of Nightsong is participating, move 1 power from the losing opponent’s faction card to your own.
flavor: The Bastard of Nightsong had commanded the rearguard that allowed Stannis to reach the safety of Salladhor Saan's galleys, but he worshiped the Warrior with a faith as fierce as he was.
label: The Bastard of Nightsong

name: King at the Wall
text: Unique [baratheon] character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge in which attached character is participating, draw 1 card for each out-of-faction location you control.
label: King at the Wall

name: Qyburn
text: Reaction: After a character is killed, kneel Qyburn to draw 2 cards. Then, choose and discard 1 card from your hand.
flavor: "The Citadel took my chain, but they could not take my knowledge."
label: Qyburn (SAT)

name: A Plot Against The Queen
text: Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge, return a character with 1 or more power to your hand to choose a participating character with 1 or more power and return it to its owner’s hand.
label: A Plot Against The Queen

name: Saltcliffe Sailor
text: Bestow (3). Each character you control with 1 or more gold gains stealth. Action: Move 1 gold from Saltcliffe Sailor to a non-[greyjoy] character you control.
label: Saltcliffe Sailor

name: Driftwood Cudgel
text: Drowned God character only. Attached character gets +1 STR for each character in your dead pile. Interrupt: When attached character is killed, move Driftwood Cudgel to another eligible character. That character gains 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Driftwood Cudgel

name: Raiding Khalasar
text: No attachments. Pillage. While Raiding Khalasar is attacking, if you control an attacking Bloodrider character, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.
label: Raiding Khalasar

name: To Go Forward You Must Go Back
text: Dominance Action: Each player may shuffle his or her hand (of at least 1 card) into his or her deck. Each player that does draws 5 cards.
label: To Go Forward You Must Go Back

name: Host of the Boneway
text: Intimidate. No attachments. Host of the Boneway gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile.
label: Host of the Boneway

name: Someone Always Tells
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event or triggered plot ability would initiate, cancel those effects.
flavor: It was not supposed to end this way. This was not supposed to happen.
label: Someone Always Tells

name: Mya Stone
text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] or [intrigue] challenge in which you are the defending player, kneel Mya Stone to apply [power] claim instead.
flavor: "Men come and go. They lie, or die, or leave you. A mountain is not a man, though, and a stone is a mountain’s daughter. I trust my father, and I trust my mules. I won’t fall."
label: Mya Stone

name: The Great Sept of Baelor
text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After a character enters play, kneel The Great Sept of Baelor and discard 1 gold from it to treat that character’s printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits) until the end of the round.
label: The Great Sept of Baelor

name: The Seven-Pointed Star
text: Attached character gains The Seven trait. Marshaling Action: Kneel attached character to reduce the cost of the next The Seven card you marshal this phase by 2.
label: The Seven-Pointed Star

name: You Win Or You Die
text: When Revealed: Draw 2 cards.
label: You Win Or You Die

name: Mace Tyrell
text: Reaction: After a [tyrell] character enters play under your control, pay 1 gold to have Mace Tyrell gain 1 power. (Limit once per phase.) Action: Kneel your faction card to remove another [tyrell] character you control from the game until the beginning of the next phase.
label: Mace Tyrell (HoT)

name: Brienne of Tarth
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Brienne of Tarth is participating, if her STR is: - 6 or higher, she gains 1 power. - 10 or higher, choose another character. It gets +3 STR until the end of the phase. - 15 or higher, stand her and draw 1 card.
label: Brienne of Tarth (HoT)

name: Ser Garlan Tyrell
text: Action: During a challenge in which a Knight character you control is attacking alone, discard 1 card from your hand to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)
flavor: "A valiant deed unsung is no less valiant."
label: Ser Garlan Tyrell (HoT)

name: The Queen of Thorns
text: Insight. Reaction: After The Queen of Thorns is knelt, discard an event from your hand to search your deck for an event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "All these kings would do a deal better if they would put down their swords and listen to their mothers."
label: The Queen of Thorns (HoT)

name: Highgarden Honor Guard
text: Ambush (6). No attachments. Reduce the cost to ambush Highgarden Honor Guard by 1 for each The Reach location you control.
label: Highgarden Honor Guard

name: Margaery Tyrell
text: While Margaery Tyrell is attacking, she gets +1 STR for each defending character. Reaction: After Margaery Tyrell is declared as an attacker, choose and kneel a character controlled by the defending player. That character is participating in the challenge as a defender.
designer: Card design by 2011 European Melee Champion, Gregoire Lefebvre.
label: Margaery Tyrell (HoT)

name: The Knight of Flowers
text: Renown. Reaction: After you play an event, The Knight of Flowers gets +2 STR until the end of the phase.
flavor: "Most deserve to be forgotten. The heroes will always be remembered. The best."
label: The Knight of Flowers (HoT)

name: Willas Tyrell
text: Action: Kneel Willas Tyrell. Then, if you control: - Margaery Tyrell, stand her. - The Knight of Flowers, he gains insight until the end of the phase. - Ser Garlan Tyrell, he gains renown until the end of the phase.
label: Willas Tyrell (HoT)

name: Garth the Gross
text: While you control another [tyrell] Lord character, Garth the Gross gains a [military] icon and renown. While you control a [tyrell] Lady character, Garth the Gross gains an [intrigue] icon and gets +2 STR.
flavor: "Garth has served me well as Lord Seneschal, as he served my father before me." <cite>Mace Tyrell</cite>
label: Garth the Gross

name: The Blue Bard
text: Interrupt: When the Blue Bard leaves play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for any number of Song events, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "As a boy, I was called Wat. A fine name for a plowboy, less fitting for a singer."
label: The Blue Bard

name: Emissary of the Hightower
text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After Emissary of the Hightower enters play, choose an event in your discard pile. Until the end of the phase, you may play that event as if it were in your hand. If you do, remove it from the game instead of placing it into your discard pile.
label: Emissary of the Hightower

name: Green-Apple Knight
text: Green-Apple Knight gets +1 STR for each other Knight character you control. While you control 2 or more other Knight characters, Green-Apple Knight does not kneel when declared as an attacker.
label: Green-Apple Knight

name: Desmera Redwyne
text: Reaction: After a character is removed from a challenge, pay 1 gold to give that character +2 STR or -1 STR until the end of the phase.
flavor: "Redwyne has a nicely dowered daughter..." <cite>Daven Lannister</cite>
label: Desmera Redwyne

name: Maester Ballabar
text: Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating character, kneel Maester Ballabar to choose a character with the lowest STR among participating characters. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.
label: Maester Ballabar

name: Highgarden Courtier
text: Reaction: After another character’s STR is increased by a card effect, kneel Highgarden Courtier to stand that character. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Highgarden Courtier

name: Jousting Knight
text: Jousting Knight does not contribute its STR to a challenge unless it is attacking or defending alone.
flavor: Other riders Sansa did not know,, hedge knights from the Fingers and Highgarden and the mountains of Dorne, unsung freeriders and new-made squires...
label: Jousting Knight

name: The Hightower
text: Reaction: After a [tyrell] character enters play under your control, gain 1 gold and draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: From where it stood atop the bluffs of Battle Island, its shadow cut the city like a sword.
label: The Hightower

name: Redwyne Straits
text: Limited. +2 Income.
label: Redwyne Straits

name: Jousting Pavilion
text: Each Knight character you control gets +1 STR while attacking or defending alone.
flavor: The jousting went all day and into the dusk, the hooves of the great warhorses pounding down the lists until the field was a ragged wasteland of torn earth.
label: Jousting Pavilion

name: Queen of the Seven Kingdoms
text: Lady character only. Attached character gains the Queen trait. Action Stand attached character and remove it from the challenge to choose a participating character. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Queen of the Seven Kingdoms

name: Tourney Lance
text: Knight character only. Attached character gets +1 STR. While attached character is attacking alone, the defending player cannot declare more than 1 character as a defender.
label: Tourney Lance

name: Melee at Bitterbridge
text: Action: Choose X participating characters. Each character with the highest STR among those characters gains renown until the end of the challenge. Each other chosen character does not contribute its STR to the challenge.
label: Melee at Bitterbridge

name: "Six Maids in a Pool"
text: Action: Draw 1 card for each Lady character you control.
flavor: Six maids there were in a spring-fed pool...
label: "Six Maids in a Pool"

name: Hidden Thorns
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, the losing opponent chooses and discards 2 cards from his or her hand. Then, if you control The Queen of Thorns, return Hidden Thorns to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Hidden Thorns

name: River Runner
text: While River Runner is attacking, each character with power cannot be declared as a defender.
flavor: "Use every smuggler's trick you know, the black sails, the hidden coves, whatever it requires." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>
label: River Runner

name: Bend the Knee
text: Play only if you control a standing King character. Action: Choose and kneel a Lord or Lady character.
flavor: "No man has ever died from bending his knee." <cite>Balon Greyjoy</cite>
label: Bend the Knee

name: Drowned God's Apostle
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, kill Drowned God's Apostle to put a non-unique [greyjoy] character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your dead pile.
label: Drowned God's Apostle

name: Corpse Lake
text: Reaction: After a character is discarded from an opponent's deck, Corpse Lake gains 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)
label: Corpse Lake

name: The Hound
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After The Hound enters play, choose a Knight character without attachments and return it to its owner's hand.
flavor: "I am no knight. I spit on them and their vows."
label: The Hound (HoT)

name: Lion's Tooth
text: Unique [lannister] character only. Ambush (2). Attached character gets +1 STR. Action: During a challenge in which attached character is participating, sacrifice Lion’s Tooth to choose a participating character with printed cost 3 or lower and return it to its owner’s hand.
label: Lion's Tooth

name: The Bastard of Godsgrace
text: Renown. Challenges Action: Discard 1 power from The Bastard of Godsgrace to reduce the cost of the next card you play or ambush this phase by 2.
label: The Bastard of Godsgrace

name: Hellholt
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge by 5 or more STR, Hellholt gains 1 power.
flavor: "Half of the Ullers are half-mad, the saying went, and the other half are worse."
label: Hellholt

name: Small Paul
text: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When Small Paul is killed, search the top X cards of your deck for any number of Steward characters, reveal them, and add them to your hand. X is your reserve value. Shuffle your deck.
label: Small Paul

name: Broken Vows
text: Marshaling Action: Give control of a [thenightswatch] character you control to an opponent. Then, take control of a non-loyal character that player controls with a lower printed cost.
label: Broken Vows

name: Ser Dontos Hollard
text: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When a Lady character would be killed or discarded from play, stand Ser Dontos Hollard to save that character.
flavor: "... all those years I was a knight, I was truly a fool, and now that I am a fool I think... I think I may find it in me to be a knight again..."
label: Ser Dontos Hollard

name: Last Hearth
text: Action: Kneel Last Hearth to give a participating [stark] character +2 STR until the end of the challenge. (+3 STR instead if there are fewer than 3 plot cards in your used pile.)
label: Last Hearth

name: Qotho
text: Action: Discard 2 [targaryen] cards from your hand to put Qotho into play from your hand.
flavor: Qotho was ever the cruelest of the bloodriders.
label: Qotho (HoT)

name: Tokar
text: [targaryen] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR for each attachment it has. While attached character is participating in a challenge, each character without attachments cannot gain power.
label: Tokar

name: Archmaester Ebrose
text: Action: Kneel a Maester character to choose and stand another Maester character. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "Morn will be upon us sooner than we'd like, and Archmaester Ebrose will be speaking on the properties of urine. Those who mean to forge a silver link would do well not to miss his talk." <cite>Armen the Acolyte</cite>
label: Archmaester Ebrose

name: Faceless Man
text: Ambush (4). Challenges Action: Choose a character in a dead pile. Until the end of the phase, Faceless Man gains each of that character's printed challenge icons, keywords, faction affiliations, and Traits. (Limit once per phase.)
designer: Card design by 2013 Overall World Champion, Ryan Jones.
label: Faceless Man

name: Citadel Novice
text: Reaction: After Citadel Novice is knelt, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an attachment or a Maester character, draw it. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: He had only been at the Citadel for a year, yet already he had forged three links of his maester's chain.
label: Citadel Novice

name: The Citadel
text: Action: Kneel The Citadel to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Maester character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "There are so many books at the Citadel that no man can hope to read them all." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>
label: The Citadel

name: Strangler
text: Terminal. While attached character is participating in a challenge, set its STR to 1. (Other modifiers do not raise or lower its STR.)
flavor: Dissolved in wine, it would make the muscles of a man's throat clench tighter than any fist.
label: Strangler

name: Words Are Wind
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, that opponent must choose, either: cancel those effects, or you draw 2 cards.
flavor: "I put more trust in deeds." <cite>Daenerys Targaryen</cite>
label: Words Are Wind

name: The Conclave
text: Your deck may include non-loyal Maester characters from any faction. Your deck must include at least 12 Maester characters. Before placing setup cards, place the top 7 cards of your deck facedown under this agenda. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating Maester character, choose 1 card under this agenda and switch it with the top card of your deck.
label: The Conclave

name: Wardens of the South
text: Reaction: After a [tyrell] character you control is declared as an attacker or defender, that character gets +2 STR until the end of the challenge.
label: Wardens of the South

name: Besieged
text: At least one character must be declared as a defender in each challenge, if able.
label: Besieged

name: Your King Commands It
text: Each non-King, non-Queen character cannot gain power.
label: Your King Commands It

name: The Spider's Web
text: Reaction: After claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge you won, you may initiate an additional [intrigue] challenge this phase. Until the end of the phase, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during [intrigue] challenges. (Limit once per phase.)
label: The Spider's Web

name: Now It Comes To War
text: Forced Interrupt: When claim is applied for an [intrigue] or [power] challenge, the attacking player may choose to apply [military] claim instead.
label: Now It Comes To War

name: Trade Routes
text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. Gain 1 gold for each location you control and each location that opponent controls.
label: Trade Routes (HoT)

name: Nothing Burns Like The Cold
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses an attachment and a non-limited location he or she controls, if able, and discards each of those cards from play (cannot be saved).
label: Nothing Burns Like The Cold

name: Doran Martell
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons and remove it from the challenge. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains or loses a challenge icon of your choice.
label: Doran Martell (SoD)

name: Ellaria Sand
text: Reaction: After Ellaria Sand is declared as an attacker, choose up to 3 characters controlled by the defending player. Each of those characters must be declared as a defender for this challenge, if able.
flavor: "Is that how it goes, round and round forever? I ask again, where does it end?"
label: Ellaria Sand (SoD)

name: The Red Viper
text: Intimidate. The Red Viper gets +1 STR for each power he has. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Bastard character, The Red Viper gains 1 power.
label: The Red Viper (SoD)

name: Darkstar
text: Intimidate. Action: During a challenge in which Darkstar is attacking, sacrifice him to return each participating character to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Men call me Darkstar, and I am of the night."
label: Darkstar (SoD)

name: Obara Sand
text: Challenges Action: Return a Sand Snake character to your hand to put a [martell] character with lower printed cost into play from your hand. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "He pointed to the spear, then to my mother's tears, and I picked up the spear."
label: Obara Sand (SoD)

name: Areo Hotah
text: Ambush (6). Reduce the cost to ambush Areo Hotah by 1 for each plot in your used pile. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Areo Hotah is defending, return him to your hand to raise the claim value on your revealed plot by 1 until the end of the phase.
label: Areo Hotah (SoD)

name: Nymeria Sand
text: Reaction: After you lose dominance, discard 1 card at random from the winning opponent's hand and draw 1 card.
flavor: "No more should you doubt this, my prince - my sisters and I shall not wait ten-and-seven years for our vengeance."
label: Nymeria Sand (SoD)

name: Tyene Sand
text: Stealth. Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel a Sand Snake character to put Tyene Sand into play from your hand.
flavor: Her soft, pale hands were as deadly as Obara's callused ones, if not more so.
label: Tyene Sand (SoD)

name: Nymeria's Guard
text: No attachments. Challenges Action: Pay 4 gold and stand a Sand Snake character to put Nymeria's Guard into play from your hand.
label: Nymeria's Guard

name: Obella Sand
text: Reaction: After Obella Sand is discarded for [intrigue] claim or killed for [military] claim, move 1 power from the winning opponent's faction card to your own. Shuffle Obella Sand from your discard or dead pile into your deck.
label: Obella Sand

name: Quentyn Martell
text: Renown. Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, if there are fewer than 3 plot cards in your used pile, kneel Quentyn Martell.
flavor: "Your brother Quentyn has a harder road to walk." <cite>Doran Martell</cite>
label: Quentyn Martell (SoD)

name: Ser Cletus Yronwood
text: No attachments except Weapon. Increase the initiative value on your revealed plot card by 1 for each plot card in your used pile.
flavor: "Give your bride a kiss for me."
label: Ser Cletus Yronwood

name: Loreza Sand
text: Interrupt: When a unique [martell] character you control is killed, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "Loreza is six, Dorea eight. What wars could they foment?" <cite>Arianne Martell</cite>
label: Loreza Sand

name: Maester Kedry
text: Action: Kneel Maester Kedry to reduce the gold cost of the next event you play this phase by 2.
flavor: "Heed his counsel. He has devoted half his life to the study of the Nine Free Cities." <cite>Doran Martell</cite>
label: Maester Kedry

name: House Dayne Escort
text: While there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile, you may marshal House Dayne Escort from your discard pile as if it were in your hand.
label: House Dayne Escort

name: Shadow City Bastard
text: Ambush (3). Challenges Action: Sacrifice Shadow City Bastard to choose a character with printed cost 5 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that characters loses a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon.
label: Shadow City Bastard

name: Dorne
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand, and place the other on the bottom of your deck. +1 Reserve.
label: Dorne (SoD)

name: Starfall
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Starfall to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice.
label: Starfall

name: Hotah's Axe
text: Attached character gets +3 STR. Reaction: After a [martell] character enters play during the challenges phase, put Hotah's Axe into play from your hand, attached to that character.
label: Hotah's Axe

name: Patience
text: Character you control only. Challenges Action: Return attached character to its owner's hand.
flavor: "You mistake patience for forbearance. I have worked at the downfall of Tywin Lannister since the day they told me of Elia and her children." <cite>Doran Martell</cite>
label: Patience

name: Beguiled
text: Terminal. Challenges Action: Kneel Beguiled to have attached character lose a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.
label: Beguiled

name: No Use For Grief
text: Play only if a [martell] character was killed under your control this round. Action: Search your deck for a Sand Snake character with printed cost 3 or lower, put it into play, and shuffle your deck. (Printed cost 6 or lower instead if The Red Viper is in your dead pile.)
label: No Use For Grief

name: False Plans
text: Challenges Action: Choose an opponent. That player discards 1 card at random from his or her hand. Reaction: After False Plans is discarded for [intrigue] claim, the winning opponent discards 2 cards at random from his or her hand.
label: False Plans

name: To The Spears!
text: Play only if there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile. Challenges Action: Each [martell] character you control does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the next challenge you initiate this phase.
label: To The Spears!

name: Ser Cortnay Penrose
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge in which Ser Cortnay Penrose is participating, stand him.
flavor: "Is it the justice of your cause you doubt, my lord, or the strength of your arm? Are you afraid I'll piss on your burning sword and put it out?"
label: Ser Cortnay Penrose

name: Sea Dragon Tower
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Sea Dragon Tower to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a [power] icon.
label: Sea Dragon Tower

name: Fleet From Pyke
text: No attachments. Pillage. Reaction: After a character you control discards a location or attachment using pillage, Fleet From Pyke gains a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.
label: Fleet From Pyke

name: Plundered
text: Opponent's location only. Terminal. Reaction: After attached location's controller loses a challenge as the defending player, kneel attached location. Then, you may sacrifice Plundered to gain 3 gold.
label: Plundered

name: Myrcella Baratheon
text: Myrcella Baratheon does not kneel when declared as an attacker against an opponent with fewer cards in his or her hand than you.
flavor: "She is so pretty, don't you think? I wish that I had curls like hers. She was made to be queen, just like her mother." <cite>Tyene Sand</cite>
label: Myrcella Baratheon (SoD)

name: Extortion
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge as the attacking player, gain 3 gold and return up to 3 gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to the treasury.
label: Extortion

name: Spare Boot
text: Challenges Action: Choose an attachment attached to a character you control. Stand that attachment and move it to Spare Boot. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "The bloody buggers got my leg... My wooden one!"
label: Spare Boot

name: Turncloak
text: Non-loyal character only. Terminal. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, take control of attached character. (Any player may initiate this ability.)
label: Turncloak

name: Greatjon Umber
text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which Greatjon Umber is attacking, if there are fewer than 3 plot cards in your used pile, stand him.
flavor: "Grey Wind ate two of his fingers, and he laughed about it." <cite>Robb Stark</cite>
label: Greatjon Umber

name: Taste For Flesh
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Direwolf character or an attacking character with a Direwolf attachment, choose and kill a defending character.
label: Taste For Flesh

name: Missandei
text: Interrupt: When Missandei is discarded from your hand or deck, put her into play instead of placing her in your discard pile.
flavor: The little scribe with the big golden eyes was wise beyond her years.
label: Missandei

name: Qarth
text: Action: Kneel Qarth and pay 1 gold to choose an attachment attached to a card you control and discard it from play.
flavor: "Qarth is the greatest city that ever was or ever will be." <cite>Pyat Pree</cite>
label: Qarth

name: Leyton Hightower
text: Action: Kneel Leyton Hightower to put a non-limited [tyrell] card with printed cost 4 or lower into play from your hand knelt.
flavor: ... Lord Leyton had not made the descent in more than a decade, preferring to rule his city from the clouds.
label: Leyton Hightower

name: Beacon of the South
text: [tyrell] character only. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR in which attached character is attacking, it gains 1 power.
label: Beacon of the South

name: Val
text: Reaction: After Val is declared as an attacker, put a Wildling character with printed cost 4 or lower into play from your hand knelt, participating as an attacker.
flavor: "I know the forest better than all your black-cloaked rangers. It holds no ghosts for me."
label: Val

name: Septon Meribald
text: Action: Kneel Septon Meribald to choose and stand up to 3 characters with printed STR 1 or lower. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: Meribald was a septon without a sept, only one step up from a begging brother in the hierarchy of the Faith.
label: Septon Meribald

name: Oldtown Scholar
text: Reaction: After an opponent draws 1 or more cards, if it is not the draw phase, kneel Oldtown Scholar to draw that many cards.
flavor: "Wise men may grow arrogant in their wisdom, but a maester must always remain humble." <cite>Armen the Acolyte</cite>
label: Oldtown Scholar

name: Jade Sea Dromond
text: Limited. Dominance Action: Kneel and sacrifice Jade Sea Dromond to choose a non-limited location with printed cost 3 or lower and discard it from play. +1 Income.
label: Jade Sea Dromond

name: Brother's Robes
text: The Seven character only. Reaction: After attached character is knelt, choose a location or attachment. Until the end of the phase, treat that card as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
label: Brother's Robes

name: "Off To Gulltown"
text: Challenges Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon. Draw 1 card.
label: "Off To Gulltown"

name: The Wars To Come
text: Your plot deck must be exactly 10 cards. You may include a second copy of up to 2 different cards in your plot deck.
designer: Card design by 2014 European Joust Champion, Donovan van Beek.
label: The Wars To Come (SoD)

name: At Prince Doran's Behest
text: When Revealed: Choose and reveal a new plot card. (Cannot be canceled.)
label: At Prince Doran's Behest

name: Peace and Prosperity
