text: Reduce the cost of the first character you marshal this round by 3, the first location your marshal this round by 2, and the first attachment you marshal this round by 1.
label: Peace and Prosperity

name: Forced March
text: When Revealed: Each opponent kneels 1 character he or she controls with a [military] icon. Then, you may kneel a character with a [military] icon to initiate this effect again.
label: Forced March (SoD)

name: Beyond Reproach
text: When Revealed: Each player sacrifices each attachment that is attached to a character he or she does not control.
label: Beyond Reproach

name: Breaking Ties
text: Action: Sacrifice a loyal character to choose a non-loyal character or location and return it to its owner's hand. (Limit twice per round.)
designer: Card design by 2016 European Melee Champion, Luiz Gustavo Bretas.
label: Breaking Ties (SoD)

name: Grand Melee
text: Each character that is attacking or defending alone does not contribute its STR to the challenge.
label: Grand Melee

name: False Spring
text: When Revealed: Each opponent chooses and reveals 3 cards from his or her hand, if able. You may choose and discard 1 revealed card from any number of those hands.
label: False Spring

name: Varamyr Sixskins
text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, until the end of the phase, Varamyr Sixskins gains (choose one): - the Bear trait and gets +5 STR. - the Eagle trait, an [intrigue] icon, and insight. - the Cat trait, a [power] icon, and stealth. - the Wolf trait and intimidate, and gets +2 STR.
label: Varamyr Sixskins

name: Bolton Flayer
text: Shadow (2). Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, choose and kill a character with the lowest printed cost (cannot be saved).
label: Bolton Flayer

name: Northern Armory
text: Northern Armory cannot stand. Action: Kneel Northern Armory to choose and stand a [stark] character. +1 Income.
label: Northern Armory

name: Scheming Septon
text: Shadow (2). Challenges Action: Draw 1 card and gain 2 gold. Then, place Scheming Septon on top of your deck. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Scheming Septon

name: Margaery's Influence
text: Terminal. Action: While attached character is participating in a challenge, kneel Margaery's Influence and pay 1 gold to stand attached character and remove it from the challenge.
label: Margaery's Influence

name: Janos Slynt
text: Shadow (0). Forced Reaction: After Janos Slynt comes out of shadows, sacrifice a [thenightswatch] character.
flavor: "I will not go meekly off to freeze and die. No traitor's bastard gives commands to Janos Slynt!"
label: Janos Slynt (TSC)

name: Fresh Recruits
text: Action: Search your deck for a Ranger character, a Builder character, and a Steward character, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Fresh Recruits

name: Shadow Priestess
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Shadow Priestess comes out of shadows, choose and kneel a character without attachments.
label: Shadow Priestess

name: Stormlands Fiefdom
text: Action: Kneel Stormlands Fiefdom to move 1 power from a character or location to its owner's faction card. +1 Income.
label: Stormlands Fiefdom

name: Ser Robert Strong
text: Shadow (5). Reaction: After Ser Robert Strong comes out of shadows, choose and kill a kneeling character with printed cost 5 or lower.
label: Ser Robert Strong

name: Beneath the Bridge of Dream
text: Shadow (0). Interrupt: When you choose a plot card to reveal in the plot phase, instead shuffle your used pile into your plot deck and choose a plot card to reveal at random. Until the end of the round, increase the gold value on your revealed plot card by 2.
label: Beneath the Bridge of Dream

name: Nighttime Marauders
text: Pillage. Shadow (3). Reaction: After Nighttime Marauders comes out of shadows, choose a card in an opponent's discard pile. That player reveals his or her hand and discards from it each card with the same printed cost as the chosen card.
label: Nighttime Marauders (TSC)

name: Seize the Initiative
text: X is the number of opponents you have. Interrupt: When the marshaling phase ends, you become the first player.
label: Seize the Initiative

name: Aegon Targaryen
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Aegon Targaryen enters play, search your deck for an Army or Mercenary character, put it into play, and shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.
label: Aegon Targaryen (TSC)

name: Unexpected Return
text: Challenges Action: Choose a character in your discard pile and put it into play.
flavor: "He is here. Aegon has been shaped for rule since before he could walk." <cite>Varys</cite>
label: Unexpected Return

name: Ser Gerris Drinkwater
text: Renown. Shadow (5). Reaction: After Ser Gerris Drinkwater comes out of shadows, choose a card in your plot deck and switch it with a card in your used pile.
label: Ser Gerris Drinkwater

name: The Shadow City
text: Shadow (2). Reduce the cost to marshal each of your cards into shadows by 1. Challenges Action: Kneel The Shadow City and discard 1 card from shadows to draw 2 cards.
label: The Shadow City

name: Nefarious Acolyte
text: Shadow (2). Action: Kneel Nefarious Acolyte and pay 1 gold to choose a plot card. Until the end of the phase, treat it as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
label: Nefarious Acolyte

name: Burning the Dead
text: Action: Remove each non-unique character in each player's dead pile from the game. Draw 1 card.
flavor: Before midday a dozen fires were burning. Columns of greasy black smoke rose up to stain a merciless blue sky.
label: Burning the Dead

name: Exchange of Information
text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent and reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. That opponent chooses 1 character, 1 location, 1 attachment, and 1 event revealed this way, if able, and adds them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Exchange of Information

name: Wyman Manderly
text: Action: Sacrifice a character. Reaction: After 1 or more characters you control are sacrificed or killed, stand Wyman Manderly and draw 1 card. (Limit 3 times per round.)
flavor: "The best pie you have ever tasted, my lords... Wash it down with Arbor gold and savor every bite. I know I shall."
label: Wyman Manderly (TMoW)

name: Honor-Bound
text: During [military] challenges, attached character gets +2 STR. Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender in [intrigue] challenges.
label: Honor-Bound

name: The Queen of Thorns
text: Shadow (4). Stealth. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Queen of Thorns is participating, choose a card you control in shadows and put it into play.
flavor: "At Highgarden we have many spiders amongst the flowers. So long as they keep to themselves we let them spin their little webs, but if they get underfoot we step on them."
label: The Queen of Thorns (TMoW)

name: Oldtown Undercity
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand, place 1 on the bottom of your deck, and place the other on top of your deck. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Oldtown Undercity

name: Cunning Steward
text: Shadow (3). While you are the defending player, Cunning Steward gains a [military] and a [power] icon.
label: Cunning Steward

name: The Wall
text: Each character you control gains the [thenightswatch] affiliation and loses all other faction affiliations. Action: Kneel The Wall to choose an opponent. Put an eligible character of that player’s choice from his or her discard pile into play under your control.
label: The Wall (TMoW)

name: Ser Justin Massey
text: While you control a King character, Ser Justin Massey gains renown. Reaction: After a [baratheon] character gains power, stand it. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "Feel free to perish as you wish, Humfrey... Myself, I would sooner live to see another spring."
label: Ser Justin Massey

name: March on Winterfell
text: Play only during a challenge you initiated. Action: End the challenge with no winner or loser. You may initiate an additional [power] challenge this phase.
flavor: A trail of broken wayns and frozen corpses stretched back behind them, buried beneath the blowing snows.
label: March on Winterfell

name: Penny
text: Shadow (1). While you control more cards in shadows than each opponent, Penny gains an [intrigue] icon and stealth.
label: Penny

name: Bowels of Casterly Rock
text: Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, either: gain 2 gold, or draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "They say there is naught but stone at the heart of Casterly Rock." <cite>Catelyn Stark</cite>
label: Bowels of Casterly Rock

name: Hagen's Daughter
text: Shadow (2). Interrupt: When Hagen’s Daughter would be killed, save her and return her to shadows.
flavor: When he fell, Hagen's daughter stumbled to her knees, snatched up his sword, stabbed the second man, then rose again, smeared with blood and mud, her long red hair unbound, and plunged into the fight.
label: Hagen's Daughter

name: "Steel Rain"
text: Shadow (2). Action: Sacrifice any number of [greyjoy] locations. For each location sacrificed, search your deck for a different [greyjoy] location with equal or lower printed cost and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
label: "Steel Rain"

name: Hizdahr zo Loraq
text: Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to reduce the cost of the next card you marshal, ambush, or bring out of shadows this phase by 3. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "One day all men must die, but it serves no good to dwell on death. I prefer to take each day as it comes."
label: Hizdahr zo Loraq (TMoW)

name: Meereen
text: Action: Kneel Meereen to place each card in your hand facedown under Meereen and draw 3 cards. At the end of the phase, or if Meereen leaves play, discard your hand and return each card you placed under Meereen to your hand.
flavor: Meereen would always be the Harpy's city...
label: Meereen (TMoW)

name: Maiden of Poisons
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Maiden of Poisons is participating, sacrifice it to choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons and return it to its owner’s hand.
label: Maiden of Poisons

name: Serve. Obey. Protect.
text: Play only if you have lost a challenge as the defending player this phase. Reaction: After an opponent initiates a challenge against you, return a [martell] character to your hand to put a different [martell] character with printed cost 5 or lower into play from your hand.
label: Serve. Obey. Protect.

name: Tycho Nestoris
text: You cannot win the game. Action: Pay 6 gold to treat Tycho Nestoris’s printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits) until the end of the phase. +3 Income.
label: Tycho Nestoris

name: City Gates
text: Limited. Action: Pay 1 gold and discard City Gates from your hand to draw 1 card. +1 Income.
label: City Gates

name: Trading With Qohor
text: While you control no attachments, increase the gold value on each opponent’s revealed plot card by 1. Reaction: After claim is applied for a challenge you won, sacrifice an attachment to search your deck for a different attachment with equal or lower printed cost and put it into play.
designer: Card design by 2016 European Joust Champion, Florian Maas.
label: Trading With Qohor

name: The Bloody Flux
text: Characters cannot be saved.
label: The Bloody Flux

name: Umber Loyalist
text: Reaction: After Umber Loyalist enters play, draw 2 cards. Forced Interrupt: When Umber Loyalist leaves play, choose and discard 2 cards from your hand.
label: Umber Loyalist

name: White Harbor
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. The losing opponent chooses 1 of those cards. Add that card to your hand, and place the other on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: If Winterfell was the heart of the north, White Harbor was its mouth.
label: White Harbor

name: Lazy Leo
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Lazy Leo comes out of shadows, choose a player. Shuffle any number of events from that player's discard pile into his or her deck.
label: Lazy Leo

name: Growing Ambition
text: Shadow (X). Challenges Action: Search your deck for X different cards and place them in your discard pile. Shuffle your deck. Then, choose an opponent. Return X cards of that opponent's choice from your discard pile to your hand.
label: Growing Ambition

name: Naive Scout
text: No attachments except Weapon. While there is a card in shadows, Naive Scout cannot be declared as a defender.
label: Naive Scout

name: Miner's Pick
text: Builder or Steward character only. Attached character gets +1 STR. +1 Income.
label: Miner's Pick

name: Valyrian's Crew
text: Stealth. You may marshal or play facedown cards attached to Valyrian's Crew as if they were in your hand. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Valyrian's Crew is attacking, attach the top card of the losing opponent's deck to Valyrian's Crew facedown under your control, as an attachment with terminal.
label: Valyrian's Crew

name: Blackwater Bay
text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, kneel Blackwater Bay to choose an opponent. Draw 1 card for each kneeling character that player controls.
flavor: Blackwater Bay was rough and choppy, whitecaps everywhere.
label: Blackwater Bay

name: Catspaw
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Catspaw comes out of shadows, pay X gold to choose another character with printed cost X or lower and return it to its owner's hand.
label: Catspaw

name: Gold Mine
text: Action: Kneel Gold Mine and discard 1 card from your hand to draw 1 card. +1 Income.
label: Gold Mine

name: Drowned God Fanatic
text: Action: Kill a character to put Drowned God Fanatic into play from your dead pile. (Max once per round.) Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered character ability would initiate, place Drowned God Fanatic into your dead pile from your hand to cancel those effects.
designer: Card design by 2013 European Melee champion, Vincent Teulé.
label: Drowned God Fanatic (SoKL)

name: Dragonbinder
text: Character you control only. Attached character gains intimidate. Reaction: After you win dominance, kill attached character to, either: choose and take control of a Dragon character, or search the top 10 cards of your deck for a [greyjoy] character, put into play, and shuffle your deck.
label: Dragonbinder

name: Hired Assassin
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Hired Assassin comes out of shadows, look at a card in shadows. If it is a character, you may place it in its owner's dead pile.
label: Hired Assassin

name: Queensguard
text: Non-Lady character only. Shadow (2). Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to stand attached character. (Limit 3 times per round.)
flavor: Ser Barristan might come seeking her,, he was the first of her Queensguard, sworn to defend her life with his own.
label: Queensguard

name: Ser Archibald Yronwood
text: Shadow (4). No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you lose dominance, the winning opponent must choose and kill a character he or she controls.
flavor: "I am always prepared to fight."
label: Ser Archibald Yronwood

name: Summer Sea Port
text: +1 Income. +1 Reserve.
flavor: ...the mouth of the Greenblood, where the orphans of the river came to trade with the carracks, cogs, and galleys from across the narrow sea.
label: Summer Sea Port

name: Poor Fellows
text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Poor Fellows is attacking, the losing opponent chooses, either: Poor Fellows gains 1 power, or you draw 1 card.
flavor: The High Sparrow's ragged army.
label: Poor Fellows

name: King's Landing
text: Once per marshaling phase, you may marshal a location from your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Challenges Action: Kneel King's Landing and discard 1 location from your hand to draw 1 card.
label: King's Landing (SoKL)

name: Glass Candle
text: Character you control only. If attached character has the Maester trait, it gains insight. Challenges Action: Kneel Glass Candle to look at the top card of any player's deck. You may discard that card.
label: Glass Candle

name: Uneasy Truce
text: Each player cannot gain power for his or her faction except during challenges. Forced Reaction: After a challenge is initiated, move 1 power from the attacking player's faction card to the defending player's faction card.
label: Uneasy Truce

name: Meera Reed
text: Shadow (1). Stealth. Reaction: After a [stark] character you control is sacrificed, return Meera Reed to shadows. Reaction: After Meera Reed comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, treat it as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
designer: Card design by 2010 Castle Stahleck Champion, Andrea Gualdoni.
label: Meera Reed (MoD)

name: Shaggydog
text: [stark] character you control only. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is attacking, the losing opponent must choose and kill a defending character. Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Shaggydog to a different character. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Shaggydog (MoD)

name: Ser Mark Mullendore
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Mark Mullendore is participating, reveal the top card of your deck. You may put that card into play. If you do, place Ser Mark Mullendore on top of your deck (cannot be saved).
flavor: Ser Mark Mullendore brought a black-and-white monkey and fed him morsels from his own plate...
label: Ser Mark Mullendore

name: Bonds of Chivalry
text: Action: Choose a participating Knight character you control. Stand it and remove it from the challenge. Then, you may kneel another Knight character you control to have it participate in the challenge on your side.
label: Bonds of Chivalry

name: Jon Snow
text: While you control a: - Builder character, Jon Snow gains stealth. - Ranger character, Jon Snow gains intimidate. - Steward character, Jon Snow gains insight.
flavor: "I am lord commander because my brothers chose me."
label: Jon Snow (MoD)

name: Lord Commander
text: [thenightswatch] character with printed cost 5 or higher only. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating [thenightswatch] character, attached character gains 1 power.
label: Lord Commander

name: Shireen Baratheon
text: Shadow (3). Action: During a challenge in which Shireen Baratheon is participating, choose a participating character. That character and Shireen Baratheon do not contribute their STR to the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)
label: Shireen Baratheon (MoD)

name: Privileged Position
text: Play only if you have not lost a [power] challenge this round. Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event or triggered location ability would initiate, cancel those effects.
label: Privileged Position

name: Tithe Collector
text: Reaction: After you collect income, pay 2 gold to have Tithe Collector gain 1 power. +1 Income.
label: Tithe Collector

name: Clever Feint
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to choose any number of cards you control with shadow. Return each of those cards to shadows.
label: Clever Feint

name: Victarion Greyjoy
text: Challenges Action: Kneel a Warship location to (choose 1): - choose and kneel a location. - stand Victarion Greyjoy. - have Victarion Greyjoy gain renown until the end of the challenge.
label: Victarion Greyjoy (MoD)

name: Grey Ghost
text: Shadow (2). Action: Kneel Grey Ghost to choose 1 character (up to 2 characters instead if Grey Ghost came out of shadows this phase). Until the end of the phase, each chosen character cannot be declared as a defender.
label: Grey Ghost

name: Rhaegal
text: Ambush (5). No attachments. Reaction: After an opponent's character is killed by a card effect, stand Rhaegal.
flavor: Thus far the green dragon had shown himself to be more dangerous than the white.
label: Rhaegal (MoD)

name: Meereenese Market
text: Action: Kneel Meereenese Market to choose a card in a discard pile and place it on the bottom of its owner's deck. +1 Income.
label: Meereenese Market

name: House Manwoody Guard
text: While you are not the first player, each Guard character you control does not kneel when declared as a defender.
label: House Manwoody Guard

name: A Mission in Essos
text: Shadow (2). Action: Remove all but the bottom card of your deck from the game facedown. Then, shuffle your discard pile into your deck and draw 3 cards.
label: A Mission in Essos (MoD)

name: Wun Wun
text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Kneel Wun Wun to have him participate in a challenge in which you control a participating Wildling character.
flavor: This giant ate no meat at all, though he was a holy terror when served a basket of roots, crunching onions and turnips and even raw hard neeps between his big square teeth.
label: Wun Wun

name: Poisoned Coin
text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which you control an attacking character with shadow, place a poison token on a character without shadow controlled by the losing opponent. At the end of the phase, if that character still has that poison token, remove it and kill that character. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Poisoned Coin

name: The Free Folk
text: Your plot deck and draw deck can only include neutral cards. Reaction: After claim is applied for a challenge in which you control an attacking Wildling character, kneel your faction card to apply the claim of another challenge type.
label: The Free Folk (MoD)

name: Winter Reserves
text: While Winter Reserves is in your used pile, increase the gold value and reserve value on your revealed Winter plot card by 1.
label: Winter Reserves

name: Bear Island Scout
text: Reaction: After you marshal Bear Island Scout, if each character you control has the [stark] affiliation, search your deck for a House Mormont card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Bear Island Scout (IDP)

name: Skagos
text: Shadow (1). Action: Kneel Skagos and sacrifice a standing [stark] card to search your deck for a card with the same title as the sacrificed card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
label: Skagos (IDP)

name: Brightwater Host
text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Brightwater Host is attacking, choose 1 card in shadows and return it to its owner's hand. Then, a unique [tyrell] character you control gains 2 power.
label: Brightwater Host

name: The Might of the Reach
text: Challenges Action: Choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +10 STR.
label: The Might of the Reach

name: Three-Finger Hobb
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you check reserve, if your hand size is lower than your reserve value, draw 2 cards.
flavor: That night, Three-Finger Hobb cooked the boys a special meal to mark the occasion.
label: Three-Finger Hobb (IDP)

name: Hardhome
text: Shadow (2). Dominance Action: Kneel and sacrifice Hardhome to choose an opponent. That player sacrifices a standing character.
flavor: Hardhome had been halfway toward becoming a town, the only true town north of the Wall, until the night six hundred years ago when hell had swallowed it.
label: Hardhome

name: Storm's End Maester
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Storm's End Maester to choose an opponent. If you have more power on your faction card than that player, draw 1 card.
label: Storm's End Maester

name: Glamor
text: Character you control only. Shadow (2). Terminal. Attached character gets +2 STR. Action: Kill attached character to choose another character in your dead pile that was killed this phase. Return the chosen character to play.
label: Glamor

name: Painted Dogs
text: Ambush (4). Challenges Action: Return Painted Dogs to your hand to choose and stand a Clansman character or Tyrion Lannister.
label: Painted Dogs

name: Walk of Atonement
text: Dominance Action: Discard any amount of power from a character you control. For each power discarded, discard 1 card at random from each opponent's hand and draw 1 card.
flavor: I am not afraid. I am a lioness.
label: Walk of Atonement

name: Iron Victory's Crew
text: No attachments. Reaction: After Iron Victory's Crew enters play, search your deck for a Warship location, reveal it, and add it to your hand (put it into play instead if it is Iron Victory). Shuffle your deck.
label: Iron Victory's Crew

name: Refurbished Hulk
text: +1 Income. +1 Initiative.
flavor: She would need that long to make repairs,, the stroms had left her little more than a hulk.
label: Refurbished Hulk

name: Drogon
text: Ambush (6). No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Drogon is attacking, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.
label: Drogon (IDP)

name: In Daznak's Pit
text: Shadow (3). Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, stand each character. Following this phase, there is an additional challenges phase. (Max 1 per round.)
label: In Daznak's Pit

name: Maester Myles
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Maester Myles to choose a character with printed cost equal to or lower than the number of plot cards in your used pile. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice.
label: Maester Myles

name: He Calls It Thinking
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's non-agenda, non-plot triggered ability would initiate, cancel those effects unless that player pays 1 gold.
flavor: "My father is very good at doing nothing." <cite>Arianne Martell</cite>
label: He Calls It Thinking

name: Old Bill Bone
text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After Old Bill Bone comes out of shadows, kneel each opponent's faction card.
flavor: "Some say that herons are majestic... If your king eats frogs while standing on one leg."
label: Old Bill Bone

name: The Inn at the Crossroads
text: Shadow (1). Dominance Action: Kneel The Inn at the Crossroads to draw 3 cards and choose an opponent. Give control of The Inn at the Crossroads to that player.
label: The Inn at the Crossroads

name: A Pinch of Powder
text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] or [power] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, return attached character to its owner's hand.
designer: Card design by 2008 Joust World Champion, Lucas Reed.
label: A Pinch of Powder

name: Double-Dealing
text: Plot Action: Choose a plot card in an opponent's used pile. Double-Dealing gains that plot card's printed text box (except for Traits) until you reveal a new plot card. (Limit once per round.)
label: Double-Dealing

name: Ser Jason Mallister
text: While there are no cards in shadows, Ser Jason Mallister gains renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Jason Mallister is attacking, choose a card in shadows controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it.
label: Ser Jason Mallister

name: The Bastard's Letter
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After an opponent initiates a [military] challenge against you, stand any number of characters you control with a [military] icon. If you win the challenge, kill each attacking character.
label: The Bastard's Letter

name: Shrewd Diplomat
text: Ambush (5). Shadow (3). Reaction: After Shrewd Diplomat enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.
label: Shrewd Diplomat

name: Arbor Marketplace
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Arbor Marketplace to choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR. +1 Income.
label: Arbor Marketplace

name: Nightfort Builder
text: Reaction: After Nightfort Builder is knelt, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a [thenightswatch] location or attachment, draw it.
flavor: ...Othell Yarwyck and his builders were still off trying to restore the Nightfort.
label: Nightfort Builder

name: Daggers in the Dark
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, choose and kill an attacking character. The attacking player may sacrifice 2 characters to cancel this effect.
label: Daggers in the Dark

name: Red Ronnet
text: No attachments except Weapon. While Red Ronnet is attacking, if the defending player controls a card in shadows, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.
flavor: "I am no traitor."
label: Red Ronnet

name: Banished from the Light
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, choose a character. Place it in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.
label: Banished from the Light

name: Cersei Lannister
text: Shadow (5). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows during the challenges phase, each opponent discards 1 card at random from his or her hand. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
flavor: "The only way to keep your people loyal is to make certain they fear you more than they do the enemy."
label: Cersei Lannister (DitD)

name: Underhanded Methods
text: Shadow (0). Attached character gets +1 STR for each card you control in shadows.
label: Underhanded Methods

name: Moqorro
text: Shadow (5). Reaction: After Moqorro comes out of shadows during a challenge, choose a defending character and place it on top of its owner's deck.
flavor: "There are no gods but R'hllor and the Other, whose name must not be said."
label: Moqorro (DitD)

name: Rhymes With Meek
text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, draw 2 cards (3 cards instead if you played this event from shadows).
label: Rhymes With Meek

name: Brazen Beast
text: No attachments. Shadow (3). Marshaling Action: Pay 3 gold to put Brazen Beast into shadows from your discard pile.
flavor: They walked the streets both day and night, in dark hoods and brazen masks.
label: Brazen Beast

name: Gifts for the Widow
text: Action: Search your deck for an attachment with printed cost X or lower and put it into play attached to a character you control. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "Gloves for my poor old wrinkled hands. How nice." <cite>The Widow of the Waterfront</cite>
label: Gifts for the Widow (DitD)

name: Starfall Spy
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Starfall Spy is participating, return it to shadows to choose another card you control in shadows and put it into play.
label: Starfall Spy

name: Blood of the Viper
text: Sand Snake character only. Ambush (2). Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which attached character is participating, stand it.
label: Blood of the Viper

name: "On a Misty Morn"
text: Action: Choose up to 2 non-unique characters in your dead pile and return them to your hand.
flavor: Oh, have you seen my boy, good ser? His hair is chestnut brown He promised he'd come back to me Our home's in Wendish Town.
label: "On a Misty Morn"

name: Assault from the Shadows
text: Reduce the gold value on your revealed plot card by 1. Marshaling Action: Kneel your faction card to choose 1 card in your hand and place it facedown in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, if it does not have the printed shadow keyword, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.
designer: Card design by 2015 European Joust champion, Jesús Valdés Gaspar.
label: Assault from the Shadows

name: Varys
text: Shadow (8). Stealth. Reduce the cost to bring Varys out of shadows by 1 for each other card in shadows. Reaction: After Varys comes out of shadows, choose and kill a character with power.
flavor: "This was not done from malice. It was for the realm. For the children."
label: Varys (DitD)

name: Ravages of War
text: When Revealed: Each player sacrifices a character or location, chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand, and chooses and discards 1 card from his or her shadows area, if able.
label: Ravages of War

name: Balon Greyjoy
text: Pillage. Renown. Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a card in an opponent's discard pile and put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, shuffle it into its owner's deck.
label: Balon Greyjoy (KotI)

name: Euron Crow's Eye
text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you marshal Euron Crow's Eye, search your hand, deck, and discard pile for Silence and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "You serve one god, Damphair, but I have served ten thousand. From Ib to Asshai, when men see my sails, they pray."
label: Euron Crow's Eye (KotI)

name: Asha Greyjoy
text: Pillage. Stealth. Each other unique Ironborn character you control gains stealth.
flavor: "If there are rocks to starboard and a storm to port, a wise captain steers a third course."
label: Asha Greyjoy (KotI)

name: The Knight
text: No attachments except Weapon. While The Knight is attacking alone, he gains stealth and renown.
flavor: "The Knight took Grimston by himself. He planted his standard beneath the castle and defied the Grimms to face him. One did, and then another, and another. He slew them all..." <cite>Hotho Harlaw</cite>
label: The Knight (KotI)

name: Aeron Damphair
text: Insight. Reaction: After another Drowned God character you control is killed, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "Mine is the strength of the sea, a strength the Crow's Eye cannot hope to withstand."
label: Aeron Damphair (KotI)

name: The Drumm
text: While The Drumm is attacking in a [military] or [power] challenge, each character with an [intrigue] icon cannot be declared as a defender.
flavor: "Where is it written that our king must be a kraken?"
label: The Drumm

name: Gwynesse Harlaw
text: Action: Choose 3 cards in an opponent's discard pile and place them on the bottom of his or her deck in any order. Then, gain 1 gold and draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: Long years had passed since then, but still the widow lingered, grieving, and muttering from time to time that the castle should be hers.
label: Gwynesse Harlaw

name: Andrik the Unsmiling
text: Pillage. Reaction: After Andrik the Unsmiling discards a card using pillage, choose a non-limited location or attachment in the losing opponent's discard pile. Discard 1 copy of that card from play.
label: Andrik the Unsmiling

name: Qarl the Maid
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Qarl the Maid is participating, either: stand a Warship location, or stand Asha Greyjoy.
flavor: Qarl stood over him, with his long-sword dripping and moonlight shining in his eyes.
label: Qarl the Maid

name: Maester Murenmure
text: Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered location ability would initiate, kneel Maester Murenmure to cancel those effects.
flavor: "Pray all you wish... It does not change the laws."
label: Maester Murenmure

name: Old Grey Gull
text: Action: Kneel Old Grey Gull to kill another [greyjoy] character you control. Then, you may return that character from your dead pile to your hand.
flavor: "...even the Old Grey Gull has left that rock he lives on to preach this kingsmoot all across Harlaw." <cite>The Reader</cite>
label: Old Grey Gull

name: Priest of Old Wyk
text: While there is a Drowned God character in your dead pile, Priest of Old Wyk contributes its STR to your total for dominance even while kneeling.
label: Priest of Old Wyk

name: Drowned Prophet
text: Interrupt: When Drowned Prophet is killed, search the top 5 cards of your deck for a [greyjoy] character and place it in your dead pile. Shuffle your deck.
label: Drowned Prophet

name: Eager Deckhand
text: Reaction: After a Warship location enters play under your control, put Eager Deckhand into play from your hand.
label: Eager Deckhand

name: Orkmont Reaver
text: Pillage. While an opponent has 10 or more cards in his or her discard pile, Orkmont Reaver gains stealth.
label: Orkmont Reaver

name: Silence
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Silence to put a Warship location into play from your hand. Then, if you control Euron Crow's Eye, stand him. +2 Initiative.
label: Silence (KotI)

name: Great Wyk
text: Reaction: After a character enters play from your dead pile, each opponent chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: Great Wyk was the largest of the Iron Islands, so vast that some of its lords had holdings that did not front upon the holy sea.
label: Great Wyk

name: Golden Storm
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge as the attacking player, kneel Golden Storm to choose and kill a participating character. Then, if you control a participating Raider character, stand Golden Storm.
label: Golden Storm

name: Maiden's Bane
text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Maiden's Bane to choose and stand an attacking character. Then, if that character is a Captain, stand Maiden's Bane.
label: Maiden's Bane

name: Scouting Vessel
text: Interrupt: When a character you control discards a card using pillage, kneel and sacrifice Scouting Vessel to discard 3 cards instead.
label: Scouting Vessel

name: Red Rain
text: Unique [greyjoy] character only. If attached character is The Drumm, he gains stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which attached character is attacking, it gains 2 power. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Red Rain

name: Fleet Captain
text: Attached character gains the Captain trait and gets +1 STR. (+3 STR instead if you control 3 or more Warship locations.)
label: Fleet Captain

name: What Is Dead May Never Die
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, choose a [greyjoy] character in your dead pile and put it into play.
label: What Is Dead May Never Die

name: Nighttime Raid
text: Action: Choose up to 3 characters with pillage and/or the Raider trait. Until the end of the phase, each of those characters gains stealth.
label: Nighttime Raid

name: Khorane Sathmantes
text: Action: Kneel Khorane Sathmantes and a Warship location to choose and kneel 1 character and 1 location.
flavor: "This was well done, Khorane. You will be having a fine reward, I am thinking." <cite>Salladhor Saan</cite>
label: Khorane Sathmantes

name: Fury
text: While you control Stannis Baratheon, he gains intimidate. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, kneel Fury to choose a character or location. Move 1 power from that card to your faction card.
label: Fury

name: Gunthor Son of Gurn
text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Gunthor Son of Gurn is attacking, the losing opponent must choose and discard 1 card from his or her hand.
flavor: "The gold of a lowland lord is as worthless as a half man's promises"
label: Gunthor Son of Gurn

name: My Mind Is My Weapon
text: Action: During a [military] challenge, choose a character you control with an [intrigue] icon and have it participate in the challenge on your side.
flavor: "...and a mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge."
label: My Mind Is My Weapon

name: Desert Raider
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, put Desert Raider into play from your dead pile and choose a character controlled by the winning opponent. That character gains 1 power. Until the end of the phase, that character loses an [intrigue] or [power] icon and Desert Raider gains that icon.
designer: Card design by 2012 European Melee Champion, Istvan Cserdi.
label: Desert Raider (KotI)

name: The Bloodroyal
text: [martell] character only. While you are not the first player, attached character gains stealth and renown.
flavor: The most powerful of the Dornish lords was Anders Yronwood, the Bloodroyal...
label: The Bloodroyal

name: Vindictive Ranger
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, Vindictive Ranger gains stealth and a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.
label: Vindictive Ranger

name: Westwatch-by-the-Bridge
text: Action: Kneel Westwatch-by-the-Bridge to choose and stand another [thenightswatch] location with printed cost 1 or lower. (Printed cost 4 or lower instead if you control a Ranger character, a Steward character, and a Builder character.)
label: Westwatch-by-the-Bridge

name: Maester Vyman
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] or [power] challenge, kneel Maester Vyman to choose another character that shares a Trait with him. That character gains 1 power.
flavor: "My lady, is there aught I might do for you?"
label: Maester Vyman

name: Karhold
text: While a player does not have a Winter plot card revealed, characters and locations he or she controls cannot gain power.
flavor: "Karhold is with me, that is all the men need know." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>
label: Karhold

name: Cohollo
text: Intimidate. Action: Kneel Cohollo and discard 1 card from your hand to have him participate in a challenge on your side.
flavor: And old Cohollo - Cohollo who had bound his life to Drogo's on the day of his birth, Cohollo who had always been kind to her - Cohollo spat full in her face.
label: Cohollo

name: "Dance of the Dragons"
text: Action: Choose a non-event card with printed cost 3 or lower in your discard pile and return it to your hand.
flavor: A haunting ballad of two dying lovers amidst the Doom of Valyria might have pleased the hall more if Collio had not sung it in High Valyrian, which most of the guests could not speak.
label: "Dance of the Dragons"

name: Ser Talbert Serry
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After an opponent triggers a location ability, Ser Talbert Serry gets +2 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
flavor: Young Serry had been different. A brave man, thought Victarion. Almost ironborn.
label: Ser Talbert Serry

name: The Shield Islands
text: Increase the number of cards each player draws in the draw phase by 1.
flavor: Though the men of the Shield Islands called themselves sailors, they crossed the seas in dread and went lightly clad in battle for fear of drowning.
label: The Shield Islands

name: Bronze Yohn Royce
text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Bronze Yohn Royce is defending, kneel a neutral location with printed cost 1 or higher to stand him. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Bronze Yohn Royce

name: Rogue Wildling
text: Ambush (5). Reaction: After Rogue Wildling enters play, choose and stand a Wildling character you control.
label: Rogue Wildling

name: Citadel Archivist
text: Reaction: After Citadel Archivist enters your discard pile, each player shuffles his or her discard pile into his or her deck.
label: Citadel Archivist

name: The Starry Sept
text: Action: Move 1 power from The Starry Sept to a character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, The Starry Sept gains 1 power.
label: The Starry Sept

name: Reckless
text: Terminal. Attached character must be declared as an attacker or defender in each challenge, if able.
label: Reckless

name: When I Woke...
text: Reaction: After a player loses a [military] challenge, that player chooses a participating character and places it on top of its owner's deck. (Max 1 per challenge.)
designer: Card design by 2008 Melee World Champion, Tzu-Mainn Chen.
label: When I Woke...

name: Sea of Blood
text: During [military] challenges, reduce the cost of each event you play by 1 for each blood token on Sea of Blood. You cannot play events during [intrigue] or [power] challenges. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to place a blood token on Sea of Blood. Then, search your deck for an event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Sea of Blood (KotI)

name: We Take Westeros!
text: When Revealed: Choose a location in a discard pile and put it into play under your control.
label: We Take Westeros! (KotI)

name: Return to the Fields
text: When Revealed: You may sacrifice up to 3 characters. For each character sacrificed this way, draw 1 card and gain 1 gold.
label: Return to the Fields (KotI)

name: Heir to the Iron Throne
text: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Lord or Lady character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. Then, sacrifice a Lord or Lady character.
label: Heir to the Iron Throne

name: Coordinated Attack
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, choose a different challenge type. You may initiate an additional challenge of the chosen type this phase. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Coordinated Attack

name: Stolen Message
text: Each opponent plays with the top card of his or her deck revealed. Action: Pay 1 gold to place the top card of an opponent's deck on the bottom of that player's deck. (Limit 3 times per round.)
label: Stolen Message

name: Secrets of the Conclave
text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand, discard 1, and put the others back on top of your deck in any order.
label: Secrets of the Conclave

name: Vanquish the Unbelievers
text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, choose a Trait. Kill each character you control that does not have that Trait (cannot be saved).
label: Vanquish the Unbelievers

name: Alysane Mormont
text: No attachments except Weapon. While each character you control has the [stark] affiliation, Alysane Mormont gains stealth during [military] challenges and does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge.
flavor: "Mormont women are skinchangers. We turn into bears and find mates in the woods. Everyone knows."
label: Alysane Mormont

name: Old Gate
text: Limited. Challenges Action: If each character you control has the [stark] affiliation, sacrifice Old Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.
label: Old Gate

name: The Knight of Flowers
text: Shadow (5). Renown. Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, choose and stand a Kingsguard character. (Limit twice per round.)
flavor: "When the sun has set, no candle can replace it."
label: The Knight of Flowers (AtG)

name: Gate of the Gods
text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you control a character with the highest STR in play, sacrifice Gate of the Gods to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.
label: Gate of the Gods

name: Aged Craftsman
text: No attachments. Reaction: After Aged Craftsman enters play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a [thenightswatch] location with printed cost 2 or lower and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
label: Aged Craftsman

name: Flea Bottom Alley
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel and sacrifice Flea Bottom Alley to put a [thenightswatch] character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand. Then, draw 1 card.
label: Flea Bottom Alley

name: R'hllor Infiltrator
text: Dominance Action: Kneel R'hllor Infiltrator to choose an opponent. Give control of R'hllor Infiltrator to that player and gain 1 power for your faction.
label: R'hllor Infiltrator

name: King's Gate
text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you have 5 or more power on your faction card, sacrifice King's Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.
label: King's Gate

name: Ser Mandon Moore
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Ser Mandon Moore comes out of shadows, choose an opponent. That player must choose and kill a character he or she controls unless he or she chooses and discards 2 cards from his or her hand.
label: Ser Mandon Moore

name: Lion Gate
text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you control 2 or more cards in shadows, sacrifice Lion Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.
label: Lion Gate

name: Baelor Blacktyde
text: Each opponent cannot play copies of events that are in his or her discard pile.
flavor: "The Old Way is dead."
label: Baelor Blacktyde

name: Iron Gate
text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you are the first player, sacrifice Iron Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.
label: Iron Gate

name: Viserion
text: Ambush (5). No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Viserion is attacking, discard 1 card from your hand to have Viserion gain intimidate until the end of the challenge.
label: Viserion (AtG)

name: Dragon Gate
text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you control 2 or more attachments, sacrifice Dragon Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.
label: Dragon Gate

name: Southron Escort
text: Shadow (4). Action: Discard another card from shadows to put Southron Escort into play from shadows.
label: Southron Escort

name: River Gate
text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you have lost 2 or more challenges this phase, sacrifice River Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.
label: River Gate

name: Littlefinger
text: Shadow (6). Stealth. Reaction: After a character you control comes out of shadows, place up to 3 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, draw that many cards. (Limit once per round.)
label: Littlefinger (AtG)

name: White Sword Tower
text: Each Kingsguard character you control gets +1 STR. Each player that does not control a Kingsguard character cannot play more than 1 event each phase.
label: White Sword Tower

name: City of Secrets
text: When Revealed: Each player draws 2 cards. Then, each player without a City plot card in his or her used pile chooses and discards 2 cards from his or her hand.
label: City of Secrets

name: At the Gates
text: When Revealed: Search your deck for a limited location with printed cost 1 or lower, reveal it, and add it to your hand (put it into play instead if there are no City plot cards in your used pile). Shuffle your deck.
label: At the Gates

name: Smalljon Umber
text: Renown. Smalljon Umber gets -1 STR for each plot card in your used pile.
flavor: ... still called the Smalljon though he threatened to overtop his father.
label: Smalljon Umber

name: No Surprises
text: Action: Reveal your hand (of at least 1 card). Then, until the end of the phase, each opponent cannot play events or bring cards out of shadows.
label: No Surprises

name: Arrogant Contender
text: While Arrogant Contender is participating in a challenge, it gets +1 STR for each participating character an opponent controls. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Arrogant Contender is attacking alone, it gains 1 power for each defending character (to a maximum of 3 power).
designer: Card design by 2010 Melee World Champion, Brett Zeiler.
label: Arrogant Contender

name: Show of Strength
text: Challenges Action: Until the end of the phase, treat each character with STR 3 or lower as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
label: Show of Strength

name: Owen the Oaf
text: No attachments except Weapon. While Owen the Oaf is participating in a challenge, each character with more than 1 challenge icon does not contribute its STR to the challenge.
flavor: When Owen the Oaf began to dance with Patchface the fool, laughter echoed off the vaulted ceiling.
label: Owen the Oaf

name: Shadow of the Wall
text: Shadow (0). Action: Choose and stand a character with 1 or fewer challenge icons. If there is a Winter plot card revealed, return Shadow of the Wall to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.
label: Shadow of the Wall

name: Red Keep Gaoler
text: Shadow (4). Action: Move 2 power from your faction card to a [baratheon] character to put Red Keep Gaoler into play from shadows.
label: Red Keep Gaoler

name: The Black Cells
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, kneel The Black Cells to choose an opponent's character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot kneel or stand.
label: The Black Cells

name: The Regent's Guard
text: Shadow (4). Action: Return a [lannister] non-Ally character with printed cost 4 or higher to your hand to put The Regent's Guard into play from shadows.
label: The Regent's Guard

name: Pyromancer's Cache
text: Location only. Treat attached location as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). Attached location gains: "Action: Kneel this location to draw 1 card."
label: Pyromancer's Cache

name: Alannys Greyjoy
text: Reaction: After a [greyjoy] location enters play under your control, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: Even now, it was hard to credit that frail, sickly Lady Alannys had outlived her husband Lord Balon, who had seemed so hard and strong.
label: Alannys Greyjoy (CoS)

name: Nightflyer
text: Shadow (X). Reaction: After Nightflyer comes out of shadows, choose a location with printed cost X or lower and discard it from play. +1 Initiative.
label: Nightflyer

name: Black Market Merchant
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Black Market Merchant comes out of shadows, search the top 10 cards of your deck for an attachment with printed cost 3 or lower and attach it to an eligible character you control. Shuffle your deck.
label: Black Market Merchant

name: Shadow of the East
text: Shadow (0). Action: Choose an attachment and discard it from play. If there is a Summer plot card revealed, return Shadow of the East to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.
label: Shadow of the East

name: The Fowler Twins
text: Action: Choose a character. That character must be declared as an attacker or defender in the next challenge initiated this phase, if able. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "...Nym is too close to the Fowler twins. And who might the Fowler twins confide in? I could not take the risk." <cite>Doran Martell</cite>
label: The Fowler Twins

name: Shadow of the South
text: Shadow (1). Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. If there is a Scheme plot card revealed, return Shadow of the South to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.
label: Shadow of the South

name: Ghost of High Heart
text: While you control no loyal characters, each character you control gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Kneel Ghost of High Heart to look at a player's hand. Choose and discard 1 card from that hand. Then, that player draws 1 card.
designer: Card design by 2006 World Champion, Matthew Ley.
label: Ghost of High Heart

name: Shadow Politics
text: Shadow (1). Action: Choose one: - Choose and discard 1 card from shadows. - Choose up to 5 cards in a single discard pile and remove them from the game. - Look at an opponent's hand.
label: Shadow Politics

name: Knights of the Hollow Hill
text: You cannot place cards during setup. Your other cards do not provide a gold bonus. +3 Income. +2 Initiative. +1 Reserve.
designer: Card design by 2009 Joust World Champion, Greg Atkinson.
label: Knights of the Hollow Hill

name: A City Besieged
text: When Revealed: Choose and kneel a location. (Up to 2 locations instead if there is a City plot card in your used pile.)
label: A City Besieged

name: Eddard Stark
text: Renown. Dominance Action: If each character you control has the [stark] affiliation, kneel Eddard Stark to choose and kill a character with printed cost 4 or lower. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Eddard Stark (PoS)

name: Malleon's Tome
text: Shadow (1). Attached character gains an [intrigue] icon. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is attacking, look at the losing opponent's hand. If attached character is Eddard Stark or has the Maester trait, stand it. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Malleon's Tome

name: Maester Gormon
text: You may look at the top card of your deck. Once per phase, if the top card of your deck is a non-[tyrell] card, you may marshal or play it as if it were in your hand.
flavor: Maester Gormon sat below the iron mask in Walgrave's place, the same Gormon who had once accused Pate of theft.
label: Maester Gormon

name: Unexpected Guile
text: Character with shadow you control only. Shadow (1). Attached character gets +2 STR and gains insight. Forced Interrupt: When a challenge ends in which attached character is participating, return Unexpected Guile and attached character to shadows.
label: Unexpected Guile (PoS)

name: Maester Mullin
text: Action: Kneel Maester Mullin to choose a character and a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker in challenges of that type.
flavor: "Maester Mullin at the Shadow Tower is more fighter than scholar..." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>
label: Maester Mullin

name: Guard Duty
text: [thenightswatch] character only. Reaction: After attached character is declared as a defender, kneel Guard Duty to stand attached character.
label: Guard Duty

name: Ser Eldon Estermont
text: Action: Choose and stand a [baratheon] location. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "Our cause is righteous, so the gods must surely bless our champion's arms with victory."
label: Ser Eldon Estermont

name: Shadow of the Throne
text: Shadow (1). Action: Choose and kneel any number of locations with total printed cost 3 or lower. If there is a Kingdom plot card revealed, return Shadow of the Throne to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.
label: Shadow of the Throne

name: Chiswyck
text: Pillage. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Chiswyck is participating, discard the top card of your deck to draw 1 card.
flavor: Chiswyck was seated by the fire with a horn of ale to hand, telling one of his funny stories.
label: Chiswyck

name: "Hands of Gold"
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent and return it to its owner's hand. (Max 1 per challenge.)
flavor: Hands of gold are always cold, but a woman's hands are warm.
label: "Hands of Gold"

name: King's Landing Proselyte
text: Shadow (4). Action: Kill a standing [greyjoy] character to put King's Landing Proselyte into play from shadows.
label: King's Landing Proselyte

name: Outfitted for War
text: Warship location only. Action: During a [military] challenge, kneel attached location to give a participating [greyjoy] character +3 STR until the end of the challenge.
label: Outfitted for War

name: Jon Connington
text: Shadow (5). Renown. Reaction: After Jon Connington comes out of shadows, choose and reveal a card you control in shadows. If it is a non-event card with printed cost 4 or lower, put it into play.
flavor: I rose too high, loved too hard, dared too much. I tried to grasp a star, overreached, and fell.
label: Jon Connington

name: The Dragonpit
text: Each character whose controller controls fewer cards in shadows than you gets -1 STR.
flavor: None of the dragons bred and raised in the Dragonpit of King's Landing had ever approached the size of Vhagar or Meraxes, much less that of the Black Dread, King Aegon's monster.
label: The Dragonpit

name: Arianne Martell
text: Shadow (5). Stealth. Reaction: After a card comes out of shadows under your control, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. (Limit 3 times per round.)
label: Arianne Martell (PoS)

name: A Pit of Snakes
text: Challenges Action: Choose a character with no challenge icons and place a poison token on it. At the end of the phase, if that character still has that poison token, remove it and kill that character. (Max 1 per phase.)
label: A Pit of Snakes

name: The Most Devout
text: No attachments except The Seven. Reaction: After a character enters play under an opponent's control, if another character entered play under that player's control this phase, The Most Devout gains 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)
label: The Most Devout

name: Statue of Baelor
text: Action: Kneel Statue of Baelor and discard 1 power from another character or location you control to stand that character or location.
label: Statue of Baelor

name: The Faith's Decree
text: Play only if you control a The Seven character or location. Action: Name a non-agenda, non-plot card. Until the end of the phase, each opponent cannot trigger card abilities of cards with that name.
label: The Faith's Decree

name: Manning the City Walls
text: When Revealed: Put a non-unique character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand. (Printed cost 6 or lower instead if there is a City plot card in your used pile.)
label: Manning the City Walls

name: White Harbor Watchman
text: Reaction: After a character comes out of shadows, sacrifice White Harbor Watchman to kill that character.
flavor: "We are good people in White Harbor, lawful, loyal people." <cite>Leona Manderly</cite>
label: White Harbor Watchman

name: Tower of the Hand
text: Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, if there is a Winter plot card revealed, choose and stand a [stark] character. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Tower of the Hand (BtRK)

name: Alyce Graceford
text: Action: Kneel Alyce Graceford to choose another The Seven character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown.
flavor: Lady Graceford, who was large with child, asked the queen's leave to name it Tywin if it were a boy, or Lanna if it were a girl.
label: Alyce Graceford

name: The Maidenvault
text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After The Maidenvault comes out of shadows, choose a participating Lady character. Stand it and remove it from the challenge. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, kneel The Maidenvault to return it to shadows.
label: The Maidenvault

name: Forest Patrol
text: Shadow (4). No attachments except Weapon. Action: Kneel a [thenightswatch] location to put Forest Patrol into play from shadows.
label: Forest Patrol

name: Blackbird
text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After Blackbird comes out of shadows, choose and stand another [thenightswatch] location. +1 Reserve.
label: Blackbird

name: Castle Guard
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Castle Guard comes out of shadows, choose another character that came out of shadows this phase. Return that character to shadows.
label: Castle Guard

name: Public Execution
text: Marshaling Action: Choose and kill a kneeling character.
flavor: "A ruler who hides behind paid executioners soon forgets what death is." <cite>Eddard Stark</cite>
label: Public Execution

name: Doubting Septa
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, sacrifice Doubting Septa to choose a character or location you control. That card gains 1 power.
label: Doubting Septa

name: Tunnels of the Red Keep
text: Shadow (2). Action: Kneel Tunnels of the Red Keep to return it to shadows. Then, until the end of the phase, each character you control gets +1 STR for each card you control in shadows. (Max 1 per phase.)
label: Tunnels of the Red Keep

name: Gorold Goodbrother
text: Pillage. Renown. Reaction: After a location enters an opponent's discard pile, stand Gorold Goodbrother. (Limit twice per phase.)
flavor: "What shall it be, homage or defiance?"
label: Gorold Goodbrother

name: Shadow of the Isles
text: Shadow (1). Action: Each player chooses a non-limited location he or she controls and discards it from play. If there is a War plot card revealed, return Shadow of the Isles to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.
label: Shadow of the Isles

name: Shadowblack Assassin
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Shadowblack Assassin comes out of shadows, choose and kill a character with STR 1 or lower.
label: Shadowblack Assassin

name: Dragon Skull
text: [targaryen] character only. Shadow (2). While there are no Dragon characters in play, attached character gains intimidate and renown.
label: Dragon Skull

name: Sarella Sand
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Sarella Sand is attacking, you may initiate an additional challenge of that type this phase. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "Unless she returns to Dorne, there's naught I can do about Sarella save pray that she shows more sense than her sisters." <cite>Doran Martell</cite>
label: Sarella Sand

name: Meadowlark
text: Reaction: After you reveal a plot card, place 1 journey token on Meadowlark. Action: Sacrifice Meadowlark to search your deck for a character with printed cost X or lower and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. X is the number of journey tokens on Meadowlark.
label: Meadowlark

name: Advisor to the Crown
text: Action: Kneel Advisor to the Crown to reduce the cost of the next Maester character you marshal this phase by 1.
label: Advisor to the Crown

name: Knights of the Mind
text: Challenge Action: Until the end of the phase, each Maester character you control gains a [military] icon.
flavor: "There are some who call my order the knights of the mind." <cite>Maester Luwin</cite>
label: Knights of the Mind

name: Kingdom of Shadows
text: You may include non-loyal characters with the printed shadow keyword from any faction in your deck. Increase the cost of each character you marshal by 1. Reduce the cost of the first character you bring out of shadows each round by 2.
label: Kingdom of Shadows (BtRK)

name: City of Spiders
text: When Revealed: Initiate the when revealed ability of a City plot card in your used pile as if you had just revealed it.
label: City of Spiders

name: Smallfolk Mob
text: Shadow (4). Action: Sacrifice a unique [stark] character to put Smallfolk Mob into play from shadows.
label: Smallfolk Mob

name: Shadow of the North
text: Shadow (1). Play only during a challenge. Action: Raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. If there is a Winter plot card revealed, return Shadow of the North to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Shadow of the North

name: Highgarden Jester
text: Insight. Forced Reaction: After Highgarden Jester draws a card using insight, place a random card from your hand on top of your deck. (Choose a card from your hand and place it on top of your deck instead if there is another Fool character in play.)
label: Highgarden Jester

name: Shadow of the Rose
text: Shadow (2). Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for a card with shadow, reveal it, and put it into shadows. Shuffle your deck. If there is a Summer plot card revealed, return Shadow of the Rose to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.
label: Shadow of the Rose

name: Yoren
text: Reaction: After Yoren enters play, choose a character with printed cost 5 or lower. Take control of that character until Yoren leaves play.
flavor: "Do what you want to the town, it's naught to me, but leave us be. We're no foes to you."
label: Yoren (TB)

name: Bound for the Wall
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, reveal the top 5 cards of the losing opponent's deck. You may put a character revealed this way into play under your control. Place the other revealed cards on the bottom of that player's deck in a random order. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Bound for the Wall (TB)

name: Ser Preston Greenfield
text: Shadow (4). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Preston Greenfield is participating, the losing opponent must move 1 power from his or her faction card to a standing character he or she controls.
label: Ser Preston Greenfield

name: Blackwater Rush
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, kneel Blackwater Rush to choose a [baratheon] character. That character gains 1 power.
label: Blackwater Rush

name: Tyrion Lannister
text: Shadow (5). Insight. Reaction: After a non-event card you control comes out of shadows, place another card you control in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost. (Limit once per round.)
label: Tyrion Lannister (TB)

name: A Very Large Shadow
text: Shadow (0). Action: Reduce the cost of the next card you bring out of shadows this phase by 3. If there is a Scheme plot card revealed, return A Very Large Shadow to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile. (Max 1 per phase.)
label: A Very Large Shadow

name: Maester Kerwin
text: Interrupt: When another character would be killed, kill Maester Kerwin to save that character.
flavor: Maesters had their uses, but Victarion had nothing but contempt for this Kerwin. With his smooth pink cheeks, soft hands, and brown curls, he looked more girlish that most girls.
label: Maester Kerwin

name: "The Bloody Cup"
text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent and place it on top of its owner's deck. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: "The Bloody Cup"

name: Covert Loyalist
text: Shadow (4). Action: Discard a [targaryen] card with printed cost 4 or higher from your hand to put Covert Loyalist into play from shadows.
label: Covert Loyalist

name: Music of Dragons
text: Challenges Action: Search your deck for a Dragon character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: ...for the first time in hundreds of years, the night came alive with the music of dragons.
label: Music of Dragons

name: Dagos Manwoody
text: While there are 5 or more different Traits among plot cards in your used pile, Dagos Manwoody gains renown and stealth.
label: Dagos Manwoody

name: The Mountain's Skull
text: Attached character gets +2 STR and gains renown. Reaction: After an opponent's character with printed STR 6 or higher is killed, put The Mountain's Skull into play from your hand or discard pile.
label: The Mountain's Skull

name: Sparrows
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Sparrows comes out of shadows, move 1 power from an opponent's faction card to another The Seven card you control.
label: Sparrows

name: White Cloak
text: Knight character you control only. Attached character gains the Kingsguard trait. Interrupt: When a King or Queen character would be killed, kneel attached character to save it.
label: White Cloak

name: The White Book
text: You may include non-loyal Kingsguard characters from any faction in your deck. You must include at least 7 different Kingsguard characters in your deck. Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel your faction card to stand each defending Kingsguard character you control. (Each participating Kingsguard character you control instead if you control a King or Queen character.)
label: The White Book

name: King's Landing Riot
text: Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if there are 3 or more City plot cards in your used pile, discard each character from play.
label: King's Landing Riot

name: Arya Stark
text: Shadow (4). Stealth. Reaction: After Arya Stark enters play, place a prayer token on up to 5 different characters you don't control. If Arya Stark leaves play, discard those tokens. Reaction: After a character with a prayer token is killed, stand Arya Stark and draw 1 card.
label: Arya Stark (LMHR)

name: Blood of the First Men
text: Character you control only. Attached character gains the Old Gods trait. Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating [stark] character, kneel attached character to have it participate in the challenge on your side.
label: Blood of the First Men

name: The Queen's Retinue
text: Shadow (4). Action: Put The Queen's Retinue into play from shadows. Then, each opponent draws 2 cards.
label: The Queen's Retinue (LMHR)

name: Huntress
text: While Huntress is standing, each [tyrell] character you control with printed cost 3 or lower gets +1 STR. Action: Kneel Huntress to choose a [tyrell] character with printed cost 3 or lower. It gets +3 STR until the end of the phase.
label: Huntress

name: Recruit from the Dungeons
text: Shadow (2). Action: During a challenge in which you are the defending player, kneel Recruit from the Dungeons to have it participate in the challenge on your side. If you lose the challenge, return Recruit from the Dungeons to shadows.
label: Recruit from the Dungeons

name: Rimegate
text: Interrupt: When another location you control would be discarded from play, kneel Rimegate to save it.
flavor: Hoarfrost Hill and Rimegate still lacked garrisons, so Jon had asked their views on which of the remaining wildling chiefs and war lords might be best suited to hold them.
label: Rimegate

name: Robert Baratheon
text: Renown. Reaction: After Robert Baratheon gains power, gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit twice per round.)
flavor: "I swear to you, I was never so alive as when I was winning this throne, or so dead now that I've won it."
label: Robert Baratheon (LMHR)

name: Long May He Reign
text: King character only. Attached character cannot be killed. Forced Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge as the defending player, sacrifice Long May He Reign.
label: Long May He Reign

name: The Bastard of Driftmark
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which The Bastard of Driftmark is participating, choose and stand a location.
flavor: Aurane Waters, the dashing young Bastard of Driftmark, would be her grand admiral.
label: The Bastard of Driftmark (LMHR)

name: Alchemists' Guildhall
text: Shadow (2). Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered character ability would initiate, if that character does not have shadow, kneel and return Alchemists' Guildhall to shadows to cancel those effects. (Max 1 per phase.)
label: Alchemists' Guildhall

name: Blackwater Raiders
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Blackwater Raiders comes out of shadows, choose a location with printed cost 2 or lower in an opponent's discard pile. Put it into play under your control.
label: Blackwater Raiders

name: Fishmonger's Square
text: Marshaling Action: If there are 10 or more cards in an opponent's discard pile, kneel Fishmonger's Square to draw 1 card and gain 1 gold.
label: Fishmonger's Square

name: Ser Jorah Mormont
text: Shadow (4). No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When Ser Jorah Mormont is discarded from your hand, put him into shadows instead of placing him in your discard pile.
label: Ser Jorah Mormont (LMHR)

name: Mercenary Contract
text: Attached character gains the Mercenary trait. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is attacking, pay 1 gold and kneel Mercenary Contract to stand attached character.
label: Mercenary Contract

name: Friends at Court
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Friends at Court comes out of shadows, look at up to 3 cards in shadows. Then, you may pay 2 gold to choose 1 of those cards and return it to its owner's hand.
label: Friends at Court

name: Poisoned Dagger
text: Character you control only. Shadow (2). Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which attached character is participating, sacrifice Poisoned Dagger to have the losing opponent choose and kill a participating character he or she controls.
label: Poisoned Dagger

name: The Iron Throne
text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel The Iron Throne to name a card. Until the end of the phase, that card cannot be marshaled, played, or put into play.
label: The Iron Throne (LMHR)

name: Valyrian Steel
text: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of each attachment (by title). Action: Kneel your faction card and pay X gold to put an attachment with printed cost X into play from your hand. Reaction: After an attachment enters play under your control, either: draw a card or gain 1 gold. (Limit 3 times per round.)
designer: Card design by 2015 Melee World Champion, Corey Faherty.
label: Valyrian Steel (LMHR)

name: City of Wealth
text: Increase the gold, initiative, and reserve values on this plot card by 1 for each City plot card in your used pile.
label: City of Wealth

name: Expose Duplicity
text: When Revealed: Discard each card in shadows.
label: Expose Duplicity

name: Robert Baratheon
text: Renown. Reaction: After the standing phase begins (choose one): - other characters with printed cost 5 or higher cannot stand this phase. - characters with printed cost 4 or lower cannot stand this phase. - locations cannot stand this phase.
label: Robert Baratheon (FotS)

name: Stannis Baratheon
text: Immune to opponents' events. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, draw X cards. X is the claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card.
flavor: "I never asked for this crown."
label: Stannis Baratheon (FotS)

name: Melisandre
text: Stealth. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which Melisandre is attacking, move 1 power from a character controlled by the losing opponent to Melisandre. Then, if that character has no power, kill it.
label: Melisandre (FotS)

name: Renly Baratheon
text: Renown. Action: Kneel your faction card to put a non-[baratheon] character with printed cost X or lower into play from your hand. X is Renly Baratheon's STR.
flavor: "Tyrell swords will make me king."
label: Renly Baratheon (FotS)

name: Salladhor Saan
text: Reaction: After you marshal a Smuggler character, choose and kneel a location. Then, gain gold equal to that location's printed cost. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "Good ser, it is gold I crave, not words on papers."
label: Salladhor Saan (FotS)

name: Ser Davos Seaworth
text: Stealth. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Davos Seaworth is participating, discard 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card. Then, you may have a King character you control gain 1 power.
label: Ser Davos Seaworth (FotS)

name: Alester Florent
text: Reaction: After a House Florent character enters play, draw a card. (Limit once per round.) Interrupt: When Alester Florent leaves play, if you control another R'hllor character, choose and kneel a character an opponent controls.
flavor: "Stannis Baratheon will never sit the Iron Throne. Is it treason to say the truth? A bitter truth, but no less true for that."
label: Alester Florent

name: Selyse Baratheon
text: Reduce the cost of each R'hllor attachment you marshal by 3.
flavor: "A queen should be a mistress beneath her own roof."
label: Selyse Baratheon (FotS)

name: Griffin's Roost Knight
text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost a [power] challenge this phase, stand Griffin's Roost Knight.
flavor: Griffin's Roost was strong but small...
label: Griffin's Roost Knight

name: Dale Seaworth
text: Reaction: After you marshal Dale Seaworth, choose a [baratheon] location in your discard pile and return it to your hand.
flavor: "Your son Dale will go south in Wraith, past Cape Wrath and the Broken Arm, all along the coast of Dorne as far as the Arbor." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>
label: Dale Seaworth

name: Ser Imry Florent
text: Action: Kill Ser Imry Florent to choose an opponent. You may sacrifice any number of locations. For each location sacrificed this way, that opponent must choose and kneel a standing character he or she controls.
flavor: With four times as many ships as the boy king, Ser Imry saw no need for caution or deceptive tactics.
label: Ser Imry Florent

name: Red Priest
text: Reaction: After Red Priest enters play, look at an opponent's hand. Then, choose 1 card in that hand and remove it from the game until Red Priest leaves play.
flavor: The red priest lit their fires every day at sunset, to thank R'hllor for the day just ending, and beg him to send his sun back on the morrow to banish the gathering darkness.
label: Red Priest

name: Shyra Errol
text: Interrupt: When a character is killed, sacrifice Shyra Errol to move each power from that character to its controller's faction card.
label: Shyra Errol

name: Acolyte of the Flame
text: Reaction: After the draw phase begins, kneel Acolyte of the Flame to look at the top 2 cards of an opponent's deck. You may put those cards on the bottom of that player's deck.
flavor: "Any cat may stare into a fire and see red mice at play." <cite>Melisandre</cite>
label: Acolyte of the Flame

name: Bastard of Robert
text: While you control Robert Baratheon, reduce the cost to marshal Bastard of Robert by 2. Reaction: After Bastard of Robert enters play, if you control a King character, draw a card.
flavor: "If you bed enough women, some will give you presents, and His Grace has never been shy on that count." <cite>Littlefinger</cite>
label: Bastard of Robert

name: Wily Smuggler
