text: Action: Choose 1 card from your hand and place it on top of your deck. Then, at the end of the phase, draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: A smuggler had best know men as well as tides, or he would not live to smuggle long.
label: Wily Smuggler

name: The Stormlands
text: You may initiate an additional [power] challenge during the challenges phase. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, kneel The Stormlands to choose and stand a participating King or Queen character.
label: The Stormlands

name: Cape Wrath
text: During [power] challenges in which you are the attacking or defending player, raise the claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card by 1.
flavor: ...he would never have dared attempt a landing on Cape Wrath,, the storm lords were too fiercely loyal to House Baratheon and to King Robert.
label: Cape Wrath

name: Lyseni Galley
text: Action: Kneel Lyseni Galley to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR. If that character is a Captain or Smuggler, it gains stealth until the end of the phase.
flavor: One of Salladhor Saan's warships was sweeping past the castle, her gaily striped hull slicing through the greygreen waters as her oars rose and fell.
label: Lyseni Galley

name: Azor Ahai Reborn
text: Unique character you control only. Terminal. Attached character is considered to be participating in each challenge in which you control an attacking R'hllor character.
label: Azor Ahai Reborn

name: Hunting Accident
text: Ambush (3). Terminal. Attached character cannot stand.
flavor: "He slew the boar. His entrails were sliding from his belly, yet somehow he slew the boar." <cite>Renly Baratheon</cite>
label: Hunting Accident

name: Warhammer
text: If attached character's printed STR is 4 or lower, it gets +2 STR. If attached character's printed STR is 5 or higher, it gains intimidate.
flavor: He'd had a giant's strength too, his weapon of choice a spiked iron warhammer that Ned could scarcely lift.
label: Warhammer

name: "A Cask of Ale"
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, choose 2 cards controlled by the same player. Move up to 2 power from one of those cards to the other.
label: "A Cask of Ale"

name: Nightfire Visions
text: Play only if you control a R'hllor character. Taxation Action: Name a Trait. If an opponent reveals a plot card with that Trait during the next plot phase, draw 3 cards.
label: Nightfire Visions

name: Botley Crew
text: Reaction: After an opponent collects income, return 1 gold from that player's gold pool to the treasury.
label: Botley Crew

name: Every Captain is a King
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, each Captain character you control gains the King trait and does not kneel when declared as an attacker in [power] challenges.
flavor: ...it was small wonder they named the islands the land of ten thousand kings.
label: Every Captain is a King

name: Ser Gregor Clegane
text: Intimidate. Pillage. Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Gregor Clegane is participating, choose and kill a character you control.
flavor: "Gregor is a very large man. Also a very stupid one. Too stupid to know when he should die, it seems." <cite>Cersei Lannister</cite>
label: Ser Gregor Clegane (FotS)

name: Lionstar
text: Action: Kneel Lionstar to put a [lannister] character with printed cost 4 or lower into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play.
flavor: Her hull was black and gold, her figurehead a lion with an upraised paw.
label: Lionstar

name: Prince's Attendant
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Prince's Attendant to reduce the cost of the next [martell] Lord or Lady character you marshal this phase by 2.
label: Prince's Attendant

name: Kingsgrave
text: Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel and sacrifice Kingsgrave to choose a participating character and return it to its owner's hand. (You may kill that character instead if it has the King trait.)
label: Kingsgrave

name: Protectors of the Realm
text: No attachments. X is your reserve value.
flavor: "Oh, eight thousand years is a good while, to be sure... yet if the Night's Watch does not remember, who will?" <cite>Old Bear Mormont</cite>
label: Protectors of the Realm (FotS)

name: The Horn that Wakes the Sleepers
text: Reaction: After an opponent initiates a challenge against you, choose and stand a Builder character, a Ranger character, and a Steward character.
flavor: "They never blow three. Not for hundreds and thousands of years. Three means &mdash,," <cite>Samwell Tarly</cite>
label: The Horn that Wakes the Sleepers

name: She-Bear
text: Reaction: After you marshal She-Bear, you may put a [stark] character or attachment with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand.
flavor: "You are braver than I am, I fear. Are all your Bear Island women such warriors?" <cite>Catelyn Stark</cite>
label: She-Bear

name: Bearskin Cloak
text: Attached character gets +1 STR. If attached character has the House Mormont trait, it gains stealth.
flavor: "A woman in a bearskin, with a child in one arm suckling her breast. In the other hand she holds a battleaxe. She's no proper lady, that one, but I always loved her." <cite>Dacey Mormont</cite>
label: Bearskin Cloak

name: Haggo
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Haggo is participating, discard a card from your hand to choose a Dothraki card in your discard pile and return it to your hand.
flavor: ...Haggo, huge and silent, often glowered...
label: Haggo

name: Dothraki Steed
text: Limit 1 copy per character. While attached character is attacking, it gets +1 STR (+3 STR instead if it has the Dothraki trait).
label: Dothraki Steed

name: Hightower Knight
text: Action: Kneel a non-[tyrell] Knight character to put Hightower Knight into play from your hand.
label: Hightower Knight

name: Fields of the Reach
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, kneel 3 The Reach locations to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge.
flavor: "In Highgarden there are fields of golden roses that stretch away as far as the eye can see." <cite>Robert Baratheon</cite>
label: Fields of the Reach

name: Lyn Corbray
text: Stealth. Reaction: After an opponent initiates a [power] challenge against you, stand Lyn Corbray.
flavor: "I have never taken kindly to chastisement, as any number of dead men could tell you."
label: Lyn Corbray (FotS)

name: Unlikely Champion
text: While you control a Lord or Lady character, Unlikely Champion gains a [power] icon.
flavor: Near forty men took part, freeriders and hedge knights and new-made squires in search of a reputation.
label: Unlikely Champion

name: Anguy the Archer
text: While you control no loyal characters, Anguy the Archer does not kneel when declared as an attacker or defender in a [military] challenge.
flavor: That afternoon a boy named Anguy, an unheralded commoner from the Dornish Marches, won the archery competition, outshooting Ser Balon Swann and Jalabhar Xho at a hundred paces...
label: Anguy the Archer

name: The Hollow Hill
text: Dominance Action: If you control no loyal characters, kneel The Hollow Hill to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a non-loyal character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "A refuge where neither wolves nor lions come prowling." <cite>Lem Lemoncloak</cite>
label: The Hollow Hill

name: Lady Forlorn
text: Attached character gets +1 STR for each neutral location you control. If attached character is Lyn Corbray, he gains a [power] icon.
flavor: "My lady has a thirst. Whenever she comes out to dance, she likes a drop of red." <cite>Lyn Corbray</cite>
label: Lady Forlorn

name: Defiance
text: Challenges Action: Choose and stand a character that has not participated in a challenge this phase. (Max 1 per phase.)
flavor: "I thank you, my lords... but I spit upon your pity." <cite>Ser Barristan Selmy</cite>
label: Defiance

name: The Prince that was Promised
text: After all agendas are announced, name a unique character. Other characters you control cannot gain power. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to, either: stand the named character and draw a card,, or, search your deck, discard pile, and dead pile for the named character, reveal it, add it to your hand, and shuffle your deck.
label: The Prince that was Promised

name: Parley at Storm's End
text: When Revealed: Name a challenge type. Until you reveal a new plot card, challenges of that type cannot be initiated.
label: Parley at Storm's End

name: Outwit
text: Interrupt: When the effects of a when revealed ability would initiate, kneel your faction card and a unique Maester character to cancel those effects.
label: Outwit

name: Siege Preparations
text: Dominance Action: Draw cards until your hand size is equal to your reserve value. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Siege Preparations

name: Rationing
text: Players cannot trigger reactions to winning or losing challenges.
label: Rationing

name: Desperate Attack
text: While you are the defending player, raise the claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card by 1.
label: Desperate Attack

name: The Hand's Tourney
text: Forced Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] challenge, apply [power] claim instead.
label: The Hand's Tourney

name: The New Gods
text: Each The Seven character you control does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the first challenge you initiate during the challenges phase.
label: The New Gods

name: Daenerys Targaryen
text: Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an attachment or Dragon card, reveal it, and add it to your hand (you may put it into play instead if its printed cost is 3 or lower). Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "Why do the gods make kings and queens, if not to protect the ones who can't protect themselves?"
label: Daenerys Targaryen (DotE)

name: Drogon
text: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Drogon is attacking, kill each character the defending player controls with STR 1 or lower.
label: Drogon (DotE)

name: Rhaegal
text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Rhaegal is attacking, choose and stand another character you control. Then, if that character has the Dragon or Stormborn trait, stand Rhaegal. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Rhaegal (DotE)

name: Viserion
text: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains stealth. While Viserion is attacking, each participating non-Dragon, non-Stormborn characters gets -2 STR.
label: Viserion (DotE)

name: Khal Drogo
text: Renown. Interrupt: When an Army or Dothraki character would be returned to your hand, discard 1 card from your hand to save it.
flavor: "Come, my blood. The stallions call, this place is ashes. It is time to ride."
label: Khal Drogo (DotE)

name: Galazza Galare
text: Reaction: After you marshal Galazza Galare, search the top 10 cards of your deck for, either: a [targaryen] character with printed cost 6 or higher, or up to 3 [targaryen] characters with printed cost 2 or lower. Reveal each searched-for card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Galazza Galare

name: Jhogo
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which you control 2 or more attacking Dothraki characters, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to your own.
flavor: "Khaleesi, we saw him strike you. Would you see the color of his blood?"
label: Jhogo (DotE)

name: The Shavepate
text: Challenges Action: Pay X gold to put a character with printed cost X or lower into play from your discard pile. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "... I say that blood must pay for blood. Take one man from each of the families I have named and kill him. The next time one of yours is slain, take two from each great House and kill them both. There will not be a third murder."
label: The Shavepate

name: Rakharo
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which you control 2 or more attacking Dothraki characters, discard 1 card at random from the losing opponent's hand.
flavor: "Khaleesi, better a man should swallow scorpions than trust in the spawn of shadows, who dare not show their face beneath the sun. It is known."
label: Rakharo (DotE)

name: The Titan's Bastard
text: Action: Kneel The Titan's Bastard to return a Mercenary character from your discard pile to your hand.
flavor: "That one has an evil reputation, even in Westeros. Do not be misled by his manner, Your Grace." <cite>Ser Barristan Selmy</cite>
label: The Titan's Bastard

name: Barsena Blackhair
text: No attachments except Weapon. While there is a Weapon attachment attached to Barsena Blackhair, she gets +3 STR.
flavor: Daenerys would have prohibited contests between women as well, but Barsena Blackhair protested that she had as much right to risk her life as any man.
label: Barsena Blackhair

name: Captain Groleo
text: Reaction: After an attachment enters play, gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: At first Groleo had wanted the dragons caged and Dany had consented to put his fears at ease, but their misery was so palpable that she soon changed her mind and insisted they be freed.
label: Captain Groleo

name: Blue Graces
text: Challenges Action: Remove Blue Graces from the game to choose a card with printed cost 6 or higher in your discard or dead pile and shuffle it into your deck.
label: Blue Graces

name: Dothraki Handmaiden
text: While you control Daenerys Targaryen, you may marshal facedown cards attached to Dothraki Handmaiden as if they were in your hand. Marshaling Action: Reveal an attachment from your hand. Attach it to Dothraki Handmaiden facedown as an attachment.
label: Dothraki Handmaiden

name: Horselord
text: While Horselord is attacking, it gets +1 STR for each other attacking Dothraki character you control.
flavor: The horselords might put on rich fabrics and sweet perfumes when they visited the Free Cities, but out under the open sky they kept the old ways.
label: Horselord

name: Brown Ben Plumm
text: Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have no gold in your gold pool, sacrifice Brown Ben Plumm.
flavor: "There are old sellswords and bold sellswords, but no old bold sellswords."
label: Brown Ben Plumm

name: Womb of the World
text: Action: Kneel Womb of the World to reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may chose a Dothraki character revealed this way and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, return it to your hand.
label: Womb of the World (DotE)

name: Pentos
text: Reaction: After you draw an attachment, kneel Pentos to reveal that attachment and put it into play. Then, draw a card.
flavor: "There are orchards, farms, mines ... I own some such myself, though I seldom visit them. Why should I spend my days out here, with the myriad delights of Pentos close at hand?" <cite>Magister Illyrio</cite>
label: Pentos

name: Khaleesi
text: Lady character only. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, kneel Khaleesi to, either: stand attached character, or raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge.
label: Khaleesi

name: Dragon Egg
text: Attached character gains insight. Reaction: After the marshaling phase begins, if attached character is Daenerys Targaryen, sacrifice Dragon Egg to search your deck for a Hatchling character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
label: Dragon Egg

name: Pit Fighter's Blade
text: Attached character gains renown during [military] challenges.
flavor: No one wore armor in the fighting pits. It was blood the crowds came for: death, dismemberment, and the shrieks of agony, the music of scarlet sands.
label: Pit Fighter's Blade

name: Overwhelming Numbers
text: Play only during a challenge in which you control 2 or more attacking Dothraki characters. Action: Put up to 2 Dothraki characters into play from your hand and/or discard pile knelt, participating as attackers. At the end of the challenge, if any of those characters are still in play, return them to your hand. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Overwhelming Numbers

name: Fire Made Flesh
text: Marshaling Action: Sacrifice a Hatchling character to search your hand and deck for a Dragon character with the same title and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "For dragons are fire made flesh, and fire is power." <cite>Quaithe of the Shadow</cite>
label: Fire Made Flesh

name: Incinerate
text: Action: Choose a participating character and discard 1 or more cards from your hand. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets -2 STR for each card discarded this way.
label: Incinerate

name: Delena Florent
text: During the challenges phase, non-Bastard characters cannot stand. Reaction: After Delena Florent enters play, search your deck for a Bastard character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Delena Florent

name: Dragonstone Convert
text: Challenges Action: Name an event. Until the end of the phase, events with that title cannot be played. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Dragonstone Convert

name: Hotho Humpback
text: Challenges Action: Each player draws 1 card. Each player checks reserve. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "Rodrik has no daughters, only books. Hotho will be his heir, and I will be the king." <cite>Victarion Greyjoy</cite>
label: Hotho Humpback

name: Ten Towers Galley
text: While Ten Towers Galley is standing, reduce the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot by 1. Action: Kneel a location with printed cost 2 or higher to kneel Ten Towers Galley. Any player may initiate this ability.
label: Ten Towers Galley

name: Ser Meryn Trant
text: Interrupt: When a card is discarded from an opponent's hand, remove it from the game instead of placing it in his or her discard pile.
flavor: Ser Meryn Trant simply did not care.
label: Ser Meryn Trant

name: The Red Keep
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered character, location, or attachment ability would initiate, kneel The Red Keep to cancel those effects. +1 Income.
label: The Red Keep (DotE)

name: Spotted Sylva
text: Forced Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Spotted Sylva is attacking, each player must choose a participating character he or she controls, if able, and return it to its owner's hand.
flavor: "I should be honored if you'd let me serve you."
label: Spotted Sylva

name: Choosing the Spear
text: Reaction: After a [martell] character you control is declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. If you lose the challenge, choose and kill a character you control. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Choosing the Spear

name: Clydas
text: Action: Move 1 gold from an opponent's gold pool to your own. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "I am being foolish, Lord Commander, but ... this letter frightens me."
label: Clydas (DotE)

name: Cage of Ravens
text: Steward character only. Action: Kneel Cage of Ravens to put a card with printed cost 1 or lower into play from your hand.
label: Cage of Ravens

name: Wylla Manderly
text: Reaction: After a character you control is sacrificed or killed, choose another card in your discard pile and place it on the bottom of your deck. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "He was our king! He was brave and good, and the Freys murdered him. If Lord Stannis will avenge him, we should join Lord Stannis."
label: Wylla Manderly

name: Fight to the Last
text: Interrupt: When a character you control would be killed, save it, stand it, and set its STR to 1 until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it (cannot be saved).
flavor: Crossbow bolts thudded into the wood, one two three, as he flung it down on top of his king.
label: Fight to the Last

name: Mathis Rowan
text: Action: Choose an opponent and a character, location, or attachment you control. That player takes control of that card. Then, gain 2 gold. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "Mathis Rowan is sensible, prudent, well liked..." <cite>Ser Kevan Lannister</cite>
label: Mathis Rowan

name: Champion's Favor
text: Lady character only. Action: Kneel attached character to choose a participating non-Lady character and give it +X STR until the end of the challenge. X is 2 higher than attached character's STR.
label: Champion's Favor

name: Lysa Arryn
text: Interrupt: When Lysa Arryn is killed, choose another character, location, or attachment and remove it from the game.
flavor: "We keep no headsman in the Eyrie, my lord of Lannister. Open the Moon Door."
label: Lysa Arryn (DotE)

name: Tormund Giantsbane
text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Tormund Giantsbane is participating, place a tale token on him. Action: Discard 1 tale token from Tormund Giantsbane to give a Wildling character +2 STR and renown until the end of the phase.
label: Tormund Giantsbane

name: Archmaester Marwyn
text: Once per phase, you may marshal or play a facedown card under your agenda as if it were in your hand. Reaction: After Archmaester Marwyn enters play, place the top 2 cards of your deck facedown under your agenda.
label: Archmaester Marwyn

name: Braavos
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Braavos to gain X gold. X is the number of different factions among characters you control.
flavor: The Titan of Braavos ... was a giant as tall as a mountain, and whenever Braavos stood in danger he would wake with fire in his eyes, his rocky limbs grinding and groaning as he waded out into the sea to smash the enemies.
label: Braavos

name: Water Dancer's Sword
text: Character with printed STR 3 or lower only. Ambush (1). Attached character gets +2 STR. Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, return Water Dancer's Sword to hand.
label: Water Dancer's Sword

name: Lay Waste
text: Dominance Action: Choose a non-limited location or attachment and discard it from play. Then, that card's owner may search his or her deck for a location or attachment with lower printed cost, put it into play, and shuffle his or her deck.
label: Lay Waste

name: Bribery
text: Action: Choose and kneel a character with printed cost X or lower. If that character has the Ally or Mercenary trait, you may take control of it instead.
flavor: The gaoler's eyes had gone big as boiled eggs as he yanked open the drawstring and beheld the glint of gold.
label: Bribery (DotE)

name: Fury of the Khalasar
text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, put a Dothraki character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.
label: Fury of the Khalasar

name: The Lost Message
text: Action: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player adds the top X cards of his or her deck to his or her hand. X is the number of cards he or she shuffled this way. (Limit once per round.)
label: The Lost Message

name: The White Swords
text: When Revealed: You may put a Kingsguard character into play from your hand or discard pile.
label: The White Swords

name: Champion's Challenge
text: Reaction: After an opponent initiates a challenge against you, kneel a character with the highest STR among character you control to end the challenge with no winner or loser. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Champion's Challenge

name: At the Palace of Sorrows
text: Set each character's STR to 3.
label: At the Palace of Sorrows (DotE)

name: Loan from the Iron Bank
text: While Loan from the Iron Bank is in your used pile, reduce the gold value on your revealed plot by 1.
label: Loan from the Iron Bank

name: The Prince Who Came Too Late
text: Standing Action: Search your deck for a character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)
label: The Prince Who Came Too Late

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Ser Davos Seaworth
text: Ser Davos Seaworth cannot be killed.
flavor: "A grey man... neither white nor black, but partaking of both. Is that what you are, Ser Davos?" <cite>Melisandre</cite>
label: Ser Davos Seaworth (TTWDFL)

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Melisandre's Favor
text: Terminal. Take control of attached character. Forced Interrupt: When the dominance phase ends, sacrifice Melisandre's Favor. (Cannot be canceled.)
label: Melisandre's Favor

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Wintertime Marauders
text: While there are more Summer plot cards than Winter plot cards revealed, Wintertime Marauders cannot be declared as an attacker or defender. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Wintertime Marauders is participating, if there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, choose a non-unique card and discard it from play.
label: Wintertime Marauders

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Conquer
text: Non-unique location only. Take control of attached location.
label: Conquer

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Spider's Whisperer
text: Forced Reaction: After Spider's Whisperer enters play, choose an Ally character and discard it from play.
flavor: "The Red Keep has ways known only to ghosts and spiders." <cite>Varys</cite>
label: Spider's Whisperer

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Wheels Within Wheels
text: Action: Kneel a unique [lannister] character to choose and reveal a new plot card. (Max 1 per round.)
flavor: "Sometimes the best way to baffle them is to make moves that have no purpose, or even seem to work against you. Remember that, Sansa, when you come to play the game." <cite>Littlefinger</cite>
label: Wheels Within Wheels (TTWDFL)

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Prince's Loyalist
text: Prized 1. Stealth. Immune to events. Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered character ability would initiate, pay 2 gold to cancel those effects.
label: Prince's Loyalist

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: You Murdered Her Children
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, choose an attacking character and discard it from play (cannot be saved). Then, search its controller's hand and deck for any number of copies of that character and discard them. Shuffle that player's deck.
label: You Murdered Her Children (TTWDFL)

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Samwell Tarly
text: No attachments except Raven. Action: Kneel Samwell Tarly to look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Switch one of those cards with a card in your hand, if able. Then, place the remaining cards on top of your deck in any order.
label: Samwell Tarly (TTWDFL)

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Old Bear Mormont
text: Action: Kneel Old Bear Mormont to choose and stand another [thenightswatch] or Lord character. Reaction: After a character you control is killed, stand Old Bear Mormont.
label: Old Bear Mormont (TTWDFL)

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Catelyn Stark
text: Action: During an [intrigue] or [power] challenge in which you are the defending player, put Catelyn Stark into play from your hand knelt, participating as a defender. At the end of the phase, if Catelyn Stark is still in play, return her to your hand.
label: Catelyn Stark (TTWDFL)

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Snow Castle
text: Action: Kneel Snow Castle to choose a [stark] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR for each [stark] character you control.
label: Snow Castle

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Mad King Aerys
text: Prized 1. Renown. Mad King Aerys cannot be killed unless an opponent controls a Lord or Lady character, or Ser Jaime Lannister. Dominance Action: Kneel Mad King Aerys to choose and kill a Lord or Lady character. (Limit once per round.)
designer: Card design by 2012 Joust World Champion, John Bruno.
label: Mad King Aerys

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: The Hatchlings' Feast
text: Action: Choose 3 characters without attachments. Until the end of the phase, one of those characters gets -1 STR, one gets -2 STR, and one gets -3 STR.
label: The Hatchlings' Feast

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: The Queen of Thorns
text: While The Queen of Thorns is standing, opponents cannot initiate [intrigue] challenges against you.
label: The Queen of Thorns (TTWDFL)

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Olenna's Study
text: Each player may initiate an additional [intrigue] challenge each round. Non-unique characters cannot be declared as attackers or defenders in [intrigue] challenges.
label: Olenna's Study

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Littlefinger
text: Stealth. Littlefinger does not kneel when declared as an attacker. Interrupt: When the effects of an event would initiate, kneel Littlefinger to cancel those effects.
label: Littlefinger (TTWDFL)

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Vale Refugee
text: Forced Reaction: After dominance is determined, if you did not win, discard Vale Refugee from play unless you pay 2 gold.
flavor: "No one can hurt me as long as I stay here." <cite>Robert Arryn</cite>
label: Vale Refugee

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: High Ground
text: Challenges Action: Kneel High Ground to choose and stand an Army character.
flavor: Lord Tywin almost always chose to command the reserve,, he would take the high ground and watch the battle unfold below him, committing his forces when and where they were needed most.
label: High Ground

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: King's Landing
text: Reaction: After you marshal a location, draw 1 card. (Limit 3 times per round.)
flavor: Now the city covered the shore as far as Catelyn could see,, manses and arobrs and granaries, brick storehouses and timbered inns and merchant's stalls, taverns and graveyards and brothels, all piled one on another.
label: King's Landing (TTWDFL)

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Harrenhal
text: Prized 2. If Harrenhal has 3 or more ghost tokens on it, sacrifice it. Interrupt: When the effects of a non-plot, non-agenda triggered ability would initiate, kill a character you own and control to cancel those effects. Place a ghost token on Harrenhal. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Harrenhal (TTWDFL)

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Sky Cell
text: Terminal. Forced Interrupt: When attached character's controller would draw 1 or more cards, kneel attached character. Then, that player draws 1 less card instead. Attached character gains "Action: Kill this character (cannot be saved)."
label: Sky Cell

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Heads on Pikes
text: Prized 2. Dominance Action: For each character in his or her dead pile, each opponent discards the top 2 cards of his or her deck. (Max 1 per round.)
flavor: ... even from a distance she could see the heads rotting atop the high red walls.
label: Heads on Pikes

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Narrow Escape
text: Action: Put each character that was killed or discarded from play this phase into play from its owner's dead or discard pile. An opponent may discard his or her hand (of at least 1 card) to cancel this effect. (Max 1 per phase.)
label: Narrow Escape

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Seductive Promise
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, choose a non-unique character controlled by the losing opponent. Take control of that character. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Seductive Promise

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Westeros Bleeds
text: Dominance Action: Discard each character from play.
flavor: When the old king was still alive, he'd not have stood for this.
label: Westeros Bleeds

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Aloof and Apart
text: Reduce the cost of the first character with printed cost 6 or higher you marshal each round by 2. Each character you control with printed cost 6 or higher gains prized 1.
label: Aloof and Apart

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Dark Wings, Dark Words
text: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. You cannot include more than 1 copy of each event in your deck. Reaction: After you play an event, draw 1 card. (Limit 3 times per round.)
designer: Card design by 2011 Melee World Champion, Corey Faherty.
label: Dark Wings, Dark Words

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Knights of the Realm
text: While you control more Knight characters than each other player, increase the number of cards you draw in the draw phase by 1. While you control fewer Knight characters than each other player, reduce the number of cards you draw in the draw phase by 1.
label: Knights of the Realm

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: The Long Voyage
text: Your minimum deck size is 100 cards. Reaction: After you draw cards in the draw phase, kneel your faction card to draw 1 card.
label: The Long Voyage

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Benjen's Cache
text: When Revealed: If there are no Kingdom plot cards in your used pile, search your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Benjen's Cache

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Rioting
text: Forced Reaction: After the standing phase begins, discard each kneeling character from play (cannot be saved).
label: Rioting

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Rule By Decree
text: When Revealed: Each player with the most cards in hand chooses and discards cards from his or her hand until he or she has 4 cards in hand.
label: Rule By Decree

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: Search and Detain
text: When Revealed: Choose a card without attachments controlled by the first player. Return it to its owner's hand (cannot be saved).
label: Search and Detain

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: The Art of Seduction
text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. That opponent cannot reveal a new plot card during the next plot phase.
label: The Art of Seduction

pack_name: The Things We Do For Love
name: The Gathering Storm
text: When Revealed: Each opponent may return his or her revealed plot card to his or her plot deck and reveal a new plot card.
label: The Gathering Storm

name: Selyse Baratheon
text: Reduce the cost of the first R'hllor attachment you marshal each round by 3.
flavor: "A queen should be a mistress beneath her own roof."
label: Selyse Baratheon (R)

name: Victarion Greyjoy
text: Challenges Action: Kneel a Warship location to stand Victarion Greyjoy. (Limit twice per phase.) Challenges Action: Kneel a Warship location to either: choose and kneel a location, or have Victarion Greyjoy gain renown until the end of the challenge.
label: Victarion Greyjoy (R)

name: Euron Crow's Eye
text: While you control another Raider character, Euron Crow's Eye gains intimidate. Reaction: After Euron Crow's Eye enters play, either: put a Warship location into play from your hand, or search your deck for Silence, reveal it, add it to your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: "You serve one god, Damphair, but I have served ten thousand. From Ib to Asshai, when men see my sails, they pray."
label: Euron Crow's Eye (R)

name: Nighttime Marauders
text: Pillage. Shadow (3). Reaction: After Nighttime Marauders comes out of shadows during the challenges phase, choose a card in an opponent's discard pile. That player reveals their hand and discards from it each card with the same printed cost as the chosen card.
label: Nighttime Marauders (R)

name: Drowned Disciple
text: Reaction: After a character enters play from your dead pile, choose a Drowned God character and have it gain 1 power. (Max twice per phase.)
flavor: "Comforts I shall know in the Drowned God's watery halls beneath the waves." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>
label: Drowned Disciple (R)

name: Drowned God Fanatic
text: Action: Kill a [greyjoy] character you own and control to put Drowned God Fanatic into play from your dead pile. (Max once per round.) Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered character ability would initiate, discard Drowned God Fanatic from your hand to cancel those effects.
designer: Card design by 2013 European Melee champion, Vincent Teulé.
label: Drowned God Fanatic (R)

name: Raider from Pyke
text: Each Item or Weapon card in your hand with printed cost 0 or higher gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost.
label: Raider from Pyke (R)

name: Iron Mines
text: Interrupt: When a character would be killed, if it is not the plot phase, kneel and sacrifice Iron Mines to save that character.
flavor: In those days, the ironborn did not work mines,, that was labor for the captives brought back from the hostings.
label: Iron Mines (R)

name: We Take Westeros!
text: Challenges Action: Kneel a Raider character to choose a location with lower printed cost in a discard pile and put it into play under your control. (Limit once per phase.)
label: We Take Westeros! (R)

name: Taena Merryweather
text: Reaction: After you play an event, choose and discard 1 card from your hand to draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "Dreams turn to dust in light of day."
label: Taena Merryweather (R)

name: The Red Keep
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered character, location, or attachment ability would initiate, kneel The Red Keep and pay 1 gold to cancel those effects. +1 Income.
label: The Red Keep (R)

name: Desert Raider
text: Prized 1. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, put Desert Raider into play from your dead pile to choose a character controlled by the winning opponent. Until the end of the phase, that character loses an [intrigue] or [power] icon and Desert Raider gains that icon.
designer: Card design by 2012 European Melee Champion, Istvan Cserdi.
label: Desert Raider (R)

name: Dorne
text: Reaction: After you lose a [military] or [power] challenge, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand and place the other on the bottom of your deck. +1 Reserve.
label: Dorne (R)

name: Doran's Game
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, gain X power for your faction (to a maximum of 5). X is the number of plot cards in your used pile. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Doran's Game (R)

name: A Mission in Essos
text: Shadow (0). Action: Return a [martell] character you control to your hand. Then, search your deck for a character with lower printed cost that shares a Trait with that character, and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
label: A Mission in Essos (R)

name: Yoren
text: Reaction: After Yoren enters play, choose an opponent. That player must choose a standing character they control with printed cost 5 or lower. Take control of that character until Yoren leaves play.
flavor: "Do what you want to the town, it's naught to me, but leave us be. We're no foes to you."
label: Yoren (R)

name: Clydas
text: Action: Kneel Clydas or a Raven card to move 1 gold from an opponent's gold pool to your own. (Limit twice per round.)
flavor: "I am being foolish, Lord Commander, but ... this letter frightens me."
label: Clydas (R)

name: Halder
text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Kneel X [thenightswatch] locations and/or attachments to choose a [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +X STR. (Limit twice per phase.)
flavor: "It's the builders for me. What use would rangers be if the Wall fell down?"
label: Halder (R)

name: Three-Finger Hobb
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you check reserve, if your hand size is lower than your reserve value, draw 1 card (draw 2 cards instead if your hand size is at least 5 lower than your reserve value.)
flavor: That night, Three-Finger Hobb cooked the boys a special meal to mark the occasion.
label: Three-Finger Hobb (R)

name: Abandoned Stronghold
text: Action: Kneel Abandoned Stronghold to choose a defending character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +X STR. X is the number of Builder characters you control.
label: Abandoned Stronghold (R)

name: Bound for the Wall
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, discard the top 2 cards of the losing opponent's deck. You may put an eligible character of the losing player’s choice from their discard pile into play under your control. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Bound for the Wall (R)

name: Wyman Manderly
text: Action: Kill a standing character you control. Reaction: After a character you control is sacrificed or killed, stand Wyman Manderly and draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "The best pie you have ever tasted, my lords... Wash it down with Arbor gold and savor every bite. I know I shall."
label: Wyman Manderly (R)

name: Meera Reed
text: Shadow (2). Stealth. Forced Reaction: After a Winter plot card is revealed, return Meera Reed to shadows. Reaction: After Meera Reed comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, treat it as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
designer: Card design by 2010 Castle Stahleck Champion, Andrea Gualdoni.
label: Meera Reed (R)

name: Bear Island Scout
text: Reaction: After you marshal Bear Island Scout, if each character you control has the [stark] affiliation, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a House Mormont card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Bear Island Scout (R)

name: Skagos
text: Shadow (1). Action: Kneel and return Skagos to shadows and sacrifice a standing [stark] card to search your deck for a card with the same title as the sacrificed card and put it into play knelt. Shuffle your deck.
label: Skagos (R)

name: Ward
text: Unique character with printed cost 4 or lower only. Terminal. Take control of attached character. Attached character gains prized 1 (prized 2 instead if attached character's printed cost is 3 or higher).
label: Ward (R)

name: I Am No One
text: Action: Choose Arya Stark or a unique character you control with printed cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character loses all faction affiliations and Traits, gains insight, and does not kneel when declared as an attacker.
label: I Am No One (R)

name: Daenerys Targaryen
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Dragon or Title card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play and not attached to Daenerys Targaryen, return it to your hand (cannot be saved).
flavor: "Why do the gods make kings and queens, if not to protect the ones who can't protect themselves?"
label: Daenerys Targaryen (R)

name: Drogon
text: Ambush (6). No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Drogon is attacking, choose a character without attachments controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -3 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.
label: Drogon (R)

name: Hizdahr zo Loraq
text: Action: Discard 1 character card from your hand to reduce the cost of the next card you marshal, ambush, or bring out of shadows this phase by 3. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "One day all men must die, but it serves no good to dwell on death. I prefer to take each day as it comes."
label: Hizdahr zo Loraq (R)

name: Qotho
text: Action: If there is a Summer plot card revealed, discard 2 [targaryen] cards from your hand to put Qotho into play from your hand.
flavor: Qotho was ever the cruelest of the bloodriders.
label: Qotho (R)

name: Womb of the World
text: Action: Kneel Womb of the World to reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put an eligible Dothraki character with the lowest printed cost revealed this way into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.
label: Womb of the World (R)

name: Meereen
text: Action: Kneel Meereen and discard 1 card from your hand to place each card in your hand facedown under Meereen and draw 3 cards. At the end of the phase, or if Meereen leaves play, discard your hand and return each card you placed under Meereen to your hand.
flavor: Meereen would always be the Harpy's city...
label: Meereen (R)

name: Crown of Gold
text: Prized 1. Terminal. Attached character gains the King trait and gets -4 STR.
label: Crown of Gold (R)

name: Gifts for the Widow
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to search your deck for an attachment with printed cost X or lower and put it into play attached to a character you control. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "Gloves for my poor old wrinkled hands. How nice." <cite>The Widow of the Waterfront</cite>
label: Gifts for the Widow (R)

name: Mace Tyrell
text: Reaction: After a unique [tyrell] character enters play under your control, pay 1 gold to have that character gain 1 power. (Limit once per phase.) Action: Kneel your faction card to remove another [tyrell] character you control from the game until the beginning of the next phase.
label: Mace Tyrell (R)

name: The Queen's Retinue
text: Shadow (4). Action: Put The Queen's Retinue into play from shadows. Then, each opponent may draw 2 cards.
label: The Queen's Retinue (R)

name: Oldtown Informer
text: Ambush (2). Bestow (3). Reaction: After a card enters play during the challenges phase, draw X cards. Then, discard X cards. X is the number of gold Oldtown Informer has. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Oldtown Informer (R)

name: Unexpected Guile
text: Character with shadow you control only. Shadow (0). Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, return it to shadows.
label: Unexpected Guile (R)

name: All Men Are Fools
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, choose up to 5 Lady characters. Each chosen character gains 1 power. (Max 1 per phase.)
flavor: "...but the ones in motley are more amusing than ones with crowns." <cite>The Queen of Thorns</cite>
label: All Men Are Fools (R)

name: To the Rose Banner!
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to remove a [tyrell] character you control from the game until the beginning of the next phase.
label: To the Rose Banner! (R)

name: Flea Bottom
text: Bestow (3). Challenges Action: Kneel Flea Bottom and discard 1 gold from it to put a character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your discard pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it on the bottom of your deck.
designer: Card design by 2004 World Champion, Greg Atkinson.
label: Flea Bottom (R)

name: The Iron Bank
text: Bestow (1). During the marshaling phase, you may spend gold on The Iron Bank as if it were in your gold pool. Reaction: After you collect income, move X gold (to a maximum of 5 gold) from the treasury to The Iron Bank. X is the number of gold on The Iron Bank.
label: The Iron Bank (R)

name: Great Hall
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Great Hall to reduce the cost of the next unique character you marshal this phase by 1. (By 2 instead if that character's printed cost is 6 or higher.)
label: Great Hall (R)

name: "The Dornishman's Wife"
text: Interrupt: When a unique character is killed: - if it has a [military] icon, gain 2 gold. - if it has an [intrigue] icon, draw 2 cards. - if it has a [power] icon, it gains 2 power. (Max 1 per phase.)
label: "The Dornishman's Wife" (R)

name: Bribery
text: Action: Choose and kneel a character with printed cost X or lower. Then, if there is no attachment attached to that character and it has the Ally or Mercenary trait, you may take control of it.
flavor: The gaoler's eyes had gone big as boiled eggs as he yanked open the drawstring and beheld the glint of gold.
label: Bribery (R)

name: The Dragon's Tail
text: Action: Choose an opponent. You and that player each draw 2 cards. Melee format only.
flavor: The comet's tail spread across the dawn, a red slash that bled above the crags of Dragonstone like a wound in the pink and purple sky.
label: The Dragon's Tail (R)

name: Kingdom of Shadows
text: You may include non-loyal characters with the printed shadow keyword from any faction in your deck. While you control no in-faction characters, increase the cost to marshal each of your cards into shadows by 1.
label: Kingdom of Shadows (R)

name: Sea of Blood
text: You cannot include neutral events in your deck. Action: Discard 1 blood token from Sea of Blood to reduce the cost of the next event you play this phase by 2. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to place a blood token on Sea of Blood and search the top 10 cards of your deck for an event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Sea of Blood (R)

name: The Free Folk
text: Your plot deck and draw deck can only include neutral cards and non-loyal Wildling characters from any faction. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Wildling character, kneel your faction card to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge.
label: The Free Folk (R)

name: The Wars To Come
text: Your plot deck must be exactly 10 cards. You may include a second copy of up to 2 different cards in your plot deck. While there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile, your non-War plot cards gain Prized 1.
designer: Card design by 2014 European Joust Champion, Donovan van Beek.
label: The Wars To Come (R)

name: Valyrian Steel
text: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of each attachment. Action: Kneel your faction card and pay X gold to put an attachment with printed cost X into play from your hand. Reaction: After an attachment enters play under your control, either: draw a card or gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)
designer: Card design by 2015 Melee World Champion, Corey Faherty.
label: Valyrian Steel (R)

name: Breaking Ties
text: Action: Shuffle a standing loyal character into your deck to choose a non-loyal character or location and return it to its owner's hand. (Limit X times per round, where X is the number of opponents you have.)
designer: Card design by 2016 European Melee Champion, Luiz Gustavo Bretas.
label: Breaking Ties (R)

name: Forced March
text: When Revealed: Kneel X characters you control with a [military] icon. Then, each opponent must choose and kneel X characters they control with a [military] icon, if able.
label: Forced March (R)

name: Littlefinger's Meddling
text: Reduce the cost of the first event you play each phase by 2.
label: Littlefinger's Meddling (R)

name: At the Palace of Sorrows
text: Set each character's STR to 3.
label: At the Palace of Sorrows (R)

name: Return to the Fields
text: When Revealed: You may sacrifice up to 3 characters. For each character sacrificed this way, draw 1 card.
label: Return to the Fields (R)

name: The Annals of Castle Black
text: Twice per phase, each player may play an event in their discard pile as if it were in their hand. Forced Reaction: After an event is placed in a discard pile, remove it from the game.
designer: Card design by 2014 Overall World Champion, Alexander Hynes.
label: The Annals of Castle Black (R)

name: The King in the North
text: Players cannot trigger abilities on characters, locations, or attachments, unless those cards have the King or Queen trait.
designer: Card design by 2015 Joust World Champion, Jakob Hultman.
label: The King in the North (R)

name: Trade Routes
text: When Revealed: Choose a player. Gain 1 gold for each location that player controls.
label: Trade Routes (R)

name: Bonifer the Good
text: Each non-neutral The Seven character you control gains insight.
flavor: "The Crone will light our way, and the Warrior will give strength to our arms."
label: Bonifer the Good

name: Godry the Giantslayer
text: Bestow (1). X is the number of gold Godry the Giantslayer has. While he has 5 or more gold, he gains intimidate. Reaction: After you marshal or play another Knight or R'hllor card, Godry the Giantslayer gains 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "I have slain a giant, boy. Why should I fear some flea-ridden northman who paints one on his shield?"
label: Godry the Giantslayer

name: Left-Hand Lucas Codd
text: Stealth. Reaction: After no defenders are declared in a challenge in which you control an attacking Raider character, place 1 gold from the treasury on a card.
flavor: "I am unwed."
label: Left-Hand Lucas Codd

name: Cragorn
text: Bestow (3). Challenges Action: Discard 1 gold from a Raider character to search the top 10 cards of your deck for an Item or Weapon attachment with printed cost 3 or lower and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Cragorn

name: Ser Addam Marbrand
text: Reaction: After an Army or Knight card enters play under your control, Ser Addam Marbrand gains 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.) Reaction: After a character enters your discard pile, discard 1 gold from Ser Addam Marbrand to return it to your hand. (Limit twice per round.)
label: Ser Addam Marbrand

name: Ser Harys Swyft
text: Action: Move 1 gold from your gold pool to a card without gold. (Limit twice per round.) +1 Income.
label: Ser Harys Swyft

name: Mellario of Norvos
text: While you have Arianne Martell in your hand, reduce the cost to marshal her by 1. While you control: - Doran Martell, he gains: "immune to opponents' plot effects." - Quentyn Martell, he gets +2 STR. - Trystane Martell, he gains insight.
label: Mellario of Norvos

name: The Tattered Prince
text: Bestow (2). Renown. Shadow (2). Forced Reaction: After a plot card enters your used pile, return The Tattered Prince to shadows unless you discard 1 gold from him.
label: The Tattered Prince

name: Dywen
text: Stealth. Each [thenightswatch] character you control with stealth does not kneel when declared as an attacker during a [military] challenge. +1 Reserve.
label: Dywen

name: Leathers
text: Each Giant character you control gains an [intrigue] icon. Each Wildling character you control gains the [thenightswatch] affiliation. Reaction: After Leathers enters play, search your deck for a Giant character, reveal it and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Leathers

name: Rickard Karstark
text: Challenges Action: Kneel a The North location to have each player sacrifice a character or location. (Limit once per phase.) Reaction: After a Winter plot card is revealed, return a The North location from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Rickard Karstark

name: Harwin
text: Bestow (2). No attachments except Warhorse. Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating non-loyal character, discard 1 gold from Harwin to choose a character you control with 2 or more keywords and have it participate in the challenge on your side. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Harwin

name: Reznak mo Reznak
text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After a character is discarded from your hand, Reznak mo Reznak gains 1 gold. Then, you may discard X gold from him to put that character into play from your discard pile, where X is that character's printed cost. (Limit twice per round.)
label: Reznak mo Reznak

name: Haldon Halfmaester
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Haldon Halfmaester is participating, reveal the top card of your deck: - Place 1 gold from the treasury on a card with the same cardtype. - If it is an event, draw it. - If it is Aegon Targaryen, put him into play.
label: Haldon Halfmaester

name: Orton Merryweather
text: Reaction: After a player marshals or plays a Small Council card, return an event from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit once per phase.) Interrupt: When Orton Merryweather leaves play, put a non-unique Spy character into play from your hand.
label: Orton Merryweather

name: Ser Emmon Cuy
text: Bestow (1). Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, discard 1 gold from Ser Emmon Cuy to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. Then, if he has no gold, kill him. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Ser Emmon Cuy

name: Vargo Hoat
text: Bestow (2). Reaction: After a card with bestow enters play, it gains 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.) Action: Move 1 gold from Vargo Hoat to a character with 2 or less gold. Until the end of the phase, Vargo Hoat gains that character's keywords.
label: Vargo Hoat

name: Balerion
text: Ambush (2). No attachments except Cat. Balerion cannot be killed. Action: Kneel Balerion to discard 1 gold from a card.
flavor: "That's the real king of this castle right there, older than sin and twice as mean."
label: Balerion

name: Free Companies
text: Each neutral character you control gets -1 STR if it has no gold. Action: Kneel your faction card to place 1 gold from the treasury on, either: a card without gold, or a Mercenary character.
label: Free Companies

name: The Pointy End
text: When Revealed: Choose a character. If there are 2 or more attachments attached to that character, discard each attachment from it. Otherwise, discard each duplicate and each power from it.
label: The Pointy End

name: Wraith
text: While you control Dale Seaworth, he gains stealth. Action: Kneel and sacrifice Wraith to choose and kneel a location.
label: Wraith

name: Support from the Iron Bank
text: Action: Reduce the cost of each [baratheon] non-character card you marshal or play this phase by 1.
flavor: If Stannis was not too stiff-necked to accept their terms, the Braavosi would give him all the gold and silver he required, coin enough to buy a dozen sellsword companies, to bribe a hundred lords, to keep his men paid, fed, clothed, and armed.
label: Support from the Iron Bank

name: Harlaw
text: Reduce the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1. Reduce the cost of each House Harlaw card you marshal by 1. +1 Reserve.
label: Harlaw

name: Silence
text: Each Raider character you control gains pillage. While an opponent has 10 or more cards in their discard pile, each Raider character you control gets +1 STR.
label: Silence (JS)

name: Milk Snakes
text: Ambush (4). Bestow (1). Stealth. Each Clansman character you control with 1 or more gold gains a [power] icon. Action: Move 1 gold from Milk Snakes to a Clansman character you control.
label: Milk Snakes

name: Ser Boros Blount
text: Ambush (3). Shadow (1). Reaction: After Ser Boros Blount enters play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Kingsguard character or a non-[lannister] Knight character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play.
label: Ser Boros Blount

name: Elia Sand
text: While Elia Sand is attacking, if you control another attacking Sand Snake character, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.
flavor: The girl was mad for horses, which might be why she often smelled like one, to the despair of her mother.
label: Elia Sand (JS)

name: Brimstone
text: Each Sand Snake character you control gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Kneel Brimstone and return a Sand Snake character to your hand to gain 1 gold.
label: Brimstone

name: Left Hand Lew
text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Kneel Left Hand Lew to choose and stand a character owned by an opponent.
label: Left Hand Lew

name: Old Steward
text: +1 Reserve.
label: Old Steward

name: Greywater Watch
text: Shadow (1). Action: Kneel and return Greywater Watch to shadows and kneel a [stark] character to have it participate in the current challenge on your side. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Greywater Watch

name: "The Winter Maid"
text: Interrupt: When a plot card is revealed, that plot card gains the Winter trait until the end of the round. If there are no Summer plot cards revealed, return "The Winter Maid" to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile. (Max 1 per phase.)
label: "The Winter Maid"

name: Grey Worm
text: No attachments except Weapon. Grey Worm does not kneel when declared as a defender against an opponent with more cards in their hand than you.
label: Grey Worm (JS)

name: Tyrion Lannister
text: Bestow (3). Stealth. Action: Discard 1 gold from Tyrion Lannister to put a Mercenary character into play under your control from any player’s discard pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it on the bottom of its owner's deck. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Tyrion Lannister (JS)

name: Randyll Tarly
text: Renown. Action: Kneel a The Reach location to, either: stand an Army character, or reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a location, draw it (put it into play instead if it has the The Reach trait). (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Randyll Tarly (JS)

name: Ser Bryce Caron
text: Each Knight character you control gets +1 STR.
label: Ser Bryce Caron

name: Gulltown City Guard
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reduce the cost to marshal Gulltown City Guard by 1 for each City plot card in your used pile (to a minimum of 1).
label: Gulltown City Guard

name: King's Landing Smuggler
text: Interrupt: When King's Landing Smuggler leaves play, place 1 gold from the treasury on a card without gold.
label: King's Landing Smuggler

name: Gulltown
text: Limited. Each player is considered to have 1 additional City plot card in their used pile. +1 Income.
label: Gulltown

name: City Festival
text: When Revealed: Gain 3 gold. (6 gold instead if there are 2 or more City plot cards in your used pile.)
label: City Festival

name: Ser Richard Horpe
text: Renown. Ser Richard Horpe gets +1 STR for each power he has. Action: Move 1 power from a card you control to another card in play. (Limit once per round.)
label: Ser Richard Horpe

name: Sellsails
text: Bestow (2). Action: Discard 1 gold from Sellsails to choose and stand a Smuggler or Warship card. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: The striped hulls of Lysene war galleys had been seen offshore, and Varys had reports from Myr of sellsail captains taking service with Dragonstone.
label: Sellsails

name: Dark and Full of Terrors
text: Play only if you control a R'hllor character. Action: Choose a kneeling character with STR 3 or lower and place it in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.
flavor: For the night is dark and full of terrors.
label: Dark and Full of Terrors

name: No Song So Sweet
text: Action: During a [power] challenge, choose a standing [baratheon] character you control and have it participate in the challenge on your side. Reaction: After you play a Song event, pay 1 gold to return No Song So Sweet from your discard pile to your hand.
label: No Song So Sweet

name: Set Down Our Deeds
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to discard up to 3 power from a card you own. Draw 2 cards for each power discarded this way.
flavor: Ser Cortnay Penrose wore no armor. He sat a sorrel stallion, his standard-bearer a dapple grey. Above them flapped Baratheon's crowned stag and the crossed quills of Penrose, white on a russet field.
label: Set Down Our Deeds

name: Black Lorren
text: Bestow (1). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Black Lorren is attacking, discard 1 gold from an attacking Raider character to choose and kill a defending character.
flavor: "The singers call Andrik best now. And Black Lorren and Qarl the Maid are near as dread." <cite>Dagmer Cleftjaw</cite>
label: Black Lorren

name: Sea Song
text: While you control The Reader, he gains insight. Reaction: After 1 or more cards are discarded for reserve, either: draw 1 card, or gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit twice per round.)
label: Sea Song

name: Saltcliffe
text: Action: Kneel Saltcliffe to move 1 gold from the treasury or a card in play to a Raider character without gold.
flavor: The islands are stern and stony places, scant of comfort and bleak of prospect. Death is never far here, and life is mean and meager.
label: Saltcliffe

name: Though All Men Do Despise Us
text: Reaction: After no defenders are declared, each attacking Raider character gains 1 power. (Max 1 per challenge.)
flavor: The Codds were not well regarded in the Iron Islands,, the men were said to be thieves and cowards, the women wantons who bedded with their own fathers and brothers.
label: Though All Men Do Despise Us

name: No Godless Man
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge in which you control a participating Drowned God character, for every 5 STR by which you won the challenge, draw 1 card and discard 1 card at random from the losing opponent’s hand. (Max 1 per challenge.)
flavor: "No godless man may sit the Seastone Chair." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>
label: No Godless Man

name: Ser Lancel Lannister
text: Power on Lord or Lady characters does not count towards their controllers' power total. Action: Kneel Ser Lancel Lannister to put Warrior's Sons into play from your hand or discard pile.
flavor: "On the morrow I will return to King's Landing and swear my sword to the new High Septon and the Seven. I mean to take vows and join the Warrior's Sons."
label: Ser Lancel Lannister (HMW)

name: Bronn
text: Bestow (3). No attachments except Weapon. Bronn gets +2 STR for each gold he has. Interrupt: When a Lord or Lady character would be killed, discard each gold (cannot be 0) from Bronn to save it. Then, if that character was Tyrion Lannister, you may return Bronn to your hand.
label: Bronn (HMW)

name: Mountain's Man
text: [lannister] character only. Attached character gains the House Clegane trait. Reaction: After attached character discards a card using pillage, choose and kneel a card with lower printed cost than that card's.
flavor: "Unleash Ser Gregor and send him before us with his reavers. Tell them I want to see the riverlands afire from the Gods Eye to the Red Fork." <cite>Tywin Lannister</cite>
label: Mountain's Man

name: "A Lion Still Has Claws"
text: Reduce the cost to play "A Lion Still Has Claws" by 1 for each Scheme plot card revealed. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, choose a Trait. Return each character with that Trait and printed cost X or lower to its owner’s hand.
flavor: "In a coat of gold or a coat of red, a lion still has claws. And mine are long and sharp, my lord, as long and sharp as yours." <cite>The Rains of Castamere</cite>
label: "A Lion Still Has Claws"

name: Burning Bright
text: Action: Put an Army or Knight character into play from your discard pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved).
flavor: Ser Addam Marbrand had the command. Tyrion saw his banner unfurl as his standard-bearer shook it out,, a burning tree, orange and smoke.
label: Burning Bright

name: Anders Yronwood
text: Intimidate. While you are not the first player, each House Yronwood character you control does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the first challenge you initiate each phase.
flavor: The most powerful of the Dornish lords was Anders Yronwood, the Bloodroyal, Lord of Yronwood and Warden of the Stone Way.
label: Anders Yronwood

name: Edric Dayne
text: Reaction: After a non-loyal card enters your discard pile, place it in shadows (without that card gaining the shadow keyword.). (Limit once per round.)
label: Edric Dayne (HMW)

name: Sword of the Morning
text: Unique [martell] character or House Dayne character only. While attached character is attacking, it gets +1 STR for each defending character. Reaction: After attached character is declared as an attacker, choose up to 3 characters controlled by the defending player. Each of those characters must be declared as a defender for this challenge, if able.
label: Sword of the Morning

name: Elia's Lance
text: Sand Snake character only. Ambush (2). If attached character is Elia Sand, she gains stealth. Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which attached character is attacking, the winning opponent must choose and return a defending character to its owner’s hand.
label: Elia's Lance

name: We Guard the Way
text: Action: Choose X characters with the Guard or House Yronwood trait. Until the end of the phase, each chosen character gains renown and does not kneel when declared as a defender.
label: We Guard the Way

name: Old Tattersalt
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Old Tattersalt enters play, search the top X cards of your deck for a card with printed cost 1 or lower, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. X is your reserve value. Action: Kneel Blackbird to return Old Tattersalt to shadows.
label: Old Tattersalt

name: First Ranger
text: Unique character only. Attached character gains a [military] icon and the Ranger trait. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which you control a participating Ranger character, choose and kill a non-unique character with STR X or lower controlled by the losing opponent. X is the number of Ranger characters you control. (Limit once per phase.)
label: First Ranger

name: Lord Steward
text: Unique character only. Attached character gains an [intrigue] icon and the Steward trait. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which you control a participating Steward character, choose a character with printed cost X or lower controlled by the losing opponent. Take control of it until the end of the phase. X is the number of Steward characters you control. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Lord Steward

name: I Pledge My Life and Honor
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a [thenightswatch] character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. Then, sacrifice a character that shares a Trait with that character.
flavor: ...to the Night's Watch, for this night and all the nights to come.
label: I Pledge My Life and Honor

name: Corn, Corn, Corn
text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, kneel a Steward or Raven card to choose an opponent who does not support you and a challenge type that has not been initiated against you this phase. That player must satisfy the claim of that challenge type as if you were the winning opponent. (Max 1 per phase.)
label: Corn, Corn, Corn

name: Farlen
text: Each unique Direwolf character you control gains renown. Reaction: After you marshal Farlen, search your hand, deck, and discard pile for The Wolfswood and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
label: Farlen

name: Reek
text: Shadow (2). If you control Theon Greyjoy, sacrifice Reek. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which you control an attacking House Bolton character, give control of Reek to the losing opponent. Then, choose a non-loyal character controlled by that player and take control of it.
label: Reek (HMW)

name: Our Blades are Sharp
text: While you control Harrenhal or The Dreadfort, reduce the cost to play Our Blades Are Sharp by 1. Action: Sacrifice a non-[stark] card to return up to 2 House Bolton cards from your discard and/or dead pile to your hand.
label: Our Blades are Sharp

name: Family, Duty, Honor
text: Interrupt: When a House Tully character you control would leave play, discard 1 power from that character to save it.
flavor: "There was a time when Cat was all I wanted in this world.... but she was a daughter of Riverrun, and Hoster Tully. Family, Duty, Honor, Sansa. Family, Duty, Honor meant I could never have her hand." <cite>Littlefinger</cite>
label: Family, Duty, Honor

name: Here We Stand
text: Play only if you control a standing House Mormont character. Dominance Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for any number of Bear Island, Bearskin Cloak, and House Mormont cards, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Here We Stand

name: Golden Company
text: Bestow (1). While Golden Company has 1 or more gold, it gains renown. Interrupt: When a Mercenary character would be returned to your hand, discard 1 gold from Golden Company to save that character.
label: Golden Company

name: Septa Lemore
text: While you control Aegon Targaryen, he gains insight. Interrupt: When Septa Lemore leaves play, choose a [targaryen] character you control with shadow. Return that character to shadows.
label: Septa Lemore

name: Our Word Is Good as Gold
text: Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Mercenary character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.
flavor: Our word is good as gold has been their boast since the days of Bittersteel.
label: Our Word Is Good as Gold

name: The Dragon Has Three Heads
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, each Dragon character you control gains: - intimidate, if you control Drogon. - renown, if you control Rhaegal. - stealth, if you control Viserion.
label: The Dragon Has Three Heads

name: Beneath the Gold, the Bitter Steel
text: Challenges Action: Choose a Mercenary character with 1 or more gold. Until the end of the phase, it gains renown and no attachments except Item. If it has 3 or more gold, it gains insight and intimidate until the end of the phase.
label: Beneath the Gold, the Bitter Steel

name: Mina Redwyne
text: Reaction: After The Queen of Thorns or a House Redwyne card enters play under your control or your discard pile, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Mina Redwyne

name: Ser Guyard Morrigen
text: Bestow (1). Each Rainbow Guard character you control with 1 or more gold gains an [intrigue] icon. Reaction: After a Summer plot card is revealed, place 1 gold from the treasury on, either: a Knight character, or each Rainbow Guard character you control. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Ser Guyard Morrigen

name: Behold our Bounty
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, return an attacking Small Council or Spy character to your hand to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge.
label: Behold our Bounty

name: First in Battle
text: Play only if you control 3 or more The Reach locations. Challenges Action: Each Army or House Tarly character you control does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the first challenge you initiate this phase.
label: First in Battle

name: We Light the Way
text: Action: Kneel a House Hightower or Oldtown card to place the top card of your deck in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.
flavor: And beyond, where the Honeywine widened into Whispering Sound, rose the Hightower, its beacon fires bright against the dawn.
label: We Light the Way

name: Lady Stoneheart
text: Intimidate. Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, each player must choose and kill a loyal or House Frey character they control, if able. Dominance Action: Discard 1 kiss token from a character or 1 power from a Brotherhood character to put Lady Stoneheart into play from your dead pile.
label: Lady Stoneheart

name: Brave Companions
text: Bestow (1). Pillage. Brave Companions get +1 STR for each character you control with 1 or more gold. Reaction: After you marshal Brave Companions, search the top 10 cards of your deck for an Army character, a Commander character, and a Mercenary character, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Brave Companions

name: Septon Utt
text: Bestow (2). Each unique character you control with 2 or more gold gains insight.
flavor: "I pray to the Warrior for strength, but the gods made me weak."
label: Septon Utt

name: Kindly Man
text: Ambush (4). Shadow (2). Reaction: After Kindly Man stands, choose an agenda or a card in play and, either: place a non-gold, non-power token of your choice on that card,, or discard a non-gold, non-power token from that card. (Limit 3 times per round.)
label: Kindly Man

name: Shagwell
text: Bestow (1). While a character with 1 or more gold has a keyword, each Fool character with 1 or more gold gains that keyword.
flavor: "You mustn't hurt sweet Shagwell, I'm too droll to die."
label: Shagwell

name: Jinglebell
text: Interrupt: When Jinglebell is killed, search your deck for a card that shares a Trait with him, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "A son for a son, heh. But that’s a grandson… and he never was much use." <cite>Walder Frey</cite>
label: Jinglebell

name: Sweetsleep
text: Terminal. Treat the printed text box of each other attachment attached to the attached card as if it were blank (except for Traits).
label: Sweetsleep

name: The Higher Mysteries
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating Maester character, reveal the top card of your deck and put it into play.
flavor: "I have studied what the Citadel calls the higher mysteries—magic, for want of a better word. A fascinating pursuit, but of small use, which is why so few maesters trouble themselves with it." <cite>Maester Luwin</cite>
label: The Higher Mysteries

name: As High as Honor
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel a neutral location with printed cost 1 or higher to put a neutral card into play from your hand knelt. Then, if that card has the House Arryn trait, stand it.
flavor: The Arryns were proud, and prickly of their honor.
label: As High as Honor

name: We Stand Together
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, choose and stand an attacking House Frey character. (Stand each attacking House Frey character instead if it was the third challenge you initiated this phase.)
label: We Stand Together

name: A Mummer's Farce
text: Your deck may include non-loyal Fool characters from any faction. You may marshal or play facedown cards you control attached to a Fool character as if they were in your hand. Forced Reaction: After a Fool character you control stands, attach the top card of your deck facedown to it, as a Weapon attachment with the text: "Terminal. Attached character gets +1 STR."
label: A Mummer's Farce

name: The Many-Faced God
text: Your plot deck cannot include Kingdom plot cards. Reduce the cost of the first card you ambush each round by 1. Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a character you control and a player. Until the end of the phase, that character gains each of the printed challenge icons, keywords, faction affiliations, and Traits of the top character in that player's dead pile.
label: The Many-Faced God

name: The Crone
text: Each character with printed STR 1 or lower cannot leave play.
label: The Crone

name: The Father
text: Forced Interrupt: When the dominance phase ends, choose a unique non-Army character controlled by each player. Then, return each of those characters to its owner's hand.
label: The Father

name: The Late Lord Frey
text: Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, put a House Frey card into play from your hand or discard pile.
label: The Late Lord Frey

name: The Maiden
text: While The Maiden is in your used pile, increase the initiative value on your revealed plot card by 2, and the reserve value on your revealed The Seven plot card by 2.
label: The Maiden

name: The Mother
text: Reaction: After a character enters play under an opponent's control, if another character entered play under that player's control this round, draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round.)
label: The Mother

name: The Smith
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel an attachment to choose and kneel a location.
label: The Smith

name: The Stranger
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses a character controlled by an opponent. Then, kill each character with the same printed cost as the chosen characters.
label: The Stranger

name: The Warrior
text: During a challenge in which you control an attacking The Seven character, raise the claim value on The Warrior by 1.
label: The Warrior

name: King Stannis's Host
text: Assault. No attachments. Renown. While you control Stannis Baratheon, he gains stealth. During [power] challenges, each participating character an opponent controls gets -1 STR.
label: King Stannis's Host

name: The Holy Hundred
