text: Assault. No attachments except Weapon. Each The Seven character you control gets +1 STR.
flavor: "They pray well, I suppose, but can they fight?" <cite>Jaime Lannister</cite>
label: The Holy Hundred

name: Summerhall
text: While Summerhall is standing, cards cannot enter or leave play during [power] challenges.
flavor: "Did we learn nothing from Summerhall? No good has ever come from these dreams of dragons, I told Axell as much." <cite>Alester Florent</cite>
label: Summerhall (FtR)

name: The Iron Fleet
text: Assault. No attachments. Pillage. Reduce the cost of each Raider character you marshal by 1. Reaction: After you initiate a challenge in which you control an attacking Raider character, discard the top card of each opponent's deck.
label: The Iron Fleet

name: Foamdrinker
text: While you control Dagmer Cleftjaw, he gains assault. Action: Kneel Foamdrinker to choose a Captain or Raider character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a challenge icon of your choice.
label: Foamdrinker

name: Valyrian Steel Armor
text: If attached character is Euron Crow's Eye, he gains insight. While you control no non-Army characters with printed cost 6 or higher other than attached character, attached character cannot be killed or discarded from play.
label: Valyrian Steel Armor

name: Lord Tywin's Host
text: Assault. No attachments. Pillage. While you control Tywin Lannister, he gains a [military] icon. Reaction: After a [lannister] character you control discards a card using pillage, the losing opponent must choose and discard a card with the same cardtype from their hand unless they reveal a hand containing no cards with that cardtype. (Limit 3 times per round.)
label: Lord Tywin's Host

name: Ser Jacelyn Bywater
text: Ambush (5). You may ambush non-unique [lannister] characters from your discard pile as if they were in your hand.
flavor: "You will find Ser Jacelyn to be courageous, honorable, obedient... and most grateful" <cite>Varys</cite>
label: Ser Jacelyn Bywater

name: Fair Isle
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Fair Isle to choose an opponent. That player chooses 2 cards in their hand, if able, and places them on top of their deck in any order. At the end of the phase, that player draws 2 cards. +1 Income.
label: Fair Isle

name: Lord Anders's Host
text: Ambush (8). Assault. No attachments. Reaction: After a card enters play from your hand or shadows area during a challenge, choose a participating character with a lower printed cost than that card's and return it to its owner's hand. (Limit once per round.) +1 Initiative
label: Lord Anders's Host

name: Windblown
text: Assault. Shadow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Windblown is participating, return it to shadows to choose and stand an Army or Mercenary character.
flavor: The men of the Windblown used what names they would, and changed them at a whim.
label: Windblown

name: Sandstone
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, kneel Sandstone to have an attacking character gain 1 power for each defending character with fewer than 2 challenge icons (to a maximum of 3 power).
label: Sandstone

name: Great Ranging
text: Assault. Insight. Intimidate. No attachments. Reaction: After you marshal Great Ranging, search your hand, deck, and discard pile for Fist of the First Men and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. +1 Reserve
label: Great Ranging

name: Old Bear's Raven
text: Ambush (2). No attachments. Action: Return Old Bear's Raven to your hand to stand Old Bear Mormont. (Max twice per round.)
flavor: "He is a rare bird." <cite>Aemon Targaryen</cite>
label: Old Bear's Raven (FtR)

name: You Know Nothing
text: Challenges Action: Until the end of the phase, each non-Army character an opponent controls loses all keywords.
flavor: "I know nothing, Ygritte, and perhaps I never will." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>
label: You Know Nothing

name: The Blackfish
text: Renown. Stealth. Each [stark] Army character you control gains an [intrigue] icon.
flavor: Ser Brynden Tully was Robb's eyes and ears, the commander of his scouts and outriders.
label: The Blackfish (FtR)

name: Brynden's Outriders
text: Assault. No attachments. While you control a The Riverlands location, Brynden's Outriders gains stealth. While you control a Commander character, Brynden's Outriders gains a [power] icon.
label: Brynden's Outriders

name: Grey Wind
text: Unique [stark] character only. Attached character gains stealth. Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered character ability would initiate, return a Direwolf card to your hand to cancel those effects. (Limit once per phase.) Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Grey Wind to a different character. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Grey Wind (FtR)

name: Ser Barristan Selmy
text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Barristan Selmy is participating, discard 1 card from your hand to, either: stand each defending Knight character, or raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Ser Barristan Selmy (FtR)

name: Mother's Men
text: Assault. No attachments. Reaction: After an opponent’s character is killed by a card effect, put Mother's Men into play from your discard pile.
flavor: "Wherever the Mother of Dragons goes, the Mother's Men will go as well." <cite>Marselen</cite>
label: Mother's Men

name: Griffin's Roost
text: While you control Jon Connington, he gains a [power] icon. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, kneel your faction card to choose 1 card in your hand and place it facedown in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, if it does not have the printed shadow keyword, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.
label: Griffin's Roost

name: The Redwyne Fleet
text: Assault. No attachments. While you control Paxter Redwyne, he gains a [military] and a [power] icon, and the Commander trait. Reaction: After a House Redwyne card you control is knelt, gain 1 gold. (Limit 3 times per round.)
label: The Redwyne Fleet

name: Longtable
text: Each Small Council character you control gets +1 STR. Reduce the cost of the first Small Council or Spy character you marshal, ambush, or bring out of shadows each phase by 1.
label: Longtable

name: Goldengrove
text: Action: Kneel Goldengrove or a Small Council character to choose another card you own with equal or lower printed cost. Stand that card and take control of it. (Limit twice per round.)
label: Goldengrove

name: Harma Dogshead
text: Pillage. Reaction: After a Wildling character you control discards a card using pillage, search the top 10 cards of your deck for an Item or Weapon attachment with printed cost 2 or lower and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Harma Dogshead

name: Thenns
text: Assault. Pillage. No attachments except Weapon. Thenns cannot target a location using assault unless each character you declare as an attacker has the Army or Wildling trait.
flavor: The Thenns were hardened warriors, and more disciplined than the common run of wildling.
label: Thenns

name: Squire
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Squire to reduce the cost of the next Army or Knight character you marshal this phase by 1. (By 2 instead if that character's printed cost is 6 or higher.)
label: Squire

name: Magnar of Thenn
text: Unique Wildling character only. Attached character gains the Lord trait and pillage. Interrupt: When attached character would be killed, sacrifice another Wildling character to save it.
label: Magnar of Thenn

name: For the Realm
text: Reduce the cost of the first Army or Stronghold card you marshal this round by 4.
label: For the Realm

name: Battle of the Trident
text: Your plot deck must be exactly 10 Edict, Siege, or War cards. Reaction: After claim is applied for a challenge in which you control an attacking Army or Commander character, kneel your faction card to reveal: - a War plot if it is a [military] challenge. - an Edict plot if it is an [intrigue] challenge. - a Siege plot if it is a [power] challenge. Then, choose a plot card in your used pile. Remove that card from the game until you have exactly 1 card in your plot deck.
label: Battle of the Trident

name: Gendry
text: While you control no loyal characters, Gendry gains renown. Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, choose a non-loyal character with a Weapon attachment. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains each of Gendry's keywords.
label: Gendry (BtB)

name: Antler Men
text: Reaction: After power is moved to your faction card, gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per round.)
flavor: "They call themselves the Antler Men, after the crowned stag." <cite>Varys</cite>
label: Antler Men

name: Storm's End
text: During the challenges phase, characters without a [power] icon cannot stand. Reaction: After a [military] or [intrigue] challenge is initiated by or against you, kneel Storm's End to change the challenge type to [power].
label: Storm's End (BtB)

name: Erik Anvil-Breaker
text: Intimidate. Pillage. Renown. Erik Anvil-Breaker cannot stand during the standing phase.
flavor: "Stand up, Erik. Stand up and I'll shout your name with all the rest. Stand up and I'll be the first to follow you." <cite>Asha Greyjoy</cite>
label: Erik Anvil-Breaker

name: Fleet from Ten Towers
text: Assault. No attachments. While Fleet from Ten Towers is attacking an opponent whose reserve value is 4 or lower, it gets +3 STR and gains renown.
label: Fleet from Ten Towers

name: Pyke
text: Each Warship location in your hand gains ambush (X). X is 1 less than that card's printed cost. Reaction: After a [greyjoy] location enters play under your control, choose another non-loyal, non-limited card with equal or lower printed cost. Kneel Pyke to place that card on top of its owner's deck. Then, at the end of the phase, that player draws 1 card.
label: Pyke (BtB)

name: Ser Jaime Lannister
text: Renown. Forced Reaction: After a character enters play during the challenges phase, stand Ser Jaime Lannister. Then, discard that character from play.
label: Ser Jaime Lannister (BtB)

name: Casterly Rock
text: While Casterly Rock is standing, you may spend gold on [lannister] cards you control as if it were in your gold pool. Marshaling Action: Kneel Casterly Rock to choose up to 3 cards. Each of those cards gains 1 gold.
label: Casterly Rock (BtB)

name: Lady Whiskers
text: Unique character with printed cost 3 or lower only. Ambush (1). If attached character is Tommen Baratheon, he gains stealth. Attached character does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [power] challenge.
label: Lady Whiskers

name: Trystane Martell
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Trystane Martell enters play, choose a character with no challenge icons and return it to its owner's hand.
label: Trystane Martell (BtB)

name: Scorpion Knight
text: Reaction: After a character loses a challenge icon, Scorpion Knight gets +1 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
label: Scorpion Knight

name: Sunspear
text: During the challenges phase, you may spend gold on Sunspear as if it were in your gold pool. Reaction: After a [martell] card enters play under your control, Sunspear gains 1 gold. (2 gold instead if that card is a Lord or Lady character.) (Limit once per phase.)
label: Sunspear (BtB)

name: Samwell Tarly
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Samwell Tarly is participating, if your reserve value is: - 6 or higher, draw 1 card. - 8 or higher, gain 1 power for your faction. - 10 or higher, choose and stand another character that shares a Trait with him, if able.
label: Samwell Tarly (BtB)

name: Castle Black
text: Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, choose and stand a [thenightswatch] character or Castle Black. (Limit once per phase.) Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered location ability would initiate, kneel Castle Black to cancel those effects.
label: Castle Black (BtB)

name: First Builder
text: Unique character you control only. Attached character gains a [power] icon and the Builder trait. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge in which you control a participating Builder character, search the top 10 cards of your deck for an attachment or location with printed cost X or lower, reveal it, and add it to your hand. X is the number of Builder characters you control. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per phase.)
label: First Builder

name: Bran Stark
text: Each Old Gods character you control cannot be knelt by card effects. Interrupt: When claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge in which you control a participating Old Gods character, instead of the normal claim effects, look at the defending player's hand. Choose and discard X cards from that hand, if able. X is the claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card.
label: Bran Stark (BtB)

name: Lady
text: No attachments. Interrupt: When another Direwolf card or Sansa Stark would leave play, kill Lady to save that card.
flavor: "She is of the north. She deserves better than a butcher." <cite>Eddard Stark</cite>
label: Lady (BtB)

name: Winterfell Castle
text: Each character with the highest printed cost among unique [stark] characters you control gains the Old Gods trait and insight. Interrupt: When an Old Gods card would be killed or discarded from play, kneel that card to save it. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Winterfell Castle (BtB)

name: Ser Rolly Duckfield
text: While you control Aegon Targaryen, he gains a [military] icon. Interrupt: When a King or Lord character would be killed, discard 1 card from your hand to save it. (Limit once per round.)
label: Ser Rolly Duckfield

name: Warlock of Qarth
text: Reaction: After a character enters an opponent's dead pile, sacrifice Warlock of Qarth to put that character into play under your control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains insight. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it in its owner's dead pile (cannot be saved).
label: Warlock of Qarth

name: The Great Pyramid
text: Twice per round, you may marshal or play a facedown card under a Meereen location you control as if it were in your hand. Reaction: After 1 or more cards are discarded from your hand, place them facedown under The Great Pyramid. If The Great Pyramid leaves play, remove each card you placed under it from the game. (Limit twice per round.)
label: The Great Pyramid

name: Alla Tyrell
text: Interrupt: When Alla Tyrell is revealed from your hand or deck, put her into play.
flavor: Alla Tyrell would be of great help, if Taena could deliver her.
label: Alla Tyrell

name: Highgarden
text: Action: Kneel Highgarden to reveal up to 3 [tyrell] characters from your hand. For each card revealed this way, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. (You may choose the same character more than once.) Challenges Action: Return a unique [tyrell] character you control to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Highgarden (BtB)

name: Brienne the Blue
text: Action: Choose a character that is attacking or defending alone. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +5 STR. (+10 STR instead if it is a Rainbow Guard character or Brienne of Tarth.)
label: Brienne the Blue

name: Zollo the Fat
text: Reaction: After an opponent gains gold, if it is not the marshaling phase, sacrifice Zollo the Fat to move all gold from that player's gold pool to your own.
flavor: Captured again by the Brave Companions, and maimed at the word of Vargo Hoat their captain, losing his sword hand to the blade of Zollo the Fat.
label: Zollo the Fat

name: King's Landing
text: Reaction: After a King's Landing location enters play, kneel it to draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round.) Marshaling Action: Kneel a King's Landing location to gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: King's Landing (BtB)

name: The Horn of Winter
text: Unique character only. Attached character gains assault. Reaction: After you win a challenge, sacrifice The Horn of Winter to choose a location that was targeted by assault this challenge. Until the end of the round, treat that location as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). If it is a Stronghold location or The Wall, you may discard it from play instead.
label: The Horn of Winter

name: "Florian and Jonquil"
text: Action: Choose a unique character with printed cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown. Then, attach "Florian and Jonquil" to that character as an attachment with the text: "Terminal. Attached character gains the Fool and Knight traits."
label: "Florian and Jonquil"

name: Bran the Builder
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a location, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Bran the Builder

name: The Mad King's Command
text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, each player chooses up to 3 characters, up to 3 locations, up to 3 attachments, and up to 3 cards in their hand and/or shadows area. Place each card not chosen on the bottom of its owner's deck (cannot be saved).
label: The Mad King's Command

name: Jon Arryn
text: Insight. Renown. Jon Arryn cannot be saved. Forced Interrupt: When Jon Arryn is killed, each player may either: draw 2 cards, or gain 1 power for their faction.
label: Jon Arryn

name: Prince of the Narrow Sea
text: Unique [baratheon] character only. If attached character is Salladhor Saan, he gains the Commander trait and renown. Reaction: After you lose initiative, return a Captain or Smuggler character to your hand to choose and kneel 1 character and 1 location, each with lower printed cost.
label: Prince of the Narrow Sea

name: The Reader's Septon
text: Action: Kneel The Reader's Septon to choose a player. Switch the top card with the bottom card of that player's deck.
flavor: Lord Rodrik had kept septons at Ten Towers, not for his soul's sake but for his books.
label: The Reader's Septon

name: Torrhen's Square
text: Reaction: After a [greyjoy] card you control comes out of shadows, kneel Torrhen's Square to choose up to 3 Raider characters with printed cost higher than your initiative value. Until the end of the phase, each of those characters discards an additional card using pillage. -2 Initiative.
label: Torrhen's Square

name: The Halfman's Horde
text: Assault. Intimidate. No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Halfman's Horde is attacking, discard 1 card at random from the losing opponent's hand for each other unique attacking Clansman character.
label: The Halfman's Horde

name: The Warden of the West
text: [lannister] Lord character only. Attached character gains the Commander trait and renown. Reaction: After 1 or more cards are discarded from an opponent's hand or deck during a challenge in which attached character is participating, draw that many cards. (Limit once per round.)
label: The Warden of the West

name: Doran Martell
text: Insight. Shadow (5). Each card you control in shadows gains shadow (X). X is that card's printed cost. Reaction: After you lose dominance, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Place 1 in shadows, and the other on the bottom of your deck.
label: Doran Martell (AHaH)

name: A Traitor's Whisper
text: Play only if there is a card with shadow in your discard pile. Action: Choose and reveal a card from each player's shadows area, if able. You may put those cards into play.
label: A Traitor's Whisper

name: Craster's Keep Mutineer
text: Reaction: After Craster's Keep Mutineer enters play, choose a duplicate on a character and discard it from play.
flavor: Craster lived high as a lord there, so why shouldn't he do the same? That would be a laugh.
label: Craster's Keep Mutineer

name: Defensive Debris
text: Bestow (2). Attached character gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Discard 1 gold from Defensive Debris to choose a card in an opponent's discard pile. Until the end of the phase, cards with the same printed cost as the chosen card cannot be played or put into play. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Defensive Debris

name: Crannogmen
text: Shadow (3). Interrupt: When claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge in which Crannogmen is attacking, return it to shadows to choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower controlled by the losing opponent. Instead of the normal claim effects, kill that character.
label: Crannogmen

name: The Wolf's Den
text: Reaction: After a character you control is sacrificed or killed, kneel The Wolf's Den to place the bottom card of your deck in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.
label: The Wolf's Den

name: Lysono Maar
text: Insight. During the first challenge you initiate each phase, defenders are declared before you declare attackers. (Attackers and defenders are knelt simultaneously as part of initiating the challenge.)
designer: Card design by 2017 European Joust Champion, Reinhard Schefcik.
label: Lysono Maar

name: The Balerion
text: While you control Captain Groleo, he gains a [power] icon and stealth. Challenges Action: Kneel The Balerion and shuffle it into your deck to choose a [targaryen] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains assault.
label: The Balerion

name: Ser Robar Royce
text: Ser Robar Royce cannot be declared as an attacker or defender in the first challenge each player initiates each round. -1 Initiative.
label: Ser Robar Royce (AHaH)

name: A Wall of Roses
text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, reveal your hand (of at least 1 card). Then, choose up to 2 attacking characters. Stand each of those characters and remove them from the challenge. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: A Wall of Roses

name: Littlefinger
text: Insight. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Littlefinger is participating, each player chooses a card in their hand or shadows area. Then, reveal those cards. If no opponent revealed a card with the same cardtype as you, move 1 power from a card in play to Littlefinger.
label: Littlefinger (AHaH)

name: Anya Waynwood
text: While you control Harry the Heir, he gains renown. Challenges Action: Kneel a neutral location to choose a non-participating character with equal or lower printed cost. That character contributes its STR to your side this challenge. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Anya Waynwood

name: Knights of the Vale
text: Assault. No attachments. Challenges Action: Kneel a neutral location with printed cost 1 or higher to choose a defending character that shares a Trait with Knights of the Vale. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. (+4 STR instead if your initiative value is 0.) (Limit once per phase.)
label: Knights of the Vale

name: Alayne Stone
text: Stealth. If you control Sansa Stark, place Alayne Stone on her as a duplicate. While Alayne Stone is kneeling, players cannot trigger abilities on in-faction Lord or Lady characters during the challenges phase.
label: Alayne Stone

name: Harry the Heir
text: While you control Anya Waynwood, she gets +1 STR for each power Harry the Heir has. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Harry the Heir is attacking, choose and stand a neutral location you control. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Harry the Heir

name: Lord Protector's Retainer
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an ability that chooses a Lord or Lady character you control as its only target would initiate, return Lord Protector's Retainer to your hand to cancel those effects. (Max once per phase.)
label: Lord Protector's Retainer

name: Nestor Royce
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Nestor Royce is participating, kneel a neutral location with printed cost 1 or higher to have him gain intimidate or renown until the end of the challenge.
label: Nestor Royce

name: Maester Colemon
text: Dominance Action: Kneel Maester Colemon to choose a Condition or Item attachment and move it to another eligible character.
flavor: "Maester Colemon cares only for the boy, though. Father and I have larger concerns." <cite>Sansa Stark</cite>
label: Maester Colemon

name: Mord
text: Action: Kneel Mord to choose a character controlled by a player whose initiative value is equal to or higher than yours. Until Mord stands or leaves play, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
label: Mord

name: Ser Vardis Egen
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Ser Vardis Egen is defending, sacrifice him to choose an attacking character. Place it in shadows with a shadow token on it (cannot be saved). While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.
label: Ser Vardis Egen

name: Benjicot
text: Forced Reaction: After Benjicot stands, reveal the bottom card of each player's deck. Add each revealed card that shares a Trait with Benjicot to its owner's hand, and discard the others.
label: Benjicot

name: Sweetrobin
text: Interrupt: When a card with printed cost equal to or lower than its owner's initiative value is revealed from a player's hand, deck, or shadows area, remove it from the game. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Sweetrobin

name: Winged Knight
text: Interrupt: When a Lord or Lady character is killed, sacrifice Winged Knight to remove that character from the game instead of placing it in its owner's dead pile.
label: Winged Knight

name: Gulltown Merchant
text: Marshaling Action: If there is a City plot card revealed, kneel Gulltown Merchant to gain 1 gold.
flavor: "There are several branches of House Arryn scattered across the Vale, all as proud as they are penurious, save for the Gulltown Arryns, who had the rare good sense to marry merchants." <cite>Littlefinger</cite>
label: Gulltown Merchant

name: The Eyrie
text: While your initiative value is 0, The Eyrie is immune to opponents' non-plot card effects. Challenges Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating loyal or House Arryn character, kneel The Eyrie to have it contribute 2 STR to your side this challenge for each participating character you control. -2 Initiative. +1 Reserve.
label: The Eyrie (AHaH)

name: The Vale of Arryn
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, choose a participating loyal or House Arryn character you control and have it gain 1 power. (2 power instead if The Vale of Arryn is kneeling.) (Limit once per phase.)
label: The Vale of Arryn

name: The Bloody Gate
text: Reaction: After you lose a [military] challenge in which you control a defending character, the winning opponent must choose and discard 1 card from their hand. (Discard 1 card at random from their hand instead if The Bloody Gate is kneeling.)
label: The Bloody Gate

name: The Highroad
text: Limited. Action: Kneel and sacrifice The Highroad to reduce the cost of the next non-character card you marshal or play this phase by 2. +1 Income.
label: The Highroad

name: Lord Protector of the Vale
text: Lord character you control only. If attached character is Littlefinger, he gets +2 STR. Challenges Action: During a [power] challenge in which you control a participating House Arryn character, kneel Lord Protector of the Vale to have attached character contribute its STR to your side this challenge.
label: Lord Protector of the Vale

name: Lysa's Letter
text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, choose a player and a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, if that player has not initiated a challenge of that type this phase, set the claim value on their revealed plot card to 0.
label: Lysa's Letter

name: The Seed is Strong
text: Reaction: After you lose initiative, the winning opponent must choose and discard a Lord or Lady character from their hand or shadows area unless they reveal a hand and shadows area containing no Lord or Lady characters.
label: The Seed is Strong

name: The Defiance of Duskendale
text: Reaction: After a location is knelt by assault, discard it from play.
flavor: "Unless I returned with the king by dawn of the following day, he would take the town with steel and fire, he told me." <cite>Ser Barristan Selmy</cite>
label: The Defiance of Duskendale

name: Wardens of the East
text: Each player cannot play in-faction events, and plays with each card in their shadows area revealed.
label: Wardens of the East

name: Banner of the Falcon
text: You must include at least 12 House Arryn cards in your deck. While the number of House Arryn cards you control is higher than your initiative value, each loyal character you control gets +1 STR. -2 Initiative. +1 Reserve.
label: Banner of the Falcon

name: Salladhor Saan's Lyseni
text: Assault. No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Salladhor Saan's Lyseni is attacking, it gains 1 power for every 2 kneeling locations the defending player controls. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Salladhor Saan's Lyseni

name: Ser Gilbert Farring
text: During a challenge in which a participating character has assault, Ser Gilbert Farring gets +1 STR and gains renown.
flavor: "A few good men remain, it's true. Ser Gilbert Farring holds Storm's End for me still, with two hundred loyal men." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>
label: Ser Gilbert Farring

name: Dragonstone
text: You may choose not to stand Dragonstone during the standing phase. Reaction: After a card is placed in shadows by a card effect, kneel Dragonstone. Then, until Dragonstone stands or leaves play, that card cannot come out of shadows.
label: Dragonstone

name: Dagmer Cleftjaw
text: Pillage. Shadow (4). Stealth. While there is a Winter plot card revealed, you may marshal Dagmer Cleftjaw into shadows from your dead pile as if he were in your hand.
flavor: "Dagmer lives, be grateful for that much." <cite>Asha Greyjoy</cite>
label: Dagmer Cleftjaw (TSoW)

name: Harlaw Scout
text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After an opponent discards 1 or more cards for reserve, gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per round.)
label: Harlaw Scout

name: The Myrish Eye
text: While there are no cards in shadows, attached character gains insight. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, kneel The Myrish Eye to choose and reveal a card in shadows. If it is an event, discard it.
label: The Myrish Eye

name: Ser Daven Lannister
text: Renown. Reaction: After Ser Daven Lannister gains 1 or more power, each opponent must choose and discard 1 card from their hand. Then, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round.)
label: Ser Daven Lannister

name: Oxcross Survivors
text: No attachments. While you control a [lannister] Lord or Commander character, Oxcross Survivors gets +3 STR and gains assault.
flavor: "Our cousin Ser Daven is reforming the remnants of his late father's army at Lannisport." <cite>Tywin Lannister</cite>
label: Oxcross Survivors

name: One, Two, Three
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, choose a participating character you control and (choose one): - return it to its owner's hand. - place it in shadows. - have it gain insight until the end of the phase.
label: One, Two, Three

name: Ser Andrey Dalt
text: Shadow (3). Each opponent cannot gain power from winning dominance.
flavor: "I have a wonderful horse and a very fine sword, and my valor is second to… well, several, actually."
label: Ser Andrey Dalt

name: Caggo Corpsekiller
text: Interrupt: When another character is returned to a player's hand or placed in shadows, return Caggo Corpsekiller to your hand to place that character in its owner's dead pile instead.
flavor: Caggo Corpsekiller the men were calling him now, though not to his face,, he was quick to anger, and that curved black sword of his was as nasty as its owner.
label: Caggo Corpsekiller

name: War Scorpion
text: Ambush (3). Attached character gets +2 STR. Challenges Action: Sacrifice War Scorpion to choose an attacking character, and remove it from the challenge. (You may kill that character instead if it has the Army or Dragon trait.)
label: War Scorpion

name: Iron Emmett
text: Stealth. While Iron Emmett is kneeling, characters with a [military] icon cannot enter play during the challenges phase.
flavor: "I hope this don't mean I can't beat the bloody piss out of you next time we train, my lord."
label: Iron Emmett

name: The Shadow Tower
text: Each character you control that is owned by an opponent gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Kneel The Shadow Tower to choose and reveal a card from an opponent's shadows area. If it is a non-unique character, put it into play under your control.
label: The Shadow Tower (TSoW)

name: Defending the Wall
text: Play only if you control Castle Black or The Wall. Challenges Action: Choose an attacking character with more than 1 challenge icon, and remove it from the challenge. If that character does not have the Army or Wildling trait, stand it.
label: Defending the Wall

name: King Robb's Bannermen
text: Assault. No attachments except Direwolf. While you control a [stark] King character, King Robb’s Bannermen may target an additional location using assault.
flavor: She had insisted that he be guarded as well, and the lords bannermen had agreed.
label: King Robb's Bannermen

name: The Bastard's Boys
text: Assault. Challenges Action: Sacrifice The Bastard's Boys to put a House Bolton or non-[stark] character with printed cost 5 or lower into play from your hand.
flavor: When the tale reached Lord Ramsay, he sent his Bastard's Boys to seize the man and drag him out into the snow.
label: The Bastard's Boys

name: The Crag
text: You cannot initiate [intrigue] challenges. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge as the attacking player, The Crag gains 1 power. (2 power instead if you control a [stark] King character.) (Limit twice per phase.)
label: The Crag

name: Hero
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Hero is participating, if you have fewer cards in hand than the losing opponent, choose and stand an Army character or Grey Worm. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Hero

name: Stalwart Shields
text: Assault. No attachments. While Stalwart Shields is participating in a challenge, each Army character an opponent controls loses all keywords.
label: Stalwart Shields

name: The Field of Fire
text: Challenges Action: Until the end of the phase, each non-Dragon character without attachments gets -1 STR for each Dragon character you control with printed cost 7 or higher. (Max 1 per phase.)
flavor: "A dragon is worth more than any army. Aegon proved that three hundred years ago, upon the Field of Fire." <cite>Arstan Whitebeard</cite>
label: The Field of Fire

name: Mace Tyrell
text: Renown. Action: Stand a participating Army character and remove it from the challenge to choose another participating character with equal or lower printed cost. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Mace Tyrell (TSoW)

name: Oldtown City Watch
text: Reaction: After Oldtown City Watch enters play, reveal the top card of each player's deck.
label: Oldtown City Watch

name: Highgarden Sept
text: While you have 7 or more cards in your hand, non-The Seven characters cannot enter play during the challenges phase. Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to a The Seven card you control, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Highgarden Sept

name: King's Landing Mob
text: Assault. Reaction: After a location is knelt by assault, kill King's Landing Mob to discard that location from play.
flavor: "You were glad enough to see my face when the mob had you, though. Remember?" <cite>The Hound</cite>
label: King's Landing Mob

name: Former Champion
text: Renown. Former Champion gets -1 STR for each power it has. While Former Champion's STR is 3 or lower, it gains a [power] icon and stealth. While Former Champion's STR is 1 or lower, it gains an [intrigue] icon and intimidate.
designer: Card design by 2008 Overall World Champion, Tzu-Mainn Chen.
label: Former Champion

name: Vanguard Leader
text: Unique character only. Attached character gets +1 STR and gains the Commander trait.
flavor: "Who shall have the van?" <cite>Mathis Rowan</cite>
label: Vanguard Leader

name: The Trident
text: Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, give control of The Trident to the losing opponent unless you sacrifice another neutral location. (Cannot be canceled.) +1 Claim
label: The Trident

name: Broken Men
text: Reaction: After you lose a [military] challenge, sacrifice a location to choose a participating character with the Army trait or printed cost 4 or lower, and discard it from play.
flavor: "The knights come down on them, faceless men clad all in steel, and the iron thunder of their charge seems to fill the world... And the man breaks." <cite>Septon Meribald</cite>
label: Broken Men

name: Battle of the Camps
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge as the attacking player, choose and kneel a character controlled by the losing opponent. (You may kill that character instead if it has the Army trait.) (Limit once per phase.)
label: Battle of the Camps

name: Beric Dondarrion
text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Beric Dondarrion is attacking, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the round, that character cannot kneel or stand. (Limit once per round.)
label: Beric Dondarrion (ATT)

name: Lady Marya
text: You may marshal or play facedown cards attached to Lady Marya as if they were in your hand. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Captain or Smuggler character, kneel Lady Marya to attach the top card of the losing opponent's deck to Lady Marya facedown under your control, as an attachment with the text: "Location only. Terminal."
label: Lady Marya

name: Victarion Greyjoy
text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel a character you control. If it has the: - R’hllor trait, Victarion Greyjoy gains insight and "immune to opponents' character abilities" until the end of the phase. - Drowned God trait, Victarion Greyjoy gains renown and cannot be killed until the end of the phase.
label: Victarion Greyjoy (ATT)

name: Cast Me Forth
text: You may ambush non-unique Drowned God characters from your dead pile as if they were in your hand. Each Drowned God character in your hand or dead pile gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost.
flavor: "When he cast me forth again he gave me eyes to see, ears to hear, and a voice to spread his word, that I might be his prophet and teach his truth to those who have forgotten." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>
label: Cast Me Forth

name: Myrcella Baratheon
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Myrcella Baratheon is participating, return her to your hand. Then, you may initiate an additional [intrigue] challenge against the losing opponent this phase. (Max once per phase.)
label: Myrcella Baratheon (ATT)

name: Castamere
text: Reaction: After claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge you won by 5 or more STR, kneel and sacrifice Castamere to apply [military] claim.
flavor: "They are well aware of Castamere, I promise you." <cite>Tywin Lannister</cite>
label: Castamere

name: Scheming Snake
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Scheming Snake enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons. That character does not contribute its STR to this challenge.
label: Scheming Snake

name: A Bed of Scorpions
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, choose and kill a participating character. (Max 1 per challenge.)
flavor: Lord Tyrell and his train traveled to Sandstone, where his lordship was murdered in a bed of scorpions.
label: A Bed of Scorpions

name: Gared
text: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When an Omen plot card is revealed, kneel each opponent's faction card.
flavor: “Everyone talks about snows forty foot deep, and how the ice wind comes howling out of the north, but the real enemy is the cold.”
label: Gared

name: Sentinel Stand
text: While Sentinel Stand is standing, each character you control with 1 or fewer challenge icons gets +2 STR.
flavor: The other keeps, long deserted, were lonely, haunted places, where cold winds whistled through black windows and the spirits of the dead manned the parapets.
label: Sentinel Stand

name: Karstark Lancer
text: Interrupt: When Karstark Lancer is sacrificed or killed, each player chooses a location they control, if able. Each of those locations gains 1 power.
flavor: "Rickard Karstark killed more than a Frey and a Lannister. He killed my honor." <cite>Robb Stark</cite>
label: Karstark Lancer

name: Lonely Hills
text: While Lonely Hills is standing, you are considered to have 1 fewer plot card in your used pile.
flavor: "Those are Umber lands, where they know every tree and every rock." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>
label: Lonely Hills

name: Free Brothers
text: Reaction: After Free Brothers enters play, search your deck for an Ally character with printed cost 3 or lower and place it in your discard pile. Shuffle your deck.
label: Free Brothers

name: Dance of the Dragons
text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] or [intrigue] challenge in which you are the attacking player, instead of the normal claim effects, kneel a Dragon character to move 2 power from the losing opponent's faction card to your own.
label: Dance of the Dragons

name: Red-Apple Knight
text: While you control exactly 1 unique [tyrell] Knight character, Red-Apple Knight gets +X STR. X is that character's STR.
label: Red-Apple Knight

name: Highgarden Treasury
text: Reaction: After a character is removed from a challenge, gain 1 gold. (Limit 3 times per round.)
flavor: The wealth and power of Highgarden could have made all the difference in the fighting yet to come.
label: Highgarden Treasury

name: Bloodraven
text: Insight. No attachments except Old Gods. Reaction: After the plot phase begins, sacrifice Bloodraven to choose an opponent. You may look at that player's chosen plot card before you choose a plot card to reveal this phase.
designer: Card design by 2022 Online World Champion, Alexandre Carry.
label: Bloodraven

name: Calm as Still Water
text: Interrupt: When a character with printed cost 3 or lower would be killed, save it and return it to its owner's hand.
flavor: Arya took a breath to still her soul.
label: Calm as Still Water

name: At the Tower of Joy
text: When Revealed: Choose a character. Until you reveal a new plot card, that character cannot be killed.
flavor: It was said that Rhaegar had named that place the tower of joy, but for Ned it was a bitter memory.
label: At the Tower of Joy

name: Open Revolt
text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost an [intrigue] challenge this phase, gain 2 power for your faction. (4 power instead if you have 3 or more Scheme plot cards removed from the game.)
label: Open Revolt

name: Acolyte of the Shadow
text: While an opponent controls a card in shadows, Acolyte of the Shadow gains insight.
flavor: "Shadows are the servants of light, the children of fire." -Melisandre
label: Acolyte of the Shadow

name: King Robert's Legacy
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking King character, choose a kneeling defending character and take control of it. (Max 1 per phase.)
flavor: "Your Grace's royal brother was renowned for turning fallen foes into friends." <cite>Asha Greyjoy</cite>
label: King Robert's Legacy

name: Ralf Kenning
text: Pillage. While there is a Winter plot card revealed, reduce the income and reserve values on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.
designer: Card design by 2017 Castle Stahleck Joust Champion, Martí Foz Hernàndez.
label: Ralf Kenning

name: Old Captain
text: While Old Captain is standing, it gains pillage and renown.
flavor: It was said that the ironmen of old had oft been blood-drunk in battle, so berserk that they felt no pain and feared no foe.
label: Old Captain

name: Tywin Lannister
text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Tywin Lannister is participating, he gains 1 power for every 3 gold in your gold pool. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "Nothing is won so long as we have enemies in the field..."
label: Tywin Lannister (ChoS)

name: Boots
text: Unique character with printed cost 3 or lower only. Ambush (1). Attached character gains renown.
label: Boots

name: The Old Hawk
text: Insight. While there is a Summer plot card revealed, each [martell] character you control with STR 6 or higher gains renown.
flavor: The Fowler twins were famous friends of Lady Nym as well, but how much weight would that carry with the Old Hawk?
label: The Old Hawk

name: The Throne of Dorne
text: Reaction: After you lose dominance, kneel The Throne of Dorne to place a [martell] card you control in shadows. +1 Reserve.
label: The Throne of Dorne

name: Highborn Recruit
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Highborn Recruit to choose a character with 1 or fewer challenge icons. Until the end of the phase, that character gains insight or renown.
label: Highborn Recruit

name: Insubordination
text: Terminal. Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you in which attached character is attacking alone, kneel Insubordination to kill attached character.
flavor: "Do you hear me, boy? I will not have it!" <cite>Janos Slynt</cite>
label: Insubordination

name: Ghost
text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Direwolf character, draw 1 card. Interrupt: When Jon Snow would be killed, sacrifice Ghost to save him.
designer: Card design by 2019 European Melee Champion, Chris Meeuwsen.
label: Ghost (ChoS)

name: Taste the Blood
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which you control a participating Old Gods character, kneel your faction card to choose a plot card in any player's used pile. Initiate the when revealed ability on that card as if you had just revealed it.
flavor: And through the mist of centuries the broken boy could only watch as the man’s feet drummed against the earth...
label: Taste the Blood

name: Arstan Whitebeard
text: If you control Ser Barristan Selmy, sacrifice Arstan Whitebeard. While you control no Lord or Lady characters, Arstan Whitebeard cannot kneel.
label: Arstan Whitebeard

name: Summerhall
text: Reaction: After a character's STR is reduced to 0 by a card effect, kneel Summerhall to kill it.
flavor: "And yet Summerhall was the place the prince loved best." <cite>Arstan Whitebeard</cite>
label: Summerhall (ChoS)

name: Ser Parmen Crane
text: While you control another Rainbow Guard character, Ser Parmen Crane gains renown.
flavor: The green light shone strangely against the purple plums of Ser Parmen's surcoat.
label: Ser Parmen Crane

name: Chivalry of the South
text: Interrupt: When a challenge ends in which there are no participating characters, gain 2 power for your faction. (Limit 3 times per round.)
flavor: "Look across the fields, brother. Can you see all those banners?" <cite>Renly Baratheon</cite>
label: Chivalry of the South

name: Jalabhar Xho
text: Marshaling Action: Discard 1 power from your faction card to take control of Jalabhar Xho. (Any player may initiate this ability.)
flavor: Jalabhar Xho was all in feathers, a plumage so fantastic and extravagant that he seemed like to take flight.
label: Jalabhar Xho

name: The Moon Door
text: You choose which player wins ties for initiative and dominance. Reaction: After The Moon Door is knelt during a challenge, choose and kill a participating character with printed STR 3 or lower.
label: The Moon Door

name: A Southron Peace
text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. Until you reveal a new plot card, you and that player cannot initiate [military] challenges against each other.
label: A Southron Peace

name: The Gold Price
text: Locations you control enter play knelt. Reaction: After a character is discarded at random from an opponent's hand, put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, sacrifice it unless you pay X gold. X is that card's printed cost. (Limit once per phase.)
designer: Card design by 2015 Draft World Champion, Ryan Jones.
label: The Gold Price

name: Ser Andrew Estermont
text: Interrupt: When a unique [baratheon] character would be killed, kill a R'hllor character to save that character and have it gain 1 power. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "I shall go with you, Cousin. There's nothing to be frightened of."
label: Ser Andrew Estermont

name: The Laughing Storm
text: Unique [baratheon] location you control only. While The Laughing Storm is standing, cards cannot be discarded at random from your hand. Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel The Laughing Storm to choose and kneel a character controlled by the losing opponent.
designer: Card inspired by 2010 Joust World Champion, Alec Irwin.
label: The Laughing Storm

name: Tarle the Thrice-Drowned
text: Renown. Reaction: After a Drowned God character is placed in your dead pile, put it into play. Then, kill a character you control. (Limit once per round.)
label: Tarle the Thrice-Drowned (FUtG)

name: The Drowned God Wakes
text: Reaction: After you win dominance by 10 or more STR, each player chooses a character they control, if able. Kill each character not chosen.
flavor: "And the waters of wrath will rise high, and the Drowned God will spread his dominion across the green lands!" <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>
label: The Drowned God Wakes

name: Warrior's Sons
text: No attachments. Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to Warrior's Sons, stand Warrior's Sons. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Warrior's Sons (FUtG)

name: The Sack of King's Landing
text: During [intrigue] challenges, each [lannister] character you control gains pillage. Reaction: After a location enters an opponent's discard pile, that player must choose and kill a character they control with the same printed cost.
label: The Sack of King's Landing

name: Ser Arys Oakheart
text: Renown. While Ser Arys Oakheart is attacking, at least 1 character must be declared as a defender, if able.
flavor: "You will not take her whilst I still draw breath."
label: Ser Arys Oakheart (FUtG)

name: Vulture King
text: Attached character gains pillage. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, discard the top card of your deck to choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice.
label: Vulture King

name: Marsh's Conspirator
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Marsh's Conspirator comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
label: Marsh's Conspirator

name: Legacy of the Watch
text: Unique [thenightswatch] location you control only. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, if you control 2 or more participating: - Ranger characters, gain 1 power for your faction. - Steward characters, draw 2 cards. - Builder characters, stand a [thenightswatch] location.
label: Legacy of the Watch

name: Galbart Glover
text: While there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, increase the cost of the first character each opponent marshals or ambushes each phase by 1.
label: Galbart Glover

name: Ice
text: Unique [stark] character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After a character is saved, kneel Ice to kill it.
flavor: His father took off the man's head with a single sure stroke. Blood sprayed out across the snow, as red as summerwine.
label: Ice (FUtG)

name: Daenerys Targaryen
text: Insight. While you control Khal Drogo, he gains intimidate. Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, gain 1 power for your faction for each unique attacking Bloodrider character. (Limit once per phase.)
designer: Card design by 2019 Joust World Champion, Francis Côté.
label: Daenerys Targaryen (FUtG)

name: Naught but Ashes
text: Shadow (1). Challenges Action: Choose a participating character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 STR for each card in shadows.
flavor: "Aerys was mad, the whole realm knew it." <cite>Catelyn Stark</cite>
label: Naught but Ashes

name: Willas Tyrell
text: Insight. Willas Tyrell contributes his STR to your side during any challenge in which a character you control is attacking or defending alone.
flavor: "Willas has a bad leg but a good heart." <cite>Margaery Tyrell</cite>
label: Willas Tyrell (FUtG)

name: The Warden of the South
text: [tyrell] Lord character only. Attached character gets +1 STR and gains the Commander trait. Reaction: After attached character's STR is increased by a card effect, kneel The Warden of the South to stand attached character.
label: The Warden of the South

name: Belligerent Heir
text: Belligerent Heir gets +1 STR for each gold it has. Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, place 1 gold from the treasury on an attacking neutral character. If you lose the challenge, sacrifice that character. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Belligerent Heir

name: The Red Fork
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR, put The Red Fork into play from your discard pile. +2 Initiative.
label: The Red Fork

name: Greyscale
text: Terminal. Dominance Action: Kneel Greyscale to choose an opponent and reveal 1 card at random from their hand. If that card’s printed cost is equal to or higher than attached character’s, kill attached character and attach Greyscale to a different character. Otherwise, that player draws 1 card.
designer: Card design by 2017 Joust World Champion, Reinhard Schefcik.
label: Greyscale

name: City Blockade
text: Limited cards cannot be marshaled, played, or put into play.
label: City Blockade

name: Allard Seaworth
text: Dominance Action: Discard a facedown card attached to a [baratheon] card you control to gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: Allard would have ended on the Wall. Stannis spared him from that end, something else I owe him...
label: Allard Seaworth

name: Martial Law
text: Non-limited location only. Terminal. Attached location cannot stand unless its controller has won a [power] challenge this round.
flavor: “It takes more than a gold cloak to make a watchman.”- Ser Jacelyn Bywater
label: Martial Law

name: Great Kraken's Crew
text: No attachments. Shadow (2). Reaction: After Great Kraken's Crew comes out of shadows during a challenge, choose a defending character with printed cost 3 or lower. That character does not contribute its STR to this challenge.
label: Great Kraken's Crew

name: Nightfall
text: If attached character has the House Harlaw trait, it gains renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, kneel Nightfall to have each player check reserve.
flavor: Victarion wondered how Nightfall would fare against his axe.
label: Nightfall

name: Grand Maester Pycelle
text: Interrupt: When a card is discarded from a player's hand, place it facedown under that player's agenda instead of placing it in their discard pile. (Limit twice per round.)
flavor: "Pycelle is a toad. But better a Lannister toad then a Tyrell toad, no?" <cite>Tyrion Lannister</cite>
label: Grand Maester Pycelle (TTS)

name: Kingswood
text: Reaction: After a character you control enters play using ambush, kneel and return Kingswood to your hand to draw 1 card. +1 Initiative.
label: Kingswood (TTS)

name: Water Gardens Sentry
text: While you control a [martell] Lord or Lady character, Water Gardens Sentry may be declared as a defender during [intrigue] challenges in which you are the defending player.
label: Water Gardens Sentry

name: Nymeria of Ny Sar
text: Unique [martell] location you control only. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel Nymeria of Ny Sar to reveal a [martell] or Summer plot.
flavor: “On the day they wed, Nymeria fired her ships, so her people would understand that there could be no going back.”- Arianne Martell
label: Nymeria of Ny Sar

name: Bowen Marsh
text: Insight. Shadow (4). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, choose a character and a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker in challenges of that type. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
label: Bowen Marsh (TTS)

name: The Watch Needs Good Men
text: You may marshal or ambush characters from any opponent's discard pile as if they were in your hand.
label: The Watch Needs Good Men

name: Jon Snow
text: No attachments except Direwolf. Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] challenge, either: standing characters, or kneeling characters must be chosen for claim during this challenge, if able.
designer: Card design by 2019 Melee World Champion, Richard Walker.
label: Jon Snow (TTS)

name: The Hour of the Wolf
text: When Revealed: Each player sacrifices a non-loyal character, if able.
flavor: “The winters are hard, but the Starks will endure. We always have.” - Eddard Stark
label: The Hour of the Wolf

name: Black Balaq
text: Bestow (1). While Black Balaq is attacking, each defending character gets -X STR. X is the number of gold Black Balaq has.
flavor: He wore a feathered cloak of green and orange, magnificent to behold.
label: Black Balaq

name: Aegon the Conqueror
text: Unique [targaryen] location you control only. During a challenge in which you control an attacking Dragon character with printed cost 7 or higher, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.
flavor: “When the sun sets, your line shall end.”
label: Aegon the Conqueror

name: Dickon Tarly
text: Reaction: After a [tyrell] character you control stands, stand Dickon Tarly. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: His own mother was a thousand leagues south, safe with his sisters and his little brother Dickon in the keep at Horn Hill.
label: Dickon Tarly

name: Olenna's Wheelhouse
text: Bestow (3). Marshaling Action: Kneel Olenna's Wheelhouse and discard 1 gold from it to remove a [tyrell] character you control from the game until the beginning of the next phase.
label: Olenna's Wheelhouse

name: Varys
text: Bestow (2). Stealth. Action: Discard 1 gold from Varys to name a card. Until the end of the phase, that card cannot be marshaled, played, or put into play. (Limit once per phase.) Reaction: After a Scheme plot card is revealed, Varys gains 1 gold.
designer: Card design by 2019 Castle Stahleck Joust Champion, Sebastian Eckl.
label: Varys (TTS)

name: The Green Fork
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, put The Green Fork into play from your discard pile. +1 Income.
label: The Green Fork

name: Battle on the Green Fork
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, raise the claim value on Battle on the Green Fork by 1 until the end of the phase. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
designer: Card design by 2023 Online World Champion, Jim Hansen.
label: Battle on the Green Fork

name: The Gift of Mercy
text: Your plot deck cannot include Omen plot cards. Reaction: After you win a challenge, place a Valar Morghulis token on a character controlled by the losing opponent. Interrupt: When a character with 3 or more Valar Morghulis tokens leaves play, each player who does not control it gains 2 power for their faction.
designer: Card design by 2019 European Joust Champion, Alejandro Gomez.
label: The Gift of Mercy

name: Blackhaven Rider
text: Reaction: After Blackhaven Rider enters play, each player must choose and kneel a loyal character they control, if able.
flavor: “Robert is slain, but his realm remains. And we defend her.” - Beric Dondarrion
label: Blackhaven Rider

name: Robert's Rebellion
text: Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have lost a [power] challenge this phase, discard 3 power from your faction card.
flavor: "In my dreams, I kill him every night." <cite>Robert Baratheon</cite>
label: Robert's Rebellion

name: The Knight
text: Pillage. Action: During a challenge in which you are the attacking player, return 2 characters from the defending player's discard pile to their owner's hand. Then, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)
label: The Knight (TIC)

name: Harren the Black
text: Unique [greyjoy] location you control only. Each opponent cannot marshal copies of locations that are in their discard pile. Forced Reaction: After a character you control discards a card using pillage, discard the top card of each player's deck.
label: Harren the Black

name: Qyburn
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Qyburn comes out of shadows, choose a non-Army character in an opponent's dead pile and put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, remove it from the game (cannot be saved).
label: Qyburn (TIC)

name: Lann the Clever
text: Unique [lannister] location you control only. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, kneel Lann the Clever and return a participating [lannister] character to your hand to, either: gain 3 gold, or gain 1 power for your faction.
label: Lann the Clever

name: Ser Willam Wells
text: Challenges Action: Kill Ser Willam Wells to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon.
flavor: "Will will never have his wedding. Their deaths should have some meaning." <cite>Quentyn Martell</cite>
label: Ser Willam Wells

name: Red Mountains
text: Challenges Action: Kneel and sacrifice Red Mountains to choose an opponent. That player must initiate a [military] challenge against you as their next challenge this phase, if able. +1 Initiative.
label: Red Mountains

name: Maester Harmune
text: Reaction: After gold is moved from an opponent's gold pool to your own, reveal the top card of that player's deck. If that card is a character, discard it and draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round.)
flavor: “Maester Harmune of Eastwatch is drunk more than he's sober.” - Jon Snow
label: Maester Harmune

name: Saved by the Watch
text: Reaction: After an opponent's character is sacrificed or discarded from play, kneel your faction card to put that character into play. Then, attach Saved by the Watch to that character as a Condition attachment with the text: "Terminal. Take control of attached character."
label: Saved by the Watch

name: Bolton Loyalist
text: Forced Reaction: After you lose an [intrigue] challenge, give control of Bolton Loyalist to the winning opponent unless you sacrifice another character.
flavor: “What did any Bolton ever know o' honor?” - Proprietor of the Lazy Eel
label: Bolton Loyalist

name: Raventree Hall
text: Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to a character you control, gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: “My hall might lack for food, but never for courtesy.” - Tytos Blackwood
label: Raventree Hall

name: Pink Graces
text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, each player who did not apply [military] claim this phase may draw 1 card.
flavor: The Pink Graces arrayed themselves behind her, with eyes lowered and hands clasped before them.
label: Pink Graces

name: Temple of the Graces
text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] challenge in which you are the attacking player, kneel a Grace card to apply [intrigue] claim instead.
flavor: "Peace is the pearl beyond price" <cite>Galazza Galare</cite>
label: Temple of the Graces

name: Margaery Tyrell
text: Renown. Shadow (5). Interrupt: When 1 or more [tyrell] cards are revealed from your hand or deck, choose 1 of those cards and place it in shadows. (Limit twice per round.)
flavor: Margaery was different, though. Sweet and gentle, yet there was a little of her grandmother in her, too.
label: Margaery Tyrell (TIC)

name: Gilbert of the Vines
text: Challenges Action: Reveal the top X cards of your deck. Choose up to 2 cards revealed this way and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
flavor: “Can you smell the fruit, ser? The perfume of the Arbor. Taste it, my lord, and tell me it isn't the finest, richest wine that's ever touched your tongue.”
label: Gilbert of the Vines

name: Little Bird
text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After Little Bird comes out of shadows, choose an opponent and look at the top card of their deck. Then, you and that player may draw 1 card.
flavor: “Nothing happens in this city without Varys knowing.” - Littlefinger
label: Little Bird (TIC)

name: The Blue Fork
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, put The Blue Fork into play from your discard pile. +2 Reserve.
label: The Blue Fork

name: Enemies in Every Shadow
text: While there are no cards in shadows, each character you control gets +1 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge, choose a card in shadows controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it. If that card is a character, place it in its owner's dead pile.
label: Enemies in Every Shadow

name: The Last Greenseer
text: When Revealed: Switch the base gold, claim, and reserve values on The Last Greenseer with those values on another revealed plot card until either card leaves play.
label: The Last Greenseer

name: Maester Cressen
text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After Maester Cressen comes out of shadows or enters your dead pile, place the top 2 cards of your deck facedown under your agenda.
flavor: "I need no crown but truth."
label: Maester Cressen (WK)

name: Deepwood Motte
text: Reaction: After a Winter plot card is revealed, kneel Deepwood Motte to choose and kneel another non-limited location.
flavor: "If I can smash the ironmen as well, the north will know it has a king again." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>
label: Deepwood Motte

name: Maester Joseran
text: Reaction: After you become the first player, each player places the top card of their deck facedown under their agenda.
flavor: "I wrote you letters, but Maester Joseran would not send them." <cite>Tris Botley</cite>
label: Maester Joseran

name: Winterfell
text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Winterfell to choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the phase, take control of that character. -2 Initiative.
label: Winterfell (WK)

name: Tywin's Whisperer
text: Reaction: After a character with printed cost 2 or lower is returned to an opponent's hand, put Tywin's Whisperer into play from your hand. Until the end of the phase, it gains a [power] icon and stealth.
flavor: Tywin Lannister was as much fox as lion.
label: Tywin's Whisperer

name: A Lannister's Honor
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge as the attacking player, the losing opponent must choose and kill a character with the lowest STR among characters they control. (Max 1 per challenge.)
flavor: "The Lannisters have no honor." <cite>Ser Jorah Mormont</cite>
label: A Lannister's Honor

name: Tyene Sand
text: Stealth. Reaction: After you lose dominance, move 1 power from the winning opponent's faction card to a character you control.
flavor: "Doubt your little sister if you like, but never doubt our sire."
label: Tyene Sand (WK)

name: The Dornish Wars
text: Each character an opponent controls cannot gain challenge icons. Reaction: After you win a challenge, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: The Dornish Wars

name: Desperate Deserter
text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, choose an opponent. Give control of Desperate Deserter to that player. -1 Income. -1 Initiative.
label: Desperate Deserter

name: Weirwood Grove
text: Reaction: After an opponent reveals a non-Omen plot card, kneel your faction card and remove Weirwood Grove from the game to initiate the when revealed ability on that card as if you had just revealed it.
flavor: "Small wonder men feared them when they first came to Westeros." <cite>Thoren Smallwood</cite>
label: Weirwood Grove

name: Roose Bolton
text: Intimidate. Shadow (5). Reaction: After Roose Bolton comes out of shadows during a challenge, kill each participating loyal character.
flavor: "A peaceful land, a quiet people."
label: Roose Bolton (WK)

name: Bran the Breaker
text: Unique [stark] location you control only. Action: During a challenge in which you control 2 or more unique attacking [stark] characters, kneel Bran the Breaker to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge.
label: Bran the Breaker

name: Aegon Targaryen
text: Renown. Shadow (6). Reaction: After a non-loyal [targaryen] character enters play during the challenges phase, stand Aegon Targaryen. (Limit twice per phase.)
flavor: "Daenerys is Prince Rhaegar's sister but I am Rhaegar's son. I am the only dragon you need."
label: Aegon Targaryen (WK)

name: Grey Worm's Spear
text: If attached character is Grey Worm, he gains a [power] icon and intimidate. While attached character is attacking, each defending character gets -1 STR.
label: Grey Worm's Spear

name: Blackwater Forces
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After Blackwater Forces stands during a challenge, choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
label: Blackwater Forces

name: Garth Greenhand
text: Unique [tyrell] location you control only. During a challenge, each unique participating [tyrell] character you control gets +1 STR. +1 Income.
label: Garth Greenhand

name: Septa Unella
text: While Septa Unella is participating in a challenge, treat each other non-The Seven character with 1 or more power as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
flavor: "Shame upon the sinner, shame, shame."
label: Septa Unella

name: "A Thousand Eyes, and One"
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to choose an opponent and, either: look at their hand, or look at each card in their shadows area. Draw 1 card.
flavor: How many eyes does Lord Bloodraven have?
label: "A Thousand Eyes, and One"

name: Burning the Books
text: When Revealed: Each opponent chooses a non-The Seven attachment they control, if able, and discards it from play. Then, you may discard 1 power from a character you control to initiate this effect again.
flavor: Baelor the Blessed had ordered all Barth's writings destroyed when he came to the Iron Throne.
label: Burning the Books

name: Uniting the Realm
text: You may include non-loyal characters, locations, and attachments from any faction in your deck. You cannot include more than 3 different cards (by title) from each faction in your deck.
designer: Card design by 2018 European Joust Champion, James Waumsley.
label: Uniting the Realm

name: Melisandre
text: Shadow (5). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Melisandre is attacking, choose and reveal a card in shadows controlled by the losing opponent. If that card is a character, you may kneel your faction card to put it into play under your control.
label: Melisandre (SoS)

name: Edric Storm
text: Stealth. Each player cannot gain more than 3 power each round.
label: Edric Storm (SoS)

name: Ser Clayton Suggs
text: Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to a character, it gets +1 STR or -1 STR until the end of the phase.
flavor: "What sort of god lets himself be pissed upon by dogs?"
label: Ser Clayton Suggs

name: Stormlord
text: Renown. Forced Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, if you do not control a King character, sacrifice a character.
label: Stormlord

name: Red Keep Servant
text: While you control a King's Landing location, Red Keep Servant gains an [intrigue] icon and cannot be bypassed by stealth.
label: Red Keep Servant

name: Shadow Assassin
text: Shadow (3). If it is not the challenges phase, sacrifice Shadow Assassin. Reaction: After Shadow Assassin enters play, choose and kill a participating character with lower STR.
label: Shadow Assassin

name: The King's Justice
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel attached character to choose and kill a kneeling character with equal or lower printed cost controlled by the losing opponent.
label: The King's Justice

name: Aquired by the Crown
text: Ambush (3). Location only. While attached location is kneeling, take control of it.
label: Aquired by the Crown

name: Narrow Sea Galley
text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After Narrow Sea Galley comes out of shadows, choose a participating character with STR 1 or lower and place it in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is that card's printed cost.
label: Narrow Sea Galley

name: Northern Pyre
text: Challenges Action: If there is a Winter plot card revealed, kneel and sacrifice Northern Pyre to choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, set that character's STR to 3.
label: Northern Pyre

name: A New Hand
text: Reaction: After a Small Council character you control is killed, kneel your faction card to search your deck for another Small Council character and put it into play, knelt. Shuffle your deck.
label: A New Hand

name: No Crown but Truth
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's character ability would initiate, kill a Maester character to cancel those effects and draw 1 card.
flavor: Now here is a riddle. A clever fool and a foolish wise man. A crown to match your chain, Lord Maester.
label: No Crown but Truth

name: Ralf the Limper
text: Pillage. Shadow (5). Reaction: After Ralf the Limper discards a location using pillage, choose a card you control with shadow and return it to shadows. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Ralf the Limper

name: Theon Greyjoy
text: Forced Interrupt: When Theon Greyjoy leaves play, each opponent gains 2 power for their faction. Forced Reaction: After a player counts income, they must choose and kill a character they control.
designer: Card Designed by 2012 European Joust Champion, Stefano Montanari
label: Theon Greyjoy (SoS)

name: Moqorro
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Moqorro comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [intrigue] icon and stealth.
label: Moqorro (SoS)

name: Orkmont Elite
text: Assault. Pillage. Reaction: After Orkmont Elite discards an attachment using pillage, attach it to an eligible character.
label: Orkmont Elite

name: Shipborn Bastard
text: X is the number of cards you control with initiative modifiers.  +1 Initiative.
label: Shipborn Bastard

name: Wandering Disciple
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Wandering Disciple comes out of shadows, put a non-unique Drowned God character into play from your dead pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it.
label: Wandering Disciple

name: Smiler
text: Ambush (2). Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which attached character is attacking, kneel Smiler to have attached character gain intimidate or renown until the end of the challenge.
label: Smiler

name: Raider's Scythe
text: Raider character only. While attached character is attacking an opponent who controls fewer attachments than you, it does not kneel when declared as an attacker.
label: Raider's Scythe

name: Lonely Light
text: Immune to events. Increase the cost for each player to bring cards out of shadow by 1.
label: Lonely Light

name: Southbound Galley
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Southbound Galley comes out of shadows, choose an opponent and name a card. Then, reveal the top card of that player's deck. If the revealed card has that name, put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it.
label: Southbound Galley

name: Naval Bombardment
text: Play only if there is a War plot card revealed. Challenges Action: Choose an opponent who controls fewer locations than you. Until the end of the phase, that player cannot initiate [intrigue] challenges against you.
label: Naval Bombardment

name: Taking the Shield Islands
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Raider character, look at the top 3 cards of the losing opponent's deck. Discard 1 of those cards, and place the others on top of that deck in any order.
label: Taking the Shield Islands

name: Crawn, Son of Calor
text: Shadow (4). Stealth. You may marshal Crawn, Son of Calor into shadows from your discard pile.
label: Crawn, Son of Calor

name: Ser Osfryd Kettleblack
text: While you have more cards in hand than any opponent, Ser Osfryd Kettleblack gains renown.
label: Ser Osfryd Kettleblack

name: Gyles Rosby
text: Limited. If you have no gold in your gold pool during the challenges phase, kill Gyles Rosby. +2 Income.
label: Gyles Rosby

name: Ashemark Councilor
text: X is the number of cards with 1 or more gold on it. Reaction: After Ashemark Councilor enters play, place 1 gold on up to 3 cards without gold.
label: Ashemark Councilor

name: Tyrion's Agent
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Tyrion's Agent is participating, return it to shadows to place a card at random from the losing opponents hand on top of their deck.
label: Tyrion's Agent

name: Alchemist Apprentice
text: Dominance Action: Kneel Alchemist Apprentice to choose a non-limited location with printed cost 2 or lower and return it to its owner's hand.
label: Alchemist Apprentice

name: Joffrey's Crossbow
text: If attached character is Joffrey Baratheon, he gains intimidate. While attached character is participating in a [military] challenge, unique characters must be chosen for claim first.
label: Joffrey's Crossbow

name: Slander and Lies
text: Opponent's character only. Ambush (2). Attached character gains renown. You may spend power on attached character as if it were 2 gold in your gold pool.
label: Slander and Lies

name: Lannisport
text: While an opponent has fewer cards in their hand than you, they cannot initiate [power] challenges against you. +1 Income.
label: Lannisport (SoS)

name: Wildfire Barge
text: Shadow (0). Plot Action: Sacrifice Wildfire Barge to have each player who controls more than 3 characters choose and kill a character they control (cannot be saved).
label: Wildfire Barge

name: Good as Gold
text: Shadow (0). Limited. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, gain 2 gold for each card you control in shadows.
label: Good as Gold

name: The Regent's Council
text: Play only if you control a King character or Cersei Lannister. Challenges Action: Choose a character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains the Small Council trait and does not kneel when declared as an attacker. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved).
label: The Regent's Council

name: The Red Viper
text: Renown. Shadow (6). Action: During a challenge in which The Red Viper is attacking, discard a card from shadows to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)
flavor: "I am going to kill that"
label: The Red Viper (SoS)

name: Ser Manfrey Martell
text: Renown. While Ser Manfrey Martell is participating in a challenge, renown and insight trigger when losing the challenge instead of winning the challenge.
label: Ser Manfrey Martell

name: Ser Guilian Qorgyle
text: Reaction: After a character is declared as an attacker or defender, it loses a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase. (Limit twice per phase.)
label: Ser Guilian Qorgyle

name: Ghost Hill Elite
