text: Ambush (6). No attachments. Reaction: After Ghost Hill Elite enters play, choose and kill a character with no challenge icons.
label: Ghost Hill Elite

name: Dornish Diplomat
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Dornish Diplomat comes out of shadows, search the top 10 cards of your deck for up to 3 [martell] attachments with printed cost 1 or lower, and put them into play.
designer: Card design by 2018 Worlds Joust Champion, Lennart Paga.
label: Dornish Diplomat

name: Southron Informant
text: Reaction: After Southron Informant enters play, give control of it to an opponent. Then, discard 1 card at random from that player's hand and draw 1 card.
label: Southron Informant

name: The Viper's Spear
text: Sand Snake or The Red Viper only. Attached character does not kneel when declared as an attacker against an opponent who controls more characters than you.
label: The Viper's Spear

name: Guerrilla Tactics
text: [martell] character you control only. Shadow (0). Action: Sacrifice Guerrilla Tactics to return attached character to shadows.
designer: Card design by 2022 Stahleck Melee Champion, Lennart Paga.
label: Guerrilla Tactics

name: Yronwood
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered ability to winning a challenge would initiate, kneel Yronwood to cancel those effects.
label: Yronwood

name: River Barge
text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After River Barge comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains or loses a [military] icon.
label: River Barge

name: A Toast to the King
text: Shadow (1). Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, gain X power for your faction (to a maximum of 5). X is the number of characters with no challenge icons. (Max 1 per phase.)
label: A Toast to the King

name: Retribution
text: Interrupt: When a [martell] character you control is killed for [military] claim, if you control fewer characters than the attacking player, that player must choose and kill an attacking character.
label: Retribution

name: Benjen Stark
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which Benjen Stark is attacking, name a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, the losing opponent cannot initiate challenges of that type against you.
label: Benjen Stark (SoS)

name: Dirk
text: Forced Interrupt: When a character would be discarded from play, place it in it's owners dead pile instead of placing it in their discard pile.
label: Dirk

name: Wick Wittlestick
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Wick Wittlestick comes out of shadows during a challenge in which you control a participating character, each player must sacrifice a participating character they control.
label: Wick Wittlestick

name: Northern Envoy
text: Reaction: After you marshal Northern Envoy, reveal the top 10 cards of an opponent's deck. Choose 1 non-unique character revealed this way and place it in its owner's discard pile. Shuffle that player's deck.
label: Northern Envoy

name: Greyguard Artisan
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Greyguard Artisan comes out of shadows, choose an attachment. Until the end of the phase, treat that card's text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).
label: Greyguard Artisan

name: Convert Beyond the Wall
text: While you do not control another Wilding character or Jon Snow, sacrifice Convert Beyond the Wall.
label: Convert Beyond the Wall

name: Mutineer's Blade
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, kneel Mutineer's Blade and sacrifice attached character to choose and kill a participating character.
label: Mutineer's Blade

name: Torch and Oil
text: Reaction: After an opponent draws a card, kneel Torch and Oil to reveal it. If that card is a character, discard it and stand attached character.
label: Torch and Oil

name: The Black Gate
text: Action: Kneel The Black Gate to sacrifice a [thenightswatch] character. Then, put a character with lower printed cost that shares a Trait with that character into play from your hand or shadow area.
label: The Black Gate

name: Grey Galley
text: Shadow (1). Dominance Action: Kneel and sacrifice Grey Galley to place a character you control with printed STR 3 or lower in shadows. +1 Reserve.
label: Grey Galley

name: Seventy-Nine Sentinels
text: Challenges Action: During a challenge in which you control a defending [thenightswatch] character, kneel any number of [thenightswatch] characters with 1 or fewer challenge icons to have each participate in the challenge on your side.
flavor: "They left their posts in life, so in death their watch goes on forever" <cite>Bran Stark</cite>
label: Seventy-Nine Sentinels

name: When All is Darkest
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After a character enters play during a challenge, kneel your faction card to take control of it.
label: When All is Darkest

name: Tytos Blackwood
text: Renown. While Tytos Blackwood is participating in a challenge, treat the printed text box of each other character without power as if it were blank (except for Traits).
label: Tytos Blackwood

name: Howland Reed
text: Shadow (4). Stealth. Reduce the cost of the first [stark] card you bring out of shadows each round by 2.
label: Howland Reed

name: Steelshanks Walton
text: Dominance Action: Take control of a non-loyal character you own. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "Steelshanks, he is called. A soldier of iron loyalty." <cite>Roose Bolton</cite>
label: Steelshanks Walton

name: House Umber Berserkers
text: Shadow (X). Intimidate. No attachments. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile (to a minimum of 1).
label: House Umber Berserkers

name: Northern Patriarch
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event or Omen plot would initiate, cancel those effects unless that player moves 1 power from their faction card to Northern Patriarch. (Limit once per round.)
designer: Card Designed by 2012 World Champion, Derek Shoemaker. In Memory of Guy Gray.
label: Northern Patriarch

name: Trident Guard
text: While an opponent's claim value is lower than yours, Trident Guard gains renown.
label: Trident Guard

name: The Warden of the North
text: [stark] Lord character only. Attached character gains the Commander trait and renown. While attached character is participating in a challenge, each opponent cannot play events or bring cards out of shadows.
label: The Warden of the North

name: Dubious Loyalties
text: Non-loyal character only. Attached character gains the House Bolton trait. Forced Reaction: After a player wins a challenge in which attached character is participating, that player takes control of attached character.
label: Dubious Loyalties

name: Winterfell Kennels
text: Each Direwolf character you control gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Kneel Winterfell Kennels to put a Direwolf card into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it on the bottom of your deck.
designer: Card Designed by 2023 Stahleck Melee Champion, David Kennedy.
label: Winterfell Kennels

name: White Knife Barge
text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After White Knife Barge comes out of shadows, name a card. Until the end of the phase, cards with that name cannot be sacrificed. +1 Initiative.
label: White Knife Barge

name: Above the Rest
text: Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a House Tully character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an additional power using renown.
label: Above the Rest

name: "Wolves in the Hills"
text: Shadow (0). Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] challenge, return an attacking Direwolf character to your hand to apply [intrigue] or [power] claim instead.
label: "Wolves in the Hills"

name: Magister Illyrio
text: Insight. Shadow (5). Reaction: After you collect income, gain 1 gold for every 2 cards in shadows.
label: Magister Illyrio (SoS)

name: Harry Strickland
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Harry Strickland comes out of shadows, put an Army or Mercenary character with printed cost 5 or lower into play from your discard pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.
label: Harry Strickland

name: Red Lamb
text: Intimidate. While you control Ser Barristan Selmy, Red Lamb gains a [military] icon and the Knight trait.
label: Red Lamb

name: War Elephants
text: No attachments. War Elephants cannot be placed during setup, or marshaled into play.
label: War Elephants

name: Sorrowful Man
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Sorrowful Man comes out of shadows, swap a character in an opponent's discard pile with a character in their dead pile.
flavor: "I am so sorry."
label: Sorrowful Man

name: White Graces
text: Interrupt: When White Graces is discarded from your hand or deck, put it into play as a duplicate on a Lady or Grace character instead of placing it in your discard pile.
label: White Graces

name: Queen of Meereen
text: Lady character only. Attached character gains the Queen trait and insight. Action: Discard X cards from your hand to reduce the cost of the next card you marshal or bring out of shadows this phase by X. (Limit once per round.)
label: Queen of Meereen

name: Poisoned Locusts
text: Opponent's character only. Terminal. While attached character is participating in a challenge, it gets -1 STR for each attachment it has and is killed if its STR is 0.
flavor: "They are rolled in spice before the honey, so they are sweet and hot at once." <cite>Hizdahr zo Loraq</cite>
label: Poisoned Locusts

name: Slaver's Bay
text: Each participating character is killed if its STR is 1 or lower during: - [military] challenges, if you control Astapor. - [intrigue] challenges, if you control Yunkai. - [power] challenges, if you control Meereen.
label: Slaver's Bay

name: Qartheen Galley
text: Shadow (1). Taxation Action: Kneel and shuffle Qartheen Galley into your deck to choose a card with shadow in your discard pile and place it in shadows. +1 Initiative.
label: Qartheen Galley

name: Take To The Sky!
text: Play only if you control a Dragon character. Interrupt: When a Dragon or Stormborn character would be killed or discarded from play, save it and return it to its owner's hand.
label: Take To The Sky!

name: Stallion Who Mounts the World
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to search your deck for a unique Dothraki character and put it into play. Until the end of the phase, that character gains intimidate.
label: Stallion Who Mounts the World

name: Baelor Brightsmile
text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR in which Baelor Brightsmile is participating, place the top card of your deck facedown on him as a duplicate.
label: Baelor Brightsmile

name: Megga Tyrell
text: Reaction: After a character is removed from a challenge, Megga Tyrell gains 1 power. (Limt once per round.)
label: Megga Tyrell

name: Butterbumps
text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Butterbumps comes out of shadows during an [intrigue] challenge, stand and remove each non-unique character from the challenge.
label: Butterbumps (SoS)

name: Horn Hill Elite
text: Intimidate. No attachments. While Horn Hill Elite is attacking, it gets +1 STR for each standing character you control.
label: Horn Hill Elite

name: Undercity Spymaster
text: Shadow (3). X is the number of cards you control in shadows.
label: Undercity Spymaster

name: Agent of the Citadel
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Agent of the Citadel is participating, sacrifice it to reveal the top card of your deck. Reduce the cost of the next card you bring out of shadows this phase by X. X is the printed cost of the revealed card.
label: Agent of the Citadel

name: Enameled Green Armor
text: Attached character gains renown. Challenges Action: During a challenge in which attached character is participating, kneel Enameled Green Armor to choose a participating character with lower STR. That character contributes its STR to your side this challenge.
label: Enameled Green Armor

name: Unseen Influence
text: Character with printed STR 3 or lower only.  Attached character gets +1 STR for each character you control with printed cost 3 or lower.
label: Unseen Influence

name: The Whispering Sound
text: Taxation Action: Kneel The Whispering Sound to reveal your hand. Then, if you revealed a Warship location this way, you may put it into play, knelt.
label: The Whispering Sound

name: Trading Galley
text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, kneel Trading Galley to gain 3 gold and choose an opponent. Give control of Trading Galley to that player.
label: Trading Galley

name: Beneath the Petals
text: Shadow (0). Interrupt: When Beneath the Petals is revealed from your hand or shadow area, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 STR and gains stealth. (Max 1 per phase.)
label: Beneath the Petals

name: Growing Influence
text: Marshaling Action: Give X gold from your gold pool to an opponent. Then, choose and take control of a character that player controls with printed cost X or lower.
label: Growing Influence

name: Lysa Arryn
text: Renown. While your initiative value is 0, Lysa Arryn contributes her STR to each challenge in which you control a participating loyal or House Arryn character.
label: Lysa Arryn (SoS)

name: Biter
text: Intimidate. Reaction: After Biter kneels a character with lower STR using intimidate, sacrifice Biter to kill that character.
label: Biter

name: The Bastard of Driftmark
text: Taxation Action: Search your deck for a Warship location, reveal it, and place it in shadows. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per phase.)
label: The Bastard of Driftmark (SoS)

name: Alleras the Sphinx
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Alleras the Sphinx is participating, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a card, reveal it, and place it facedown under your agenda. Shuffle your deck.
label: Alleras the Sphinx

name: Elder Brother
text: While your revealed plot card has the The Seven trait, Elder Brother cannot be killed.
label: Elder Brother

name: Harrenhal Cupbearer
text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Harrenhal Cupbearer is participating, return it to shadows to choose and kneel a non-Spy character controlled by the losing opponent.
label: Harrenhal Cupbearer

name: Candle in the Dark
text: Attached character cannot be bypassed by stealth. Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered card ability would initiate, if that card has shadow, kneel attached character to cancel those effects.
label: Candle in the Dark

name: The Warden of the East
text: House Arryn character only. Attached character gains the Commander trait and +2 STR. Reaction: After a character is revealed from an opponent's hand, deck or shadow area, attached character gains 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)
label: The Warden of the East

name: Myr
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Myr to put an out-of-faction character into play from shadows. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play.
label: Myr

name: Ibbenese Whaler
text: Shadow (2). Taxation Action: If you have no cards in hand, kneel and return Ibbenese Whaler to shadows to draw 2 cards.
label: Ibbenese Whaler

name: The Milkwater
text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel and sacrifice The Milkwater to have each character lose all keywords and immunities until the end of the phase. +1 Initiative.
label: The Milkwater

name: "Widows Ford"
text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After an attachment or location enters your discard pile, place it in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.
label: "Widows Ford"

name: Reinstatement
text: Standing Action: Kneel your faction card to put a Small Council character into play from your discard pile.
label: Reinstatement

name: Battle Beneath the Wall
text: When Revealed: Name a challenge type. Until you reveal a new plot card, a player must declare all eligible characters when declaring attackers or defenders during a challenge of that type.
label: Battle Beneath the Wall

name: City of Shadows
text: When Revealed: Choose a card you control with shadow and return it to your hand. (You may return it to shadows instead if there is a City plot card in your used pile.)
label: City of Shadows

name: Doom of Valyria
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses any number of cards they control with a total printed cost of 14 or lower. Cards in shadow count as cards with printed cost 2. Discard each card not chosen (cannot be saved).
label: Doom of Valyria

name: The War of the Five Kings
text: X is the number of opponent's you do not support.
label: The War of the Five Kings

name: The Minstrel's Muse
text: You cannot play more than 3 events this round. Reaction: After a Song event is played, draw 1 card.
label: The Minstrel's Muse

name: The Age of Heroes
text: Dominance Action: Search your deck for an attachment, reveal it, and add it to your hand (you may put it into play instead if it is Legacy or Valyrian Steel). Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per phase.)
label: The Age of Heroes

name: Striking at Dawn
text: Each character's STR cannot be raised or lowered.
label: Striking at Dawn

name: Strained Reserves
text: Each player without a Summer plot revealed cannot marshal, ambush or bring more than 2 cards out of shadows this round.
label: Strained Reserves

name: Armed to the Teeth
text: Your deck cannot include non-Weapon attachments. Before placing setup cards, search your deck for 7 Weapon cards, reveal them, and place them facedown under this agenda. Action: Kneel your faction card and pay X gold to put an attachment with printed cost X or lower into play from under this agenda.
designer: Card design by 2022 Castle Stahleck Joust Champion, Marti Foz Hernandez.
label: Armed to the Teeth

name: The Small Council
text: You may include non-loyal Small Council characters from any faction in your deck. You must include at least 7 different Small Council characters in your deck. Reaction: After you win dominance, kneel your faction card to choose a standing Small Council character you control, and have it gain 1 power (2 power instead if you control a King or Queen character.)
label: The Small Council

name: Trading with Braavos
text: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. Your deck may include non-loyal Warship locations from any faction. Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of each Warship location. Reaction: After a neutral or out-of-faction location enters play under your control, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Trading with Braavos
